story:
Shoe4Africa e.V. collected used running shoes in Germany, now we need funds to cover the shipping cost from Germany to Kenya

Shoe4Africa e.V. is a registered non-profit organisation in Munich, Germany. The
mission of the charity is to promote sports, education and healthcare in East Africa/Kenya.

Our parent organisation Shoe4Africa.org is currently building the first public children's hospital, operates 4 primary schools and stages grass-roots sports events in Kenya to promote AIDS/HIV awareness.

Thanks to our generous supporters throughout Germany Shoe4Africa e.V. collected hundreds of used running shoes. Shoe4Africa empowers through sports, not to dump footwear on Africa. We give out running and soccer cleats to promote wellness and life changing activity. In addition, we combat the hookworm at a series of grass-roots events we organize.

At Shoe4Africa events we ask recipients of running shoes to run a footrace before receiving a pair of used running shoes, hence the shoes are hard earned, and thus demanded. This promotes empowerment, activity, and moves away from the traditional waiting for aid.

Unfortunately, getting running shoes shipped to Kenya in the most cost effective way remains a challenge. A shipment of 30kg of running shoes costs Euro 125 (or £100). We want to make sure that we can send our remaining stock of used running shoes from Munich to Kenya within the next 60 days in support of the annual Shoe4Africa Women's 5k Event, December 29th.

Any amount of fundraising that can generate towards covering the shipping costs will be a step forward and will allow us to send our used running shoes to Kenya.

Many thanks,
Urban

Endurance Performance Coach &
Co-Founder Shoe4Africa Germany e.V.

story:
OUR SHOP IS OPEN - Visit us now!



This is the content of our original and successful crowdfunding: 


That’s an easy one! Lexi&Bö, that’s us: Alexa and Stefan. And Lexi&Bö is our lifestyle focused brand for scuba divers that we have initiated. 

We’ve been passionate scuba divers for the last seven years but have been truly disappointed with t-shirt designs available with the established players. So the idea was born to get involved ourselves and craft some really cool designs that reflect our passion for the sport.

With a Lexi&Bö t-shirt you look awesome, show your passion for scuba diving and remember your special scuba diving moments.


The clock is ticking: get yourself your Lexi&Bö shirt until April 16 at a special rate and support our mission! Why you should do that? There’s three good reasons:

  1. With every ordered t-shirt you’re not only helping us start this business: €2 of the revenue per shirt is donated to Yaqu Pacha and their project “Bottle-Nosed Dolphins in Brasil”. 

  2. Lexi&Bö t-shirts will be produced from organic cotton and respecting fair trade principles. That’s why our shirts will carry the GOTS certification.

  3. We guarantee excellent quality of our shirts. Lexi&Bö t-shirts do not only provide superior wearing comfort but also outstanding longevity.


Often repressed above the water surface, some major issues get very clear under the surface: garbage and pollution, dying coral reefs and overfishing. Those are issues of general concern. Hence we are inspirited to give something back to nature and humanity. There’s two approaches to that: eco-friendly and fair production of our shirts on the one hand and supporting key marine protection projects with a portion of our revenues. You and us should be able to keep enjoying submerging into stunning scuba dives in the future.

To put it in other words: with the purchase of a Lexi&Bö t-shirt you can make a contribution to making this world a better place.

THE LEXI&BÖ ECOSYSTEM


ECO AND FAIR PRODUCTION

All Lexi&Bö t-shirts will be produced in Portugal and eill carry GOTS certification. This ensures fair and sustainable production - starting from the cultivation of organic cotton to eco-friendly and socially responsible crafting. Child labor is a no-no.


SUPPORTING YAQU PACHA

Since 2005 YAQU PACHA supports scientists in Brasil with their activities and projects on protecting local populations of the bottle-nosed dolphin. The number of beached animals of this species has strongly increased over the last years. The majority of them have suffered from injuries induced by fishing nets. The work of Yaqu Pacha has helped ratify some new and improved fishing laws in Brasil which deal with coastal fishing. It is very likely that aquatic mammals in the region like e.g. the bottle-nosed dolphin will see a clear improvement in their living conditions.

Come join our campaign and support the Yaqu Pacha activities!

You know some other remarkable marine protection projects worthwhile supporting? Let us know about it!



Lexi&Bö is not a two-man show. There’s a team supporting us who is just as convinced of our mission like us.




Due to the initial costs and high minimum order quantities in manufacturing our shirts, we need your support to allow us to begin our first production run.

COST CALCULATION



TIMELINE



There you go: our first Lexi&Bö t-shirt collection


OCEAN LOVER MEN


available in S, M, L, XL, XXL


BIG SHARK



available in S, M, L, XL, XXL

LOVE TO DIVE


available in S, M, L, XL, XXL


ON THE BEACH


available in S, M, L, XL


I'M OK


available in S, M, L, XL, XXL


OCEAN LOVER WOMEN


available in S, M, L, XL


All Early Bird Perks are limited to 10


When achieving our campaign goal you will receive a link to our website. There you can complete your order by selecting the actual Lexi&Bö shirt designs and sizes.

The above mentioned prices are complemented by separate packaging and posting costs (see perk description).


Are you operating or owning a dive shop? Then this could be the start of a mutually beneficial partnership. As a dealer you have three possibilities to support the campaign:

  • Test-drive sale: order 50 t-shirts (the two most popular shirts of this campaign). Price: €950. That’s €19 per shirt.

  • Dive shop package: contains 150 shirts (the four most popular shirts of the campaign) and costs €2.500. That’s €16.67 per shirt.

  • Dive resort package: secure yourself 500 shirts at an extra attractive price of €7.500. That’s €15 per shirt and contains all shirts of the campaign.

All prices for dealer perks are complemented with additional VAT, packaging and posting costs and possibly applying customers costs.

For additional information on dealer perks and our dealer program in general contact us: hello@lexibo.com


There’s some additional ways of supporting us.

Try’n’Buy diving

We are cooperating with the diving school of a friend and have set up an extraordinary try’n’buy diving event in Cologne. Up to 10 participants can enter into their first diving session! This is topped off with drinks and BBQ on our roof terrace. There’s a Lexi&Bö diving shirt on top of that, of course! All of this for €100. We’re looking forward to welcoming you!


Fridge magnets

The little Libellulobar manufacture run by Frederic has set up an exclusive and limited line of Lexi&Bö fridge magnets.

Our fridge magnets measure 53mm ⨉ 53mm 


Postcards

Get yourself some of our Lexi&Bö postcards to send awesome vacation or birthday greetings to your diving buddies.



Be one of the first to wear one of the stunning Lexi&Bö t-shirts this summer. This is how it works:

  1. Chose an offer on the right-hand side to initiate the order.

  2. On the following page you will receive all important information about your selected offer. Add costs for shipping if needed and enter your delivery address.

  3. Pay via PayPal. In case you don’t have a PayPal account or you want to pay using your credit card, you can use the PayPal guest access (‘Pay with a credit or debit card’).

  4. If our campaign succeeds you will receive your order as soon as possible. Meanwhile we will keep you posted about all relevant news from Lexi&Bö via e-mail.
Thanks so much for your contribution!

This is a fixed funding campaign, i.e. you will get your money back automatically in case we do not manage to fulfill our funding goal.


In case you require additional information you can reach us at hello@lexibo.com. We are working hard to respond to inquiries as soon as possible.

Thanks for your time and support! We’d love you to spread the word about Lexi&Bö with your friends.

#diveshirt

Lexi&Bö

story:
H IS ORANGE PROUDLY PRESENTS!!!

For the first time ever, LA based rock band H is Orange releases the official t-shirt for their highly acclaimed debut album "Thrill of Escape." This limited run t-shirt is the first design to be released by the band in over 5 years and a must have for all H is Orange fans.  

 Shirts are 2color on black/nothing on back.

 CROWDFUNDING AND HOW IT WORKS

Crowdfunding is defined as  "the collective effort of individuals who network and pool their resources, to support independent initiatives and projects." How it works is simple. 1. Donate your minimum amount of $30.00 (Includes S+H US only. Please add $7 for International). 2. Send us a message including your shirt size (sizes listed above and in Gallery section). 3. If we succeed in achieving our funding goal minimum by the end time limit (35 days), you become the proud owner of a brand new limited edition H IS ORANGE t-shirt. If we don't meet our minimum, the shirts will not be produced, and you don't get charged anything.  

VERY IMPORTANT :

We are hoping to make more than our minimum, and you can donate whatever amount you'd like, but WILL NOT receive a t-shirt unless you donate at least $30.00. 

INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING PLEASE ADD $7.

 

 Thanks for your support!

Love H is Orange

story:
GAVÉE GOLD™: Organically Purified Liquid Gold.

Tiffany Andersen, a stage 4 cancer survivor and victim of a serious car accident that nearly left her paralyzed, discovers a jewel at the heart of skincare based on organically purified elements and modern technology. 


Tiffany Andersen has been a master medical aesthetician, and holistic health practitioner for over 20 years. Her mission is to raise awareness for safe cosmetics. She has followed the guidelines of the Environmental Working Group.

Tiffany's unique story is gaining nationwide media. 

Help us spread the word in just 2 clicks:  Facebook  Twitter

Don’t miss out on the EDUCATIONAL VIDEO we made just for you!

FEATURED IN:

NATIONWIDE LAUNCH

The Romance Reality Show

Gavée Gold has introduced its cutting edge skincare line on a new TV show called The Romance.  The program airs in 2015 on Channel 4 to over 18 million nationwide households on COX Cable and Time Warner Cable and will be syndicated to over 30 million households nationally. 

HOTEL RECOGNITION 

Gavée Gold captured the attention of top media executives and has landed Tiffany Andersen an exclusive contract that will air a series of educational television shows to help raise awareness about the importance of safe cosmetics. Tiffany's shows will air in the following top 12 hotels on the Las Vegas Strip:

  • Aria
  • Bellagio
  • Caesar’s Palace
  • Encore
  • Wynn
  • M Resort
  • Mirage
  • MGM Grand
  • Palazzo
  • Planet Hollywood
  • Palms Casino Resort
  • Venetian

LOCAL MEDIA RECOGNITION 

Tiffany’s first interview began at a local TV station in Las Vegas, Nevada with Dale Davidson (president of Keen TV), where she was asked to be featured on a show called “Experts of Southern Nevada.”

TIFFANY'S  TELEVISION SHOW

Coming soon! Tiffany has been filming a series of video blogs that will air in 2015. Her series geared towards helping people understand the importance of safe cosmetics. 


PUBLICATIONS:

Finding Faith a memoir, written by Tiffany Andersen

A true story about love, life, tragedy and hope. Tiffany Andersen describes the horrific events she lived through that eventually led Tiffany on a mission to teach people they can live with “vitality” if they learn to repair the body naturally – thus, the creation of the Gavée Gold Collection.

REVIEWS ARE COMING IN!

"Finding Faith is an extraordinary tale of a young woman’s strength in the face of overwhelming adversity. Cheer for this brave young woman whose triumph in the end is a victory for all-who believe in faith, love, and God. This book is a must-read if you are losing faith in yourself and thinking everything is the end." 

Datin Caberline Keok

*In Malaysia, Datin is the wife of a Dato, a title denoting a membership of a high order of chivalry. The Dato is conferred by a hereditary royal ruler of one of the nine Malay states.

SPOKESPEOPLE

"I am honored to not only be the host of Tiffany's first television show, but to also be a representative of the Gavée Gold line.  Gavée Gold is unique in a way that has never been seen. As a medical aesthetician myself now, I would recommend her line to my clients and highly expect Gavée Gold to be one of Tiffany's greatest creations yet."

Shawnae Jebbia, Former Miss USA 

"I'm a big believer in Tiffany's Gavée Gold Collection. Keeping your skin healthy while on tour can be challenging. Her Gavée Gold skincare line helped me tremendously. I would recommend her line to anyone."

Peter Chu, Director/Choreographer  “So You Think You can Dance

PRESS:

Las Vegas Woman - awarded "Woman of Achievement"


Vegas Scene Magazine – Special Feature

Radio Talk shows

Susan Foley Rocco

Founder and Host of Women to Watch

"Tiffany Andersen’s “Finding Faith” a memoir, will stay with me forever. The book is the life story of a woman who overcame extreme adversity, and did so without ever losing hope. While overcoming adversity is a story often told, Tiffany’s is quite special. It takes you on a journey as if you are right there with her experiencing the same fears, helplessness, anger, joy and ultimately faith that God will always pull us through the inevitable hardship of life.  To her credit, not only does she carry on, but she does so with the mission to help others. A wonderful read if you’re looking to find gratitude for your life, and push to overcome your own struggles."

Susan Foley Rocco

 GAVÉE GOLD GOALS

GAVÉE GOAL #1: $15,000

As part of our Founding Member’s Club, we want to reward and keep you as a customer for life! Once we reach our first goal of $15,000, all Founding Gavée Gold Members will receive 5% off for LIFE on all future products sold directly through our website at https://GaveeGold.com



GAVÉE GOAL #2: $20,000

Receive 10% off for LIFE sold through https://GaveeGold.com

GAVÉE GOAL #3: $50,000

Once we reach goal final goal of $50,000, ALL Founding Members will receive 15% off for LIFE.

Before we go any further, we would like to start out by saying THANK YOU! We know it is a lot to take in when reading these promotions. Therefore, for the first 250 people who spend $65 or more, you will receive a FREE Gold Citrus Cleanser and Gold Citrus Mist too. And if you refer a friend who spends $29 or more, you will receive a FREE diamond top travel size jar with a surprise formula inside. You can refer as many friends as you want to see how many different travel jars you can collect. A picture of our travel sizes jars is in Pledge #1 at bottom. Your friend must confirm you referred them.

Tiffany's mission in life is to provide people with vital information about how to repair the body naturally. This includes teaching others to not just “survive” but “thrive” in life, and getting back to basics in order to live well…

“It is not about AGE MANAGEMENT and SURVIVAL...”

“It is WELLNESS MANAGEMENT and QUALITY OF LIFE...”

“It is a LIFESTYLE CHANGE that the world needs to recognize!”

Everyone wants to look their best; we all do. But at what price are we paying to achieve these results?

Over 80% of the skincare products sold today have ingredients that have industrial chemicals, including carcinogens, pesticides, reproductive toxins and hormone disruptors. These agents are cancer causing and harmful to your health. Can you imagine what they do to your skin?

WE NEED TO....

REMOVE THE TOXINS

The basis of Tiffany Andersen’s Gavée Gold Collection was made under the strict guidelines of the EWG (Environmental Working Group).  It has been her mission to prove that cosmetics can be effective, without compromising consumer health.

In order to support that mission, Tiffany first debuted Gavée Gold with a soft launch party supporting “Pink in the Park,” a fundraising event for the fight against breast cancer. Tiffany donated over $15,000 in services and products to support the event and will continue to raise awareness through special events.

Why would anybody want to use a product on their skin that causes things such as loss of hair, eczema, psoriasis, mental fatigue, headaches, or liver problems? The list of ailments is endless. When you use products with toxic chemicals the conditions listed above may affect your body.

Our third party clinical studies prove Gavée Gold will compete with medical grade products that use ingredients such as hydroquinone, which is toxic to skin cells.

Take a look at our clinical science studies.

EDUCATION THROUGH MEDIA and MARKETING.

In today's competitive market, a manufacturer must have something unique, as well as safe, yet high-performing, genuine, and rare. 

These are all traits that the Gavée Gold Collection has!

So why are we here?

While there are always growing pains in every great beginning, we are extremely excited about the amount of recognition we have already received, and now we need your help to take it to the next level, to reach a broader market.

In order for that to happen, we need to hit a minimum order quantity with each of our Founding Members and we are asking YOU to join the team in raising green awareness while looking and FEELING beautiful!

Let’s get down to business. What makes us truly unique in a world where everyone is trying to jump on the bandwagon of natural and organic products?

Our primary top ingredients are organically produced and possess amazing therapeutic qualities. We use liquid gold, but we are not “colloidal” or “nano-particle” liquid gold.

Our liquid gold is organically extracted

What makes these elements so unique is that they are truly “pure skin food” that feed the deepest level of the skin. 

Today, the precious metal is becoming increasingly important in many modern day medical and beauty treatments.

“Gold is very resistant to bacteria and so is often the material of choice for implants that are at the risk of infection, such as the inner ear,” says Dr. Richard Holiday, of the World Gold Council.

Historically gold has been known to slow down the collagen depletion and breakdown of elastin to prevent sagging skin. It is believed that gold, stimulates cellular growth of the deepest layer of the skin to regenerate healthy, firm skin cells, and provide a tightening effect. Its anti-inflammatory properties are also thought to decrease skin inflammation and seem to slow down melanin secretion and thus reduce age spots.

We are...the future of anti-aging skincare.

But we don’t stop at “ organically purified liquid gold."

We also use Cell Salts the "salts of life" 

Cell salts replace all 12 vital minerals and were based on the theory of Robert Virchow, a German doctor, anthropologist, pathologist, biologist and pre-historian. Dr. Virchow was the founder of modern pathology and father of social medicine. He worked with another biochemist by the name of William Schuessler. They found that a lack of minerals in any of the 12 cell salts led to disease, but replacing the missing minerals repaired the cells. They are not a medicine or a cure, but a powerful rebalancing supplement.

The “salts of life” are infused in every one of our products. So you know your skin will be healthy.

NO ONE IN THE WORLD has our organically purified elements.

This organic process is a proprietary blend that is highly labor intensive, therefore not seen in mainstream cosmetics. Through today's modern technology we are able to produce cutting edge formulas with hand selected unique ingredients from around the world. 



Our team of experts

Include respected doctors and experts in the field of cosmetics

Dr. Jin Lee: Vice President

The rest of our dedicated team of people who support Tiffany Andersen have been in the industry for many years and have been on the ground floor of major launches such as Ralph Lauren, Oscar De La Renta, Mattel (Barbie), and many more! They are the experts in marketing worldwide and support Tiffany’s cause. They are all happy to help Tiffany launch Gavée Gold and believe Gavée Gold is the next “diamond in the rough” skincare line. 

 

Barbara Muhlhauser: VP Sales

Barbara Muhlhauser has been in the cosmetic industry for 30 years. Her reputation speaks for itself as a past director of a sales team of six territory managers and six account coordinators. She has achieved annual sales of $20 million wholesale. She successfully launched new fragrances. The brands included Ralph Lauren (Lauren and Polo), Paloma Picasso, Gloria Vanderbilt, Giorgio Armani and Drakkar Noir (Guy Laroche). She has been involved with many other top name brands such as Oscar De La Renta, and Yves St. Laurent cosmetics and fragrances with annual sales of $65 million wholesale. Barbara now exclusively consults Gavée Gold on all facets of worldwide distribution.

 

Leslie Stafford:  VP Marketing

Leslie Stafford has been actively involved in the advertising and marketing field for 30+ years having worked for such notables as Mattel, Gillette and Hasbro Toys. She has won over 160 graphic design and advertising awards in her career. She designed many award-winning campaigns for MGM, Mandalay Resort Group, Harrah’s, Wynn Resorts, to name a few. Leslie now advises Gavée Gold in all facets of their advertising and marketing, packaging and brand awareness. Leslie is solely responsible for the award winning Gavée Gold website. 

 

Toni O’Bryan:  Branding Consultant

Toni O’Bryan brings over 25 years of visual + healing arts, having overcome chronic fatigue syndrome and other entrepreneurial challenges. She has created two award-winning branding and design agencies that served socially, environmentally and spiritually based business and is immersed in the anti-aging/wellness industries. She has been a key component in all branding and marketing materials and has designed the Gavée Gold logo and brand to date.

Tony Andersen: COO, PhD

Tony Andersen has helped to inspire his wife to find new ways to restore her health over the last 15 years. He has been instrumental in researching unique, cutting-edge elements to be infused into the Gavée Gold Collection. Tony has over 24 years of professional experience in the health and wellness industry. He has received a Bachelor of Science in Health Business Administration and a PhD of Holistic Health and Wellness with an emphasis on Naturopathic Science Nutrition. He is the Chief Operating Officer for Gavée Gold and oversees all logistics.

 

Tiffany Andersen: CEO, Founder,  HHP, LME, MH

 

Tiffany Andersen is the CEO and founder of Gavée Gold. Gavée Gold is her heart and soul and Tiffany has so diligently and feverishly focused on every aspect of the line from the concept, to the actual release of the Gavée Gold Collection. Her 20+ year career as a master medical aesthetician and holistic health practitioner speaks for itself. Her extensive background and bio may be viewed on the website, along with the executive team of Gavée Gold Collection. 

MANUFACTURING WORLDWIDE

Our team of top experts is fully equipped to handle manufacturing for the US based companies as well as abroad. It is our experience with supply chain management that ensures our ability to handle the often intricate product development process.

We truly understand the risk you take when supporting these progressive and exciting projects - and it is our job to deliver!

Your support is the final piece of the puzzle. 

To receive your pledge today would mean the world to our team. We are building brand awareness with our travel size items. 

We are excited for YOU to be one of the first to join our Gavée Gold Founding Members club and help us spread the word that is set in gold!

EXCLUSIVE INDIEGOGO ONLY PRICE

Indiegogo is a place where entrepreneurs come to raise the necessary funds to get their venture off the ground. 

How are we going to use your money?

To expand our marketing campaign.  

Lead time and delivery:

PRODUCTION TIMELINE

Production includes sourcing and formulating all products, assembling, labeling, manufacturing the product, and shipping to our fulfillment house. 

*Orders will be shipped no later than the end of May 2014.

Our qualified team of experts believe that while speed is important, quality assurance of products and customer satisfaction comes first. 

Our production team is ready to start producing as soon as our campaign ends, our orders are logged and our survey is completed. Please reference the production timeline above. We are also proud to say we are an American made company and manufacture in California! 

Risks and Challenges

MANUFACTURING

Manufacturing competency is at the heart of our production. Rest assured, this is not the first time our team produced products worldwide. Our team is completely familiar with the manufacturing process and its laws and regulations and more specifically, the manufacturing of cosmetic products.   Please remember that production won’t begin until after this campaign ends. We will notify you by email when we are ready to ship.

SHIPPING FEES VARY:

ALL U.S. ORDERS NEED TO INCLUDE $12.00

ALL OUT OF COUNTRY INCLUDE $30.00

Please make sure you click on the correct shipping PLEDGE to add to your order. Please understand we can not ship your items without this shipping PLEDGE included. We are at rock bottom prices and can not afford to cover this in our start up mode. Thank you for understanding. If the shipping fee is not included at the time of order, we will email you when we are ready to ship and your order can not be sent without payment. 

FAQ

What sort of warranties do you offer?

A 30-day money back guarantee. Just return the unused portion to Gavée Gold's offices, if you are not completely satisfied and we will credit your credit card, 30 days from the day we receive it.

How much is shipping?
Shipping depends on your country or state.  We will ship out of state, but there is a minimum fee of $30 for outside of the United States. Please understand this is the actual cost of shipping out of the country.

Are these products for men and women?
Men and women can use our products. Just follow the instruction cards that come in each set.

How do I choose the right package for me?
Our products are designed for most skin types by custom blending the line. But please see our instructional forms which are included in each kit.

What if I have questions?
We have our own in-house customer support team of qualified aestheticians who will be happy to help you any time. Just email us your questions to support@gaveegold.com and we can address any issue/s you may have.

Support our mission, and you will have access to our cutting edge formulas that you will love as much as your body does!

PLEDGE 1 GIFT $29 


PLEASE SEE OUR SHIPPING POLICY UNDER THE MANUFACTURE SECTION.

Our beautifully packaged travel kit contains 5 of our best sellers.

Gold Citrus Cleanser - Gentle aromatic gel cleanser with super-fruit antioxidants to help repair and balance the skin. 

Liquid Gold Peptides - Super-effective brightening serum infused with antioxidants, and peptides that nourish the skin while building collagen.  

Heart of Gold Elixir - High-performing moisture-binding and brightening agent that enriches the skin with super-food ingredients to help repair skin damage.  

Royal Day Night Cream - Rich in moisture-sealing agents that nourish the skin's own intercellular lipids, nourishing and brightening cream hydrating and regenerates the skin by increasing collagen production. 

Golden Enzymes - A gentle enzymatic exfoliating moisturizer with ozone infusion that circulates oxygen throughout the pores. Contains 5% alpha -hydroxy acid. 


PLEDGE 2 GIFT $39

Gold Citrus Cleanser 15ML - Gentle aromatic gel cleanser with super-fruit antioxidants to help repair and balance the skin. 

Gold Citrus Cleanser 15ML - Refreshing aromatic citrus mist formulated with panthenol (pro-vitamin B 5) and super fruits, mangonsteen, acai, noni, and goji berry to give your skin a radiant and healthy glow.

story_txt:
GAVÉE GOLD™: Organically Purified Liquid Gold.Tiffany Andersen, a stage 4 cancer survivor and victim of a
serious car accident that nearly left her paralyzed, discovers a jewel at the
heart of skincare based on organically purified elements and modern technology. Tiffany Andersen has been a master medical aesthetician, and holistic health practitioner for over 20 years. Her mission is to raise awareness for safe cosmetics. She has followed the guidelines of the Environmental Working Group.Tiffany's unique story is gaining nationwide media. Help
us spread the word in just 2 clicks:  Facebook  Twitter  
Don’t miss out on the EDUCATIONAL VIDEO
we made just for you!FEATURED IN:NATIONWIDE LAUNCH
The Romance Reality ShowGavée Gold has introduced its cutting edge skincare line on a new TV show called The Romance.  The program airs in 2015 on Channel 4 to over 18 million nationwide households on COX Cable and Time Warner Cable and will be syndicated to over 30 million households nationally. HOTEL RECOGNITION 
Gavée Gold captured the attention of top
media executives and has landed Tiffany Andersen an exclusive
contract that will air a series of educational television shows to help raise awareness about the importance of safe cosmetics. Tiffany's shows will air in the following top
12 hotels on the Las Vegas Strip:


Aria
Bellagio
Caesar’s Palace
Encore
Wynn
M Resort
Mirage
MGM Grand
Palazzo
Planet Hollywood
Palms Casino Resort
Venetian
LOCAL MEDIA RECOGNITION Tiffany’s first interview began at a local TV station in Las Vegas, Nevada with Dale
Davidson (president of Keen TV), where she was asked to
be featured on a show called “Experts
of Southern Nevada.”TIFFANY'S  TELEVISION SHOWComing soon! Tiffany has been filming a series of video blogs that will air in 2015. Her series geared towards helping people understand the importance of safe cosmetics. 

PUBLICATIONS:
Finding Faith a memoir, written by Tiffany Andersen

A true story about love, life, tragedy
and hope. Tiffany Andersen describes the horrific events she lived through that eventually led Tiffany on a mission to teach people they can live with
“vitality” if they learn to repair the body naturally
– thus, the creation of the Gavée Gold Collection. REVIEWS ARE COMING IN!

"Finding Faith is an extraordinary tale of a young woman’s strength in the face of overwhelming adversity. Cheer for this brave young woman whose triumph in the end is a victory for all-who believe in faith, love, and God. This book is a must-read if you are losing faith in yourself and thinking everything is the end." Datin Caberline Keok*In Malaysia, Datin is the wife of a Dato, a title denoting a membership of a
high order of chivalry. The Dato is conferred by a hereditary royal ruler of
one of the nine Malay states.
SPOKESPEOPLE "I am honored to not only be the host of Tiffany's first television show, but to also be a representative of the Gavée Gold line.  Gavée Gold is unique in a way that has never been seen. As a medical aesthetician myself now, I would recommend her line to my clients and highly expect Gavée Gold to be one of Tiffany's greatest creations yet."Shawnae
Jebbia, Former Miss USA "I'm a big believer in Tiffany's Gavée Gold Collection. Keeping your skin healthy while on tour can be challenging. Her Gavée Gold skincare line helped me tremendously. I would recommend her line to anyone."Peter
Chu, Director/Choreographer  “So
You Think You can DancePRESS:Las Vegas Woman - awarded "Woman of Achievement"Vegas Scene Magazine – Special Feature 
Radio
Talk showsSusan Foley Rocco
Founder and Host of Women to Watch
"Tiffany Andersen’s “Finding Faith” a memoir,
will stay with me forever. The book is the life story of a woman who overcame
extreme adversity, and did so without ever losing hope. While overcoming
adversity is a story often told, Tiffany’s is quite special. It takes you on a
journey as if you are right there with her experiencing the same fears,
helplessness, anger, joy and ultimately faith that God will always pull us
through the inevitable hardship of life. 
To her credit, not only does she carry on, but she does so with the
mission to help others. A wonderful read if you’re looking to find gratitude
for your life, and push to overcome your own struggles."Susan Foley Rocco GAVÉE GOLD GOALSGAVÉE GOAL #1: $15,000
As part of our Founding Member’s Club, we
want to reward and keep you as a customer for life! Once we reach our first goal of $15,000, all Founding Gavée Gold
Members will receive 5% off for LIFE on all future products sold directly
through our website at https://GaveeGold.com
GAVÉE GOAL #2: $20,000
Receive
10% off for LIFE sold through https://GaveeGold.com

GAVÉE GOAL #3: $50,000

Once we reach goal final goal of $50,000, ALL
Founding Members will receive 15% off
for LIFE.
Before we go any further, we would like
to start out by saying THANK YOU! We know it is a lot to take in
when reading these promotions. Therefore, for the first 250
people who spend $65 or more, you will receive a FREE Gold Citrus Cleanser and Gold Citrus Mist too. And if you refer a friend who spends $29 or more, you will receive a FREE diamond top travel size jar with a surprise formula inside. You can refer as many friends as you want to see how many different travel jars you can collect. A picture of our travel sizes jars is in Pledge #1 at bottom. Your friend must confirm you referred them.

Tiffany's mission in life is to provide people with vital information about how to repair the body naturally. This includes teaching others to not just
“survive” but “thrive” in life, and getting back to basics in order to live
well…

“It is not about AGE MANAGEMENT
and SURVIVAL...”
“It is WELLNESS MANAGEMENT and QUALITY OF LIFE...” 
“It is a LIFESTYLE CHANGE that
the world needs to recognize!”
Everyone wants to look their best; we all do. But at what price are we paying to achieve these results?
Over 80% of the skincare products sold today have ingredients that have industrial chemicals, including carcinogens, pesticides, reproductive toxins and hormone disruptors. These agents are cancer causing and harmful to your health. Can you imagine what they do to your skin?WE NEED TO....
REMOVE THE TOXINSThe basis of Tiffany Andersen’s Gavée
Gold Collection was made under the strict guidelines of the EWG (Environmental Working Group).  It has been her mission
to prove that cosmetics can be effective, without compromising consumer health.In order to support that mission, Tiffany first debuted Gavée Gold with a soft launch party supporting “Pink in the Park,” a
fundraising event for the fight against breast cancer. Tiffany donated over $15,000 in services
and products to support the event and will continue to raise awareness through special
events.

Why would anybody want to use a product on
their skin that causes things such as loss of hair, eczema, psoriasis, mental
fatigue, headaches, or liver problems? The list of ailments is endless. When you use
products with toxic chemicals the conditions listed above may affect your body.
Our third party clinical studies prove Gavée
Gold will compete with medical grade products that use ingredients such as hydroquinone, which is toxic to skin cells. 
Take a look at our clinical science studies.
EDUCATION
THROUGH MEDIA and MARKETING.
In today's competitive market, a manufacturer must have something unique, as well as safe, yet high-performing, genuine, and rare. 
These are all traits that the Gavée Gold Collection has!So why are we here?While there are always growing pains in every great beginning, we are extremely excited about the amount of recognition we have already received, and now we need your help to take it to the next level, to reach a broader market.In order for that to happen, we need to hit a minimum order quantity with each of our Founding Members and we are asking YOU to join the team in raising green awareness while looking and FEELING beautiful!
Let’s get down to business. What
makes us truly unique in a world where everyone is trying to jump on the bandwagon of natural and organic products?
Our primary top ingredients are organically produced and possess amazing therapeutic qualities. We use liquid gold, but we are not
“colloidal” or “nano-particle” liquid gold. 
Our liquid gold is organically extracted
What makes these elements so unique is that
they are truly “pure skin food”
that feed the deepest level of the skin. 
Today, the precious metal is becoming
increasingly important in many modern day medical and beauty treatments.
“Gold is very resistant to bacteria and so is
often the material of choice for implants that are at the risk of infection,
such as the inner ear,” says Dr. Richard
Holiday, of the World Gold Council. 
Historically gold has been known to slow down
the collagen depletion and breakdown of elastin to prevent sagging skin. It is believed that gold, stimulates cellular growth
of the deepest layer of the skin to regenerate healthy, firm skin cells, and
provide a tightening effect. Its anti-inflammatory properties are also thought
to decrease skin inflammation and seem to slow down melanin secretion and thus
reduce age spots.
We are...the future of anti-aging skincare.
But we don’t stop at “ organically purified liquid gold."
We also use Cell Salts the "salts of life" 
Cell salts replace all 12 vital minerals and were
based on the theory of Robert Virchow, a German doctor, anthropologist,
pathologist, biologist and pre-historian. Dr. Virchow was the founder of modern
pathology and father of social medicine. He worked with another biochemist by the name of William Schuessler. They found
that a lack of minerals in any of the 12 cell salts led to disease, but
replacing the missing minerals repaired the cells. They are not a medicine or a
cure, but a powerful rebalancing supplement. 
The “salts of life” are infused in every one of
our products. So you know your skin will be healthy.
NO ONE IN THE WORLD has our organically purified elements.
This organic process is a proprietary blend that is highly labor intensive, therefore not seen in mainstream cosmetics. Through today's modern technology we are able to produce cutting edge formulas with hand selected unique ingredients from around the world. 

Our team of expertsInclude respected doctors and experts in the field of cosmetics
Dr. Jin Lee: Vice President

The rest of our dedicated team of people who
support Tiffany Andersen have been in the industry for many years and have been
on the ground floor of major launches such as Ralph Lauren, Oscar De La Renta, Mattel (Barbie), and
many more! They are the experts in marketing worldwide and support
Tiffany’s cause.
They are all happy to help Tiffany launch Gavée Gold and believe Gavée Gold is the next “diamond in the rough” skincare line. 
 
Barbara
Muhlhauser: VP Sales 

Barbara Muhlhauser has been in the cosmetic
industry for 30 years. Her reputation speaks for itself as a past director of a
sales team of six territory managers and six account coordinators. She has achieved annual sales
of $20 million wholesale. She successfully launched new fragrances. The
brands included Ralph Lauren (Lauren and Polo), Paloma Picasso, Gloria
Vanderbilt, Giorgio Armani and Drakkar Noir (Guy Laroche). She has been
involved with many other top name brands such as Oscar De La Renta, and Yves
St. Laurent cosmetics and fragrances with annual sales of $65 million
wholesale. Barbara now exclusively consults Gavée Gold on all facets of
worldwide distribution. 
 
Leslie
Stafford:  VP Marketing


Leslie Stafford has been actively involved in
the advertising and marketing field for 30+ years having worked for such
notables as Mattel, Gillette and Hasbro Toys. She has won over 160 graphic
design and advertising awards in her career. She designed many award-winning
campaigns for MGM, Mandalay Resort Group, Harrah’s, Wynn Resorts, to name a few. Leslie
now advises Gavée Gold in all facets of their advertising and marketing,
packaging and brand awareness. Leslie is solely responsible for the award winning Gavée Gold website. 
 
Toni
O’Bryan:  Branding Consultant

Toni O’Bryan brings over 25 years of visual + healing arts, having overcome chronic fatigue syndrome and other entrepreneurial challenges. She has created two award-winning
branding and design agencies that served socially, environmentally and
spiritually based business and is immersed in the anti-aging/wellness industries. She has
been a key component in all branding and marketing materials and has designed the Gavée Gold logo and brand to date. 
Tony Andersen: COO, PhD

Tony Andersen has helped to inspire his wife to find new ways to restore her health over the last 15 years. He has been instrumental in researching unique, cutting-edge elements to be infused into the Gavée Gold Collection. Tony has over 24 years of professional experience in the health and wellness industry. He is the Chief Operating Officer for Gavée Gold and oversees all logistics.

story:
What is SURU?

SuRu is a premium apparel brand that promotes multiculturalism and diversity through fashion and lifestyle. The word SURU means "To do" in the Japanese language and "Patience" in the Yoruba language. The Yorubas are from West Africa, predominantly Nigeria, Togo and Benin.

Often times we find similarities between vastly different cultures, traditions, and fashion. The similarities and correlation in the definition of Suru are fascinating given the geographic distance between these cultures. We believe this applies to many languages and cultures around the world, hence the creation of a brand that celebrates similarities in our cultures and promotes a diverse community.

After many years of producing quality apparel, we are now ready to embark on a new chapter in the growth of the SuRu brand. The release of the SuRu UNLACE sneaker will be a huge step forward for us to further grow our product offerings and hopefully add more people to the SURU nation.

The Unlace is unlike any sneaker you have seen or worn. It is built to be functional, efficient and comfortable when in use. It was designed with sense of fashion, style and comfort in mind. It was constructed with the finest materials with the top of the sneaker made with soft premium nappa leather, double stitched for reinforcement. The sole is made of high quality vulcanized rubber for comfort and durability. 


Wear Unlace Wherever, Whenever!

SuRu Unlace is created to eliminate the necessity of lacing your high top sneakers. Whether going through TSA at the airport, being temporarily unable to lace your shoe yourself due to injury, in a rush to get out of the house, or simply don't like to lace and unlace, Unlace is perfect for you. Like they say, time is money. Why not zip and go?


THE SHORTEST DISTANCE BETWEEN POINT A TO B IS A STRAIGHT LINE!



The Unlace high top is made with high quality nappa leather, all black with a durable vulcanized rubber sole. Top quality YKK metal zipper back closure that allows easy on and off without ever touching the lace. SuRu emblem logo stamped in an embossed process on lateral. 

It includes two strong yet flexible cloth laces with two color options [White & Black]. SuRu woven logo sewn on tongue with UNLACE special logo print on insole. Super plush cloth lining to give the utmost comfort when worn.

EVA INSOLE: EVA is the go to sole for running shoes makers. It is light, flexible, durable and comfortable and it has a great disposition as a cushioning material.

THE BOX: The Unlace sneaker comes in a unique laminated box with brief case distinctive look.



THE T-SHIRT: 100% Cotton

THE SNEAKER: 100% Leather with Rubber Sole with Eva Insole.






PRESS: CONTACT: ASK@SURUCLOTHING.COM

Risks & Challenges

On the production side, we've spent years working on this particular product, 2010 to 2015 to be precise. Within those years, we've gone through 3 stages of prototypes. This is in an effort to ensure we deliver a high quality product that represents our brand and speaks to our values. This by no means suggests we are perfect. But what we are is experienced in producing high quality products in a timely manner. Best of all, production is already on the way.

We promise to do everything within our capacity to mitigate any posing risks. We will make sure we stay engaged with our supporters and communicate any developments as they occur. We will open a forum for you to post questions so we can address your concerns as soon as possible. We will inform you on our progress, and we would like you to know that despite the fact that things tend to shift in our industry, we promise to rectify any issues that may arise.

Other Ways You Can Help

To help make this pre-order campaign successful, we are asking friends, families, Indigogo patrons & community, and bloggers to help spread the word. We can only do this with your help.

But what we are is experienced in producing high quality products in a timely manner. Best of all, production is already on the way.
We promise to do everything within our capacity to mitigate any posing risks. We will make sure we stay engaged with our supporters and communicate any developments as they occur. We will open a forum for you to post questions so we can address your concerns as soon as possible. We will inform you on our progress, and we would like you to know that despite the fact that things tend to shift in our industry, we promise to rectify any issues that may arise.   Other Ways You Can Help 
To help make this pre-order campaign successful, we are asking friends, families, Indigogo patrons & community, and bloggers to help spread the word. We can only do this with your help.

story:
What is Undefined.?

What is Undefined.? Undefined. challenges the concept of fixed ideas by establishing gender fluidity, versatility in design, and materials of choice.

About Undefined.

Undefined. Jewelry is a gender-fluid, handcrafted jewelry brand based in New York and Seoul, South Korea.

While fixed ideas and concepts create a common collective, they often transmute into unalterable structures that frequently fail at defining us. Undefined Jewelry see ‘labels’ as a deteriorating, imminently obsolete ideal and choose instead to focus on the artisans, who have previously been behind the scenes and often forgotten. Thus, catering our production process towards the interests of both the artists and consumers.

Emerging in November 2017, Project Undefined is dedicated to maintaining the quality of precious metals used, balancing the concept of value with fashion jewelry design. In being gender fluid, Undefined Jewelry disrupts the previous definitions and stereotypes of beauty to create an irreplaceable identity.

Handcrafted in New York, Undefined Jewelry supports local businesses while also functioning on an international scale by collaborating with artists globally. Rather than following a traditional fashion calendar, all the collections are project based and each designer focuses on a single piece so that the emphasis is given to the artistry of the work. Each collection evokes inspiration from fine art to create a unique line of rings, earrings, bracelets, and necklaces.

In being fluid in our choice of designs, precious materials, and methods of production, our project works to establish a new standard of beauty that is truly, undefined.

About the Founder

Brand Founder Kiera Junghyun Kim received her B.A. in Fashion Design & Business in Korea. She began her career at a vendor company and continued as a fashion stylist and consultant, working with numerous editorials. Her previous clients include Vogue, Harper's Bazaar, W Magazine, Carhartt, MCM, and The North Face, to name a few.

She joined her family business as a marketing team leader and successfully launched an Italian private label in Korea. She built a brand website, an online marketing plan, and managed PR/editorial for the company. She distributed the brand to renowned department stores in Korea, such as the Shisnegae Lotte Department Store.

Since her experiences navigating different duties has allowed her to understand the whole scope of the fashion world, Kiera saw the traditional fashion business as an industry where the work of designers fail to get substantial credit and they are regarded as just another stage towards a final product. Kiera wished to create a brand that gave identity to the production process, creating something that people could truly support.

She came to New York to refine her ambition and challenge this institution at Parsons. She was eager to dedicate her knowledge and experience to build a fashion business using a platform to celebrate individual artistic creation and sustainable production methods.

She incubated the idea and concept throughout the whole program at Parsons School of Design and founded Undefined. in 2017. She was invited to speak to Parsons as a guest lecturer to share her insights about fashion trend forecasting, millennial culture, and how these factors ultimately apply to fashion branding.

Today, she continues her passion for the industry through the collaboration of distinguished artists and photographers such as Joshua Aronson, who created the print campaign for Off-White and was featured in the New York Times.

Funding

We are lucky enough to have one of the most reputable diamond suppliers in the industry. Being one of the biggest diamond suppliers in the world, Jewelex allows us to work with only the best, conflict free diamond sources. Their diamonds are supplied by De Beers and other major mines in the world, which ensures consistent output throughout the year. With the capital from the upcoming gold and diamond collection, we will put more resources towards manufacturing, product development, and expanding our online marketing. 

As a company, we are not willing to compromise the quality of either our products, or our production process. Our funds will help maintain our promise of having handmade and locally sourced materials. 

Our $1000 Pledge tier represents our newest upcoming collection, which utilizes gold and diamond materials. Since this collection is not out yet to the public, those who pledge this tier will have exclusive access to these products below the retail prices, before they go on the market. 

Diamond + Sterling Silver 925 Collection 

We are applying diamonds to our Sterling Silver 925 in both black and white diamonds

Diamond + Gold Collection

We are applying 14K gold as well as diamonds to our collection in both black and white. 

Risks & Challenges

We know that building a brand will have its challenges. However, we have experience in the industry and a good foundation for growth. 

Being a brand that is handcrafted locally, higher input costs and longer delivery times are challenges that may occur with production. 

Our projects collaborate with designers globally, and they are handcrafted by local artisans using only quality metals. Each piece takes about two weeks to make, since orders are completed on an individual basis.

However, our commitment to support local businesses and create quality goods that challenge conventional beauty substantializes the challenges that may occur. 

If any unexpected issues arise with production or development, we will notify our backers once we know.

story:
CHECK OUT OUR NEW PERKS!

Official Garmin-Sharp Pro Cycling Team jersey by Castelli!  

Inspirational necklaces for men and women!

Perform Better Recover Faster!

Fact: Athletes competed naked at the early Greek Olympics.  Probably because they could perform better -- and look good doing it!  Wearing RecoFit Compression Gear feels like that.   It’s designed and tested by athletes in Boulder, Colorado, a place that was voted by GQ Magazine as the city that looks best naked.  We are proud of that. 

We are also proud of RecoFit Compression Gear and are ready to take it to the next level.  That's why we need your help.  By contributing to our campaign, we can accomplish a lot!  

Our gradient-compression gear helps everybody, not just elite athletes.  Its carbon-based, technical fabric improves circulation, delays fatigue, prevents swelling, keeps your legs from feeling like wooden posts after sitting or standing for long periods.  So we want to develop more awesome products!

RecoFit is a woman-owned, independent company that wants to stay that way, to stay authentic, and to be true to its customers.

We want to continue making our products in the USA, which costs more but is worth it!

Here’s another good reason to donate – our video model is Olympic runner Roberto Mandje, who is on a quest for Olympic gold.  If you help us, we in turn can continue to sponsor him and other athletes.  Plus we have fabulous perks to reward you!

Please tell everyone you've ever met, emailed, Facebooked, tweeted, texted, called or wrote a snail mail to that they should contribute to our campaign. And for whoever refers the most amount of donors, he or she will receive a free pair of RecoFit full-leg compression sleeves -- a $75 value!

Thanks!

Susan Eastman Walton, owner

www.recofit.co

Please help us reach our goal by donating today! 

Videography by Michael Robson

story:
Introducing Swades!

Welcome to the future, today.  We're proud to introduce you to our new product: Swades.  Swades are unique, stylish and fun.

See us having fun using ElfYourself: http://bit.ly/1bPay7g


All jokes aside, Swades are unique roll-up sunglasses that naturally fit the contours of your face without the "legs" of conventional sunglasses.

Swades are ultralight, super cool roll-up sunglasses.


Being unlike any other "pair" of sunglasses on the market, Swades will be an instant conversation starter.  Swades have a unique wraparound design that allows them to naturally and comfortably fit the contours of your face.

Fig. 1 & 2 - Unique Wraparound Design

Fig. 3 - 100% UV Protection and Full Peripheral Coverage

Swades conveniently roll-up as soon as you remove them making them much more portable than conventional sunglasses.


Fig. 4 - Apparently, Size Does Matter!

Equally important to the design is the light weight nature of Swades.  In fact, Swades are so light, they even float!

Fig. 5 - Swades are Ultralight

Swades Float!

We love that Swades are so versatile.  Initially, we plan to have them available in six attractive colors, giving you the freedom to mix, match and use as you please.

Initial Swades Colors (Matte Black not shown)


Roll in Style

We're hoping that with your support, we'll be able to roll out a variety of new colors to add to our current lineup of Swades.  We've just hit the tip of the iceberg in terms of colors, patterns and materials.

Fig. 5 - More Colors to Come!

As with any pair of sunglasses, protecting them is key.  Yet, we're all familiar with the frustration of big, bulky cases.  For Swades, that's exactly what we looked to purposefully avoid.  Our cases are small, but sturdy.  Stylish and easily portable.

Wherever your travels take you, we're hopeful that you'll bring Swades along for the ride!

Ready to Roll

We're thrilled to share our project with you.  We hope that you're as excited about Swades as we are!  We think that Swades will quickly become the sunglasses you can afford to lose, but wouldn't want to.

Thanks in advance for your support, it should be a fun four weeks!

Swades - Unique. Stylish. Fun.

Purchasing Swades

Please be sure to specify your Swades color (Razor Red, Bougie Blue, White Hot, Posh Pink, Gecko Green) in the comments box when purchasing.

Risks and challenges

Delivery time is approximated based on estimated production timelines. If we're able to move into production and deliver earlier, we will definitely do so!

As with every product, there are some limitations. We'd like to share a few of these upfront so you can keep them in mind.

1) Please note that Swades will initially be available as a one-size fits all product. We are exploring alternative options (e.g., kids size) for the future.

2) Unless you're purposefully looking to lose them, we don't recommend that you skydive, go on a roller coaster, ski, attend an outdoor Hurricane party or the like in your Swades.

3) Swades do not fit on top of an existing pair of glasses.

4) Swades are non-prescription.

5) Actual border colors may vary slightly from images shown.

We'll be sure to keep you updated as our project progresses on Indiegogo.

Thanks!

story:
NEW One-OF-A-Kind handcrafted pierced punk stuffed vampire kitty made by Eris D. Kallisti. Mr. Kitty comes with a Pixie Polish bottle of our choice for a $66 conibution, which would let you have an awesome plushie, Pixie Polish, and help my campaign meet the the goal!

 

 


"When we create or find something exceptional, an amazing product and an ethical business, we have a social responsibility to share and promote it so others can also shop wisely, have great goods, safer products and so consumers can support *people*, not impersonal exploitative corporate entities." Pixie

 

Our Story

Ethical Nail Polish for a Purpose

Safe affordable nailpolish using high-end hi-tech pigments and custom colors, unique polish for unique people. Girls, guys and all the in-between, Pixie Polish is for everyone!. 25% of Pixie Polish proceeds go to JDRF, Juvenile Diabetes Research Association and other causes. Pixie supports social justice, freethought, religious tolerance and freedom, democracy not theocracy, charity, good karma, mindfulness, right action, local businesses, GLBT Rights and is the 99%. 


Due to being disabled, I needed to find a way to make cheap unique one-of-a-kind nail polishes. I had to have my polish lemmings and if I could not afford them, I decided to DIY them or make something better! 

With my husband out of work since October 2011, I had to make my social security money (668/mth for two people to live on is HARD) go further so I studied light sceince, tech, cosmetic chemistry, mineral, pigments and used my knowledge as an artist to make my own polishes. 


I will not make or sell toxic chemical soup and no animal testing or tested products are used. I am the guinea pig/lab rat.With my serious and terrible allergies and chemical sensitivities, I test on ME!:)

People seem to like the polishes, especially the linear holos. That oil slick rainbow is amazing! (That one pigment is also 10.00 USD per each gram!!!). 

 Pixie Polish may literally keep me alive and make others happy too!

All my polishes are guaranteed Big 3 Chemical Free. 

The Impact

My big goal is to provide safe Big three chemical free nail polishes for everyone. I want my polish to be on everyone's fingers and toes, womens, mens, and everyone in between. I believe in beauty, but I believe in it being non-toxic .I am sick, but everyone else doesn't have to be just to be beautiful. If I can leave the world a more beautiful place than it was then when I came into it I've done something great. If my nail polishes just makes a few people smile, it makes my day.  

All of the money I would collect goes into making Pixie Polish successful. I would really like to make the world a more beautiful place, make people feel good about themselves, let them just look at their nails and get a real thrill and have people go "Wow" "How does that work" and "What are you wearing"? 

I know nail polish seems like a trivial thing to get excited about but it really has helped my own self-esteem whle struggling with cancer and I think I and my creations can help others so I want to be able to give 25% of the profits from Pixie Polish to charities.


I'm not doing it for me I'm doing it for the world. I intend to provide receipts to all contributors and provide incentives such as free polishes and a polish in my line, either un-named and prexisting or chosen and designed by you, to be named for you for contributions.

My personal financial goal is to do what I love and enjoy, making polish to pay the bills, improve my/our quality of life, and someday replace the dangerous Mombus, my 99 Plymouth Grand Voyager with 329,000 miles on it and on it's deathbed, plus afford the constant medical copays and cancer treatment for my Non-Hodgkins lymphoma.  


What We Need & What You Get

I need bottle labels (35-40 dollars,) bottles ($25 for acetone to clean recycled bottles, $50 for mini bottles and $200 to purchase Pixie Polish specific bottles), pigment in volume ($275/250ml for the linear holo pigment and 200 for othr mineral pigments, Big 3 polish base ($29/pint), supplies (silicon sheets, quaity business cards (30 dollars), a professional respirator/dust mask (the Hello Kitty face mask/dust mask is just hard to use and fogs up my glasses), a polish display case for vending, a box of nitrile gloves, Etsy store set up, and a graphic designer to unpixelate my logo at full size, plus PR Promo package/kit expenses to market to indie salons and stamps/shipping expenses.



If I do not reach my funding goal I will focus on business cards pigments polished base and setting up an Etsy store, so my established clientele can continue to wear Pixie Polish. I'll be honest, I don't have any other funding sources I am disabled but I have a dream and I have the skills to make Pixie Polish. 


Other Ways You Can Help

The only way this is going to work is with your help. Human beings work best as a community and it would mean a lot to me that you let other people know that Pixie Polish exists, I exist, and I make nail polish. Please use your share tools and well, let's pimp this polish and get this party started! If you believe in Pixies, Pixie Polish is possible. I want to live in a world where anything is possible.

Other Ways You Can Help
The only way this is going to work is with your help. Human beings work best as a community and it would mean a lot to me that you let other people know that Pixie Polish exists, I exist, and I make nail polish. Please use your share tools and well, let's pimp this polish and get this party started! If you believe in Pixies, Pixie Polish is possible. I want to live in a world where anything is possible.

story:
Short Summary

Hi, I'm Lila Morency. Some of you know me from the last Indiegogo campaign but some don't. So here's a quick intro: I'm Canadian/American and have been living in Italy for the past 7 years, 1 of which was spent studying the language and culture, 3 years spent studying fashion design at the Marangoni Institute of Milan, and 3 years working for a luxury sports brand gaining experience in this complex field. 

A little over a year ago, I was inspired to start my own brand: Lila Morency. Last September I presented my collection, for the first time during the Milan Fashion Week, by doing a flash mob around the city of Milan. Thanks to the help of my campaign supporters, the event was a success. I was happy to see how many people supported me and wanted to be part of this adventure. With the help of those like you who believe in new talents, I know I will be able to grow in the fashion world!

What We Need & What You Get

In order for my brand to become known, it needs lots of advertising of all sorts: magazine articles, editorials, photographers, a PR group and much more. A brand needs the flexibility to experiment new techniques to create innovative garments. For this to happen, I am looking for one or more big sponsors. Sponsors who will believe in my project and see it as a long term investment in return for a percentage on the sales. Until I find those big sponsors, I need all the help I can get, and that's where you all come in.

For this next presentation I would like to create an avenue for art, photography, and fashion to mix. I am aiming to present my clothes in a venue similar to a gallery where many visual art forms can be displayed.

What you will get in return for your support and funding is a window on the fashion world through photographs from the event, my hand-drawn illustrations, and even accessories and garments from the collection before anyone else gets to have them. I will also keep you posted with updates in order for you to be able to follow the evolution of the work and see the difference your contribution makes.

The Impact

My long-term goal is to increase people's awareness of the impact that fashion can have on the eco-system. Many chemicals that produce toxic waste and require higher energy consumption are used in the dyeing process and the creation of synthetic fabrics. I will do my best to research and to find the highest quality and most eco-friendly materials. We, as humans, are starting to pay more attention to the way we treat our planet and I want my work in fashion to contribute to that effort.

Other Ways You Can Help

No worries if you can't contribute financially! I thank you just for the time you have taken to view my campaign and I hope to have ignited a spark in you to pass the message on to others because it is much easier to have an impact on the world if we all work together. I hope to get many of you involved and excited about this fascinating world of fashion!

Indiegogo provides "share" tools that you can use to help me get the word out. You can copy and paste the URL (address found below the video) onto your Facebook page, other social media update, or email.

For more information about me and my collections, please visit my website www.lilamorency.com or go visit my professional Facebook page, look at the pictures I posted and click "Like"! 

I'm counting on you to help me out! A huge thanks in advance!

Merci beaucoup! Grazie mille!
story_txt:
Short Summary
Hi, I'm Lila Morency. Some of you know me
from the last Indiegogo campaign but some don't. So here's a quick intro: I'm
Canadian/American and have been living in Italy for the past 7 years, 1 of
which was spent studying the language and culture, 3 years spent studying
fashion design at the Marangoni Institute of Milan, and 3 years working for a
luxury sports brand gaining experience in this complex field. 
A little over a year ago, I was inspired
to start my own brand: Lila Morency. Last September I presented my collection,
for the first time during the Milan Fashion Week, by doing a flash mob around
the city of Milan. Thanks to the help of my campaign supporters, the event was
a success. I was happy to see how many people supported me and wanted to be
part of this adventure. With the help of those like you who believe in new talents, I
know I will be able to grow in the fashion world!
What We Need & What You Get
In order for my brand to become known, it needs lots of advertising of all sorts: magazine articles, editorials, photographers, a PR group and much more. A brand
needs the flexibility to experiment new techniques to create innovative
garments. For this to happen, I am looking for one or more big sponsors. Sponsors
who will believe in my project and see it as a long term investment in return
for a percentage on the sales. Until I find those big sponsors, I need all the
help I can get, and that's where you all come in.
For this next presentation I would like to
create an avenue for art, photography, and fashion to mix. I am aiming to present my clothes in a venue similar to a gallery where many visual art forms can be displayed.

story:
Wir sind das Team JAMM, Julian, Alicia, Marie und Maria vom SSV Zuffenhausen und SV Remshalden und erst 16 Jahre alt. Mit dem Sieg der Deutschen Rope-Skipping-Meisterschaft 2014 haben wir uns für die Weltmeisterschaft in Hong Kong qualifiziert!!

Julian und Maria haben sich zusätzlich im Einzel qualifiziert und Julian brach mit 494 Sprüngen den Europa-Rekord in 3 Minuten Speed!!

Da eine Randsportart wie die unsere finanziell nicht so sehr unterstützt wird, brauchen wir eure Hilfe. 

Nicht nur finanzielle Mittel sind uns wichtig, auch die Verbreitung unserer Seite, unseres Videos und damit unserer Sportart, liegt uns am Herzen!!

Gerne treten wir auch mit verschiedenen Shows auf Veranstaltungen auf =)

Über jegliche Form der Unterstützung freuen wir uns sehr!!

Euer Team JAMM =)

story:
STORY BEHIND KIMBERLY LANG

Hey! 

My name is Kimberly Lang. I love dancing, beautiful classy dresses, laughing and oh my good… cotton candy!!! But my passion and biggest love is designing pretty clothes for pretty women.


2 Years ago I always had to deal with the problem to find the right clothes for my daily business. So I started to design the first clothes for my label Kimberly Lang. Half a year ago I started to develop the prototypes for my first collection. I thought if I cannot find what I want, I have to do it by myself

I believe that clothes can change your world. They can change your look, your mood, make you more self-confident and can even change your whole life!

Who does not know how it feels to be a totally different person in a cozy Jean, sweatshirt and sneakers as in a nice evening dress?This has a very simple reason: “Clothes make the man!”This saying everyone knows is true. And why shouldn`t we feel so well and radiate exactly what we all are?

UNIQE – BEAUTIFUL – STRONG – FEMININE

These are just a few characteristics that apply us women.

What I love the most about dresses is that you can express so much with your style and you don`t need a reason to wear pretty clothes. You can lead your day and have open possibilities. Every day in the office has not to be a normal working day any more. It can be YOUR day.

When I think about my target audience of my designs, I think about strong and beautiful women. And this is therefore a huge audience, because we are all strong and beautiful! My fashion speaks mostly to women, who work in offices. The number of women in such jobs is increasing, but in my view there is hardly suitable offer for high-quality and expressive Fashion.

My idea about fashion is not simply earn much money. It is about to give a positive feeling. Be it a woman, who feels like a strong and beautiful women, a working person, who exercises the craft as a seamstress, which is becoming increasingly rare in Europe, to fair and good conditions or even the 3% of my turnover, which will be donated directly to social projects in many years exploited industrial countries.


The clothes I design are timeless and classy. My main competence will be well-fitting blouses, which have a longer cut because it stretches your body and makes a good shape. They also have more buttons to avoid seeing into the blouse and will have also a back folding to ensure a good shape as well at the backside and secondly classy and timeless dresses. All my clothes will be manufactured exclusively in Europe. For sure we will use as well only fabrics and colour-save fabrics from Europe.For me it is not only a normal job for me designing and sewing is an exciting craft and it is exactly what I would love to do for the rest of my life.

Each of us can do untold and let their dreams come true! My dream is to make women happy with my sustainable, high-quality designs. So please help me make my dream come true! Everything is ready and by supporting our project you will help us to fund our first collection. Please check out our rewards and pick your favourite one and please share this video to all of your friends.

Thank you sooo much!


THE FUNDING

We need $ 15.000,- to finance the start of our first collection. That means European fabrics and for European seamstresses.

So you see our clothing line will be produced exclusively in Europe and so the money will only be used for sustainable fashion. The most important thing for us is to get the craft in Europe and to offer and to produce in fair conditions instead of cheap and unfair conditions.


REWARDS



TIMELINE


SIZES



TEAM

My clothing line is funded by my savings. It runs with me as the designer, accountant and scheduler and with my business partner Guillermo Neugebauer who is my resident photographer, Web Designer and as well responsible for the whole marketing.


CONTACT US

Mail: info@kimberly-lang.com
Website: http://www.kimberly-lang.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/KimberlyLangFashion
Find us on Instagram: http://instagram.com/kimberly.lang

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

If you are unable to pledge an amount, your support is not lost.  Please tell your friends and family.  Share on Facebook, Instagram, etc.  

The more support and public knowledge, the better! :-)
