story:
Warning! This Is Not Your Average Pair of Shorts

The world doesn’t need another activewear brand.

But it does need a new pair of training shorts.

Your average pair of training shorts are plagued with problems.

 

 

In reality, the average pair of training shorts last just a few wears. Made using outdated fabric technology that absorbs sweat and heat, they cause you to overheat when active, leaving you cold and smelly when you stop.

Looking like you just came from the gym is one thing – but smelling like it? Urgh. No thanks.

Meanwhile, regular shorts companies use obsolete stitching techniques that often irritate your skin. Chafing occurs because of irritation caused by friction. Yet, traditional shorts materials get wet from sweat, bunch up and get heavier, creating more friction.

Finally, there are problems with style, functionality, and colors. Traditional training shorts are boring, resulting in a closet full of low-quality active shorts that you rarely use.

The world is ready for a new pair of training shorts.

 

Welcome to the Hi-Flex™ Training Shorts 2.0. 

These sleek shorts perform like pros, wherever your day takes you.

Hi-Flex™ Shorts are meticulously crafted with an invisible drawstring, superior waistband, sewn-in loop to hold towel/shirts during workouts, and multiple pockets: side pockets, zippered outside pocket on the back panel, and liner phone pocket (for the option with liner).

 

 

 

invisible drawstrings and superior waistbands,

sewn-in loop to hold towel/shirts during workouts,

 Zippered side pocket,

Liner phone pocket (available for the 'lined' option only),

and multiple pockets: side pockets, zippered outside pocket on the back panel, and liner phone pocket (for the option with liner).

A unique splash of color sets you apart in the gym, while the modern cut ensures freedom of movement, a flattering fit, and a sleek look. This combines to make Hi-Flex™ Training Shorts 2.0 something you can wear in fitness, urban, and outdoor environments.

Time to throw those stinky old shorts away. Your new pair of all-day shorts has arrived.

 

How Does it Work?

 

Our training shorts are made from Hi-Flex™ – a proprietary polyester/elastane blend fabric technology that offers a smooth finish, lightweight feel, freedom of movement, four-way stretch, breathability, moisture-wicking, quick-dry, wrinkle-resistant, water-resistant, stain-resistant, and anti-odor properties. 

We were determined to deliver a fabric technology that was unimaginably innovative, which is why we spent countless hours on trials and testing before this groundbreaking, state-of-the-art material was born. Unlike traditional shorts, our Hi-Flex™ shorts do not absorb sweat. Your perspiration simply evaporates through the moisture-wicking breathable fabric, keeping the shorts dry and fresh.

Our moisture-wicking fabric has two main duties: to quickly transfer sweat to the fabric's top layer, and quick dry so that your sweat doesn't soak through the fabric. Our proprietary HiFlex™ material was also strategically engineered to inhibit the growth of odor-causing bacteria. 

 

 

 

Hi-Flex™ Fabric Technology

Our fabric technology is groundbreaking.

 

 

When we set out to build all-in-one superior training shorts, we knew that we had to start from the fiber up. We, therefore, began engineering a groundbreaking fabric that could stand up to anything.

We were determined to deliver a fabric technology that was unimaginably innovative. After countless hours of trials and testing, we had our fabric – a wrinkle-free, quick-drying, odor-resistant, state-of-the-art material was born.

We called it HiFlex™, and we have used it to create our groundbreaking HiFlex™ shorts.

Wherever your day takes you, these shorts help you perform to your potential – and feel like a pro while doing it.

 

Our Beta Testers LOVE us! And You will too!

 

 

Color is The New Black

 

 

This is why our Hi-Flex™ Shorts come in a unique and versatile spectrum of colors.

In fact, we utilize principles of color psychology and ‘enclothed cognition’ in our designs. This is based on the systematic influence that clothes have on the wearer’s psychological processes.

That’s right – clothing can and does affect our psychological traits and states, as well as our performance levels.

The first step in our sampling process was deciding what kind of moods we were bringing into the collection. This was followed by choosing the colors that best represented those moods.

We then select shades of colors that are timeless and versatile; colors that can be worn anywhere, from yoga classes to deadlift platforms to the beach.

Burgundy – This is the color for the ambitious trailblazer. Pave the way with this rich, luxurious shade.

Pastel Blue – Say goodbye to the blues with this fresh shade. This soft color gives you a clean slate, ready to start a new chapter.

Black – Black is still a classic. Perfect for those days when you want to feel powerful, sleek and stealthy

Sage Green –  Sage green is the color of wisdom and experience. Breakaway from old habits and dive head first into new growth with this earthy color.

Royal Yellow –  Embrace clarity with open arms thanks to this brilliant royal yellow. Even on the most dreary days, you'll get a fresh burst of optimism once you put on your favourite yellow gear.

 

Size & Fit

Hi-Flex™ Shorts are designed and sized to fit you perfectly. We know that everybody is different, which is why our shorts come in 5” or 7”, and with lined or unlined options.

 

Lined styles come with a superior built-in liner that acts as a compressive underlayer – something that’s a must for go-hard activities (such as HIIT). The majority of the time, you won’t need to wear underwear underneath. Our liners also come with a built-in phone pocket to keep your phone bounce-free during workouts.

Unlined styles are exactly what the name suggests – without a built-in liner. They’re perfect for when you’d rather customize your base layer, or for those days when you don’t need the extra compression. Unlined styles are also perfect everyday shorts for the home, beach and bar!

Choose the style that best fits your activities – or go for one of each!

 

Shorts Length - 5" OR 7" 

You can find just about any length of men’s training shorts, but 5” and 7” lengths are the most common.

What you choose really comes down to personal preference. A general guideline is that your shorts should end about 1” to 3” above the knee. You should factor in your height as well, as 5” shorts will end differently on you if you’re 5’10” compared to if you are 6’4”.

 

 

Please refer to the size chart for shorts measurements by size. Our shorts are true to size with a tailored slim cut. Order one size up for a more relaxed fit.

 

Performance Guarantee

At Centric, we always stand behind all our products and work with the best manufacturers and technology so that your gear will perform as designed, fully functional, and defect-free.

In the unlikely case that your products have a manufacturing defect in the materials or workmanship, you can contact us at support@centricwear.net within 60 days of discovering the issue. We will respond as quickly as possible and do all that we can to make sure that your Centric gear performs as it should.

*Note that this warranty does not cover damage due to normal wear and tear, or gear that has been damaged due to environmental causes.

Process 

We knew that only the best would do, so we spent months looking for the best factories around the world.

After searching high and low, we carefully selected only the best. All of our manufacturing facilities are fair-wage certified workplaces that take pride in providing the highest quality of workmanship available.

We also expect each of our manufacturing partners to uphold the highest quality standards through continuous QC checks and best practices.

At Centric, we want to be trend setters when it comes to quality and technology. That’s why we routinely work with each of our facilities to update or upgrade machinery and processes to make sure you get the quality and performance you need from our gear.

 

Production Timeline 

 

About Centric

Known for their development of high-performance proprietary fabrics and an unabashed approach to modern design and use of color, Centric produces functional sportswear engineered for the exceptional.

The heart is the center of every human being. To us, Centric means ‘from-the-heart.

We pour our heart into everything we create for you. We pay attention to the smallest details, from the fiber in our fabrics to the stitching in every seam.  

The ‘C’ that is integral to the Centric Inﬁnity Pulse logo represents the creator and customer. In this space, there are inﬁnite possibilities of creation for you and every customer. We are nothing without you – this is why we will always strive to design and create the best apparel to help you reach your goals.

Our team is committed to bringing results to you. We are experts in our fields whether it's engineering, high fashion, marketing or operations.

 

Giveback & Sustainability

For us, sustainability starts with us creating goods that should last you a lifetime.

But we won’t stop there.

We are committed to reducing our resource consumption and requiring fair-wage certification from our manufacturing partners. Sustainability is close to our hearts and it isn’t just about what we can do today – it is about the future. We work hard to make decisions that focus on creating a future that is better, cleaner, and more vibrant than today.

 

From beginning to end, we are passionate about making this world a better place. We are not perfect, but we are always working to improve – through our recycling initiatives, our raw resource consumption, and our long-lasting high-quality activewear.

Why Indiegogo? 

We want to share our most innovative ideas with the fast-growing like-minded Indiegogo community.

The funds we raise here will go toward manufacturing and also help us to design future groundbreaking products. We wouldn’t be here without the loyal support of our backers. Your support fills us with joy and motivation to continue to innovate.

We launch our most innovative lab projects on Indiegogo to share them with you first. The funds we raise here go toward manufacturing and also help us continue to design amazing products for the future.

We wouldn’t be here without the loyal support of our customers. It is your support, feedback, and encouragement that have brought us to this point. We are excited to continue to grow together.

We will respond as quickly as possible and do all that we can to make sure that your Centric gear performs as it should.*Note that this warranty does not cover damage due to normal wear and tear, or gear that has been damaged due to environmental causes.Process We knew that only the best would do, so we spent months looking for the best factories around the world.After searching high and low, we carefully selected only the best. All of our manufacturing facilities are fair-wage certified workplaces that take pride in providing the highest quality of workmanship available.We also expect each of our manufacturing partners to uphold the highest quality standards through continuous QC checks and best practices.At Centric, we want to be trend setters when it comes to quality and technology. That’s why we routinely work with each of our facilities to update or upgrade machinery and processes to make sure you get the quality and performance you need from our gear. Production Timeline  About CentricKnown for their development of high-performance proprietary fabrics and an unabashed approach to modern design and use of color, Centric produces functional sportswear engineered for the exceptional.The heart is the center of every human being. To us, Centric means ‘from-the-heart.We pour our heart into everything we create for you. We pay attention to the smallest details, from the fiber in our fabrics to the stitching in every seam.  The ‘C’ that is integral to the Centric Inﬁnity Pulse logo represents the creator and customer. In this space, there are inﬁnite possibilities of creation for you and every customer. We are nothing without you – this is why we will always strive to design and create the best apparel to help you reach your goals.Our team is committed to bringing results to you. We are experts in our fields whether it's engineering, high fashion, marketing or operations. Giveback & SustainabilityFor us, sustainability starts with us creating goods that should last you a lifetime.But we won’t stop there.We are committed to reducing our resource consumption and requiring fair-wage certification from our manufacturing partners. Sustainability is close to our hearts and it isn’t just about what we can do today – it is about the future. We work hard to make decisions that focus on creating a future that is better, cleaner, and more vibrant than today. From beginning to end, we are passionate about making this world a better place. We are not perfect, but we are always working to improve – through our recycling initiatives, our raw resource consumption, and our long-lasting high-quality activewear.Why Indiegogo? We want to share our most innovative ideas with the fast-growing like-minded Indiegogo community.The funds we raise here will go toward manufacturing and also help us to design future groundbreaking products. We wouldn’t be here without the loyal support of our backers. Your support fills us with joy and motivation to continue to innovate.We launch our most innovative lab projects on Indiegogo to share them with you first. The funds we raise here go toward manufacturing and also help us continue to design amazing products for the future.We wouldn’t be here without the loyal support of our customers. It is your support, feedback, and encouragement that have brought us to this point. We are excited to continue to grow together.

story:
Introducing Nautic Nails

Artificial fingernails allow women the ability to achieve the manicure of their dreams.  Women frustrated with the length or shape of their natural nails use the versatility of artificial nails to achieve the look they desire.  This simple invention has inspired many styles and nail art designs enabling the nail care and salon market to grow into a multi-billion dollar industry.

Nail fashion is constantly changing because women are continuously looking for new and exciting trends to enjoy!  Look no further!  Hello, I am Traska French-Artis inventor of Nautic Nails.  My twin sister Chaska French-Jackson and I are introducing Nautic Nails the most exciting and innovative patented nail art design that has ever entered the nail market.

What are Nautic Nails?

Nautic Nails are artificial fingernails with a built in cavity containing liquid, microbeads, and glitter.  The microbeads and glitter float around in the liquid creating a snow globe effect within the nail.  This is the only nail design in the world with the ability to move!

I invented Nautic Nails one ordinary day in 2004.  I thought to myself wouldn't it be cool if there were nails filled with liquid and glitter and the glitter could float in them?  Not one to be overly interested in artificial nails, I thought I will tell some other ladies and see if they agree.  The next day I talked to some of my female friends and my twin Chaska, and they thought the idea was great!  So, I set out to create a prototype.  After many failed attempts, long hours of breathing in sickening super glue fumes, aching fingers, and several trips to the hobby store, I did it.  I created a fully functional prototype that even the most savvy nail tech can not duplicate.  I immediately hired a patent lawyer and fought six long years to win a patent (U.S. Patent No. 7,856,993). Together Chaska and I attended tradeshows test marketing the product and the response was overwhelmingly positive.  We knew we had a winner!   We needed to mass produce this product and do it quickly, because many dupes and imitators are already trying and have infringed on my idea.  But as they say imitation is the best form of flattery.  Luckily, my patent has caused them to back off.

The Problem and How You Can Help

Although many women and companies all over the world have wanted to buy Nautic Nails,  we have been unable to meet demand because we can only make orders by hand.  We are in need of a mold that can mass produce the nails, but the mold is very expensive.  That is why we need your help!   With your contributions and orders we will be able to eliminate this obstacle to making our dream come true.

We have already partnered with Nails 2000 International's Philip Vo (http://www.nails2000.com).  He has agreed to use his many injection molding machines to mass produce the nails for us IF we can provide the necessary money to get the mold made.

Nails 2000 International has 20 injection molding machines.

Nails 2000 International is a highly experienced California and U.S. based manufacturer and distributor of nail care and salon accessories since 1984.Their experience in the salon industry has been since 1975. Their company has sold over an estimated four billion nail tips.

With the expertise of Philip Vo and your support we will be able to realize our vision and bring a great product to the marketplace!  So, join us on our journey and be a part of something really unique and special!

The Nautic Nails Retail Collection 

R U Sweet?

R U Luscious?

 

R U Passionate?

 

R U Sexy?

R U Electric?

R U Energetic?

 

 

Thank you so much for your support!!!

story:
Help Fund The L&P Vintage Rebel Photo Shoot!



THE DUO 

Lex and Pooch met on the campus of the University of Central Florida. Both were involved in a modeling organization that allowed them to explore fashion and personal style. Through their mutual love of fashion and vintage, Lex and Pooch created a styling company ( Lex&Pooch Styling Co.) that would bring their unique views on fashion to the public. 

Founded in 2011, Lex&Pooch is a styling company that focuses on redefining fashion.  With focuses on sex appeal, femininity and authenticity, Lex&Pooch searches to bring out the fashion maven in all of their clients.

By providing vintage fashion, style tips and expressing ideas of empowerment, Lex&Pooch Styling Co. strives to fully embody the idea that “It’s not just style, but a LIFEstyle”


THE VINTAGE REBEL MISSION

Lex&Pooch Styling Co. has created a collection of unique vintage pieces with the Vintage Rebel Collection.

Each piece within the collection is hand-picked, reconstructed and crafted to embody the perfect mix of vintage essence and rebellious style.

These stylish pieces are not for the faint of heart! But each piece of Vintage Rebel clothing represents the ability to rebel against the norm and be a truly unique individual.


THE LOOKBOOK

We have compiled a truly awesome collection of clothing that we are ready to show the world.  With almost a year’s worth of amazing merchandise complied and altered for the Vintage Rebel Collection, we are now ready to present our merchandise to the public.

Our 2014 Look Book will feature clothing from the Vintage Rebel collection and will be published both physical and digitally.


BECOME A VINTAGE REBEL!

By contributing to our campaign you will be helping us to cover the costs of the crew hired to work with us the day of the shoot, printing of the physical look book and ensuring that all contributors are properly compensated.

The Vintage Rebel Collection is our first in what we hope to be first of many collections we create aimed at making fashion more personal for the wearer.  The Vintage Rebel Collection is more than a line of clothing. It is a movement of young, brave and unique individuals who won’t take ‘no’ for an answer and refuse to settle for anything less than extraordinary in their lives.

Our love for all things fashion has allowed us to get to this point and we would love for you to join us on our journey in spreading the word about the #VintageRebel Movement.

We truly appreciate all your support as we continue to build the Vintage Rebel brand! #VintageRebel       #L&PLookBook   www.lexandpooch.com


OTHER WAYS TO BECOME A REBEL!

We understand that some of you might not be in a position to support the vintage rebel movement at the time. Lucky for you, there are plenty of ways that you can still help us reach our goal! Here’s how YOU can help:

·  Help spread the #VintageRebel Movement!- check out all of the sharing tools right under the video on this campaign page.

·  Like, Comment and Favorite our social media posts! – this helps us to be seen more on platforms like Facebook, Twitter and Instagram.

·  Check out our YouTube Channel! – We will be uploading progress videos throughout this process to keep our contributors updated

·  Help us get connected! If you know any business or companies who may be interested in our products, send us a message and we’ll check it out.

story:
About the Project

This project came out of a discussion on Scubaboard.com. After purchasing the extremely popular DRIS1000 Flashlight I began to look for a good way to carry it with me underwater while scuba diving. When I couldn't find anything on the market to suit my needs I decided to create a design myself. 

 

 

Please note all images are computer generated. Actual product may show slight variations due to construciton.

Using scubaboard.com to get feedback on my idea, we evolved to this final design. You can see the original discussion that led to this design here: http://www.scubaboard.com/forums/lights/429772-there-any-interest-goodman-style-handle-dris-1000-500-lights.html

As a product designer I put to use my skills in design, manufacturing and sourcing to created a versatile handle that will fit more that just the DRIS1000 light and uses off the shelf stainless steel hardware so that you can replace the hardware if necessary yourself. 

Fits flashlight diameter 1" to 1.5" with existing hardware. However you may want shorter bolts for a 1" diameter flashlight.

If you purchase longer bolts (3" length) the handle will fit flashlight diameters up to 2"

Since this is a very small run project to a very specific market I had to get creative with the manufacturing. I utilized manufacturing techniques that help to control costs and the final product will be manufactured overseas.

What I Need & What You Get

My original goal in this project is to get together a group of buyers so that I can make this handle at a low cost and I can get a couple of them for my own use. To try and make just one handle would not be cost effective. By making 100pcs I am able to get the individual unit price down.

By supporting this project you will receive 1 goodman handle of my design. It is manufactured from anodized aluminum and stainless steel hardware with stainless steel nylon insert locknuts.

 

The cost of the project reflects the actual cost of manufacture and shipping to me from the overseas manufacturer as well as a very small profit to help reimburse me for the time spent designing and sourcing this project. 

*Edit* I accidentally chose flexible funding on this campaign so it will proceed whether or not the full funding amount is reached. I will place the order with the factory towards the end of the campaign. *Edit*

After the close of the project it will take approx. 30days to produce the handles and begin shipping them.

Please donate/pre-order if you think this will work for you. Please spread the word to your friends to help us reach our goal so we can produce the design.

story:
Stephanie Quirk is currently a full-time teacher of Visual Arts at a Sydney High school. She is an artist, a natural educator, explorer, and adventurer and is excited about merging these passions in her life-long dream - climbing Mount Everest! Alongside this, she has a black belt in Shinbudo Martial Arts, has visited China where she studied under Shaolin Monks for 4 months in a remote monastery, climbed Mount Kilimanjaro in Tanzania, undergone a mountaineering course in America and next week is walking from Sydney to Newcastle in a Santa outfit. 

The AIN'T NOTHIN GONNA BREAK MY STRIDE  campaign is a rally-cry. It is a call to anyone who has a dream and believes in themselves to make it a reality. It is important to me because I think with the power of self-belief and conviction, no matter how far-out your dream may seem, it is absolutely possible. 

But conviction is only a part of the equation. Action, support, trial and error and bold moves are all steps required to move towards realising your dream. Your support in achieving my dreams  is a key element in building a foundation of mental fortitude, social support, and financial backing that will help me achieve my biggest goal yet, to climb the highest mountain in the world. 

This goal cannot be taken lightly, The Everest environment has jet streams that blow all year and winds can reach 321km per hour, temperatures drop to -60°  and oxygen levels at the pointy end are 66% less than sea level. With your funding & support, I will be able to buy specific mountain equipment, which in a very real way will be aiding my survival on the mountain.  In extreme cold weather, high altitude double boots for prevent frostbite and expedition down outer layers insulate body temperature. These items of clothing are fundamental to self care on the mountain, allowing me to function safely when traversing up and down.

 

What We Need & What You Get

Gear lists for expeditions are often exhaustive, but the items that I require for Everest are the same for many of the peaks that I will climb in the lead up to the big mountain. Aconcagua, is my second peak which I am attempting in January. It is the highest mountain outside of the Himalayas, and although not technical (no steel ladder crevasse crossings yet) it is oh so high, standing at 6,961 meters and very cold at -15° . The gear I invest in now will be with me on Aconcagua and serve me the following peaks until I get to the roof of the world! 

 

Here is a break down;

Each item is essential on the mountain and will get me one step closer to the top! 

 

Risks & Challenges

There is an uphill road ahead of me, and it is not just the mountain slope. I have to get proficient at skills and techniques that will ensure my safety on ice, snow and on metal ladders across crevasses. I have to raise $109K to climb peaks such as Mount Denali in Alaska and Mount Cho-Oyo Tibet that are requirements to participate in an expedition such as Everest. To get my training underway, I have bought a one-way ticket and am making a bee line to the French Alps for a year to hone my skills in an ideal glaciated environment. I have teamed up with the Sponsorship Consultants, an outfit who connect athletes and companies together in a fruitful and mutually valuable relationship, which will enable dreams like this to come to actulisation. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

You can help contribute to this campaign clicking on the donate button - if enough people chip in $10 this dream can launch off the ground!

Other ways you can help is by getting the word out and making noise about DREAMS and making them happen! Tell people about the crazy tall chick who has quit her job to go climb Everest. Share to your networks, tell your mate at work, post, tweet, snap, email! It would help me immensely!

story:
Necksound is a smart wireless wearable that revolutionizes the experience of listening to music and doing sport.

It is a necklace-shaped audio device made with hypoallergenic silicone, with a modern and sporty design that provides top quality sound. Listen to music or talk on the phone while doing any type of physical activity without the need for headphones. Necksound is the perfect wearable to enjoy your private soundscape without being isolated from the world that surrounds you.

Unlike other conventional headphones and hands-free devices, Necksound offers a different, safer and functional alternative. It’s the only device of its kind that combines all essential features.

A couple of years ago, Alvaro, current CEO of Necksound, went out for a run as part of his daily routine. As always he was listening to music through his headphones, so focused that he didn’t hear a car approaching. Fortunately the driver of the car was able to stop quickly and avoided a potentially tragic situation. After taking stock, Alvaro kept on running, but he decided to remove his headphones and place them around his neck. At that moment he realized that he could listen to music without being isolated from the world around him.

That sense of security, combined with the convenience of not having anything pressing against his ears led him to rethink how people listen to music while participating in any type of physical activity. Thus, Necksound was born. After two long years of perseverance, hard work and great enthusiasm, we have created this wearable necklace-shaped audio device: wireless, lightweight, comfortable and beautifully designed.

1. It validates a Dream/Idea/Concept

Having an idea is one thing. Proving that the idea can make a profit is something different. Crowdfunding provides a great opportunity to see where the market stands and how willing people would be to spend money on the product.

2. Global outreach

This validation is a global one. You are making a pitch to the whole world.

3. Real-time Feedback

So now the whole world is listening. They are telling you what they enjoy or don’t like about the product. Best of all, this feedback can be reviewed in real-time.

We have already raised €41,307 through Kickstarter and now we are getting into production. But first we offer you the option of becoming a backer and get your own Necksound before it is launched to the global market.

We want you to be part of our dream and take with you the next big step in headphone tech. With Necksound we will create a more secure world and we will all be able to enjoy music without putting ourselves at risk.

We are almost ready to launch. We have suppliers. We have approved budgets. We have the first prototypes. But we need funding to grow and to mass-produce Necksound. So now the only thing we need is your pledge and support, Backer. Be a #necksounder. Help us to make a great piece of technology that seamlessly merges your active lifestyle with your favorite music.

Ergonomic

Hypoallergenic silicone coated. Necksound is made from a lightweight malleable material that is both dust and sweat resistant.

Adjustable

An adjustable fastening to better adapt to all kinds of physical attributes. Choose your size for a perfect fit.

Intuitive

Intuitive and user-friendly. Control phone calls, volume and skip songs with the touch of a button.

Functional

Magnetic attachment system. Its magnetic attachment system fixes it to your t-shirt which stops the device bouncing around during physical activity, especially activity which requires extreme movements.

It’s safer. Helps avoid accidents

The best headphones often block out any surrounding noise so you can zone out with your favorite tunes. But that same feature can be a lethal one for pedestrians, cyclists and runners. There are many studies that demonstrate a worrying increase in deaths caused by the use of headphones. One of example is from research led by Richard Lichenstein from the University of Maryland School of Medicine. He concluded that serious injuries to pedestrians listening to headphones has more than tripled in six years. Some more statistics from this research are shown below:

It helps prevent irreversible hearing loss

Using headphones is recommended neither for safety reasons nor for health reasons. Cranking up the tunes today may lead to the inability to hear them tomorrow, according the World Health Organization (WHO). The WHO has repeatedly warned that listening to music with headphones at high volume results in a negative impact on the auditory system and can even lead to a serious risk of irreversible hearing loss.

It fixes securely. No bouncing around

Its magnetic attachment system fixes Necksound to your t-shirt and stops the device moving around when practicing any kind of sport, especially those that require extreme movements.

A stand-alone player. You can leave your phone at home

No need to carry your phone with you to enjoy your favorite music thanks to its 4GB internal memory which stores up to 1000 songs.

Custom designed directional stereo speakers

Necksound speakers are designed to direct high quality sound to your ears. Enjoy a premium audio experience and maintain your privacy without blocking your ears, or disturbing others with loud music. If you prefer complete privacy you can always connect your headphones.

Flexible. Coated with non-rigid, hypoallergenic silicone

Necksound is lightweight,  malleable and resistant to dust and sweat.

 

Place Necksound around your neck and easily adjust it to size. For safety, Necksound can be completely opened up for easy removal. Fix it to your t-shirt using the magnet behind it or you can simply wear it freely. Pair Necksound to a mobile device through Bluetooth and control its features using the buttons on the necklace. If you do not want to carry your mobile phone with you, you can still enjoy hours of your favorite music from its 4GB of internal stand-alone player. You are now set to listen to your favorite music or to make and receive calls.

You will have full control of your music and calls, feeling completely free. Listen to your favorite music without losing important ambient noises. Its integrated noise-canceling microphone allows you to take and make calls even in the noisiest environments. Necksound is easily rechargeable via a USB port or its independent charger.

In order to remove Necksound, hold it and gently slide the magnet you have fixed to your t-shirt.

Designed for daily use to fit your lifestyle, Necksound is incredibly comfortable, whether you are at work, running, cycling, or working out. It is a smart wireless wearable that provides freedom of movement, maximum comfort and above all, greater safety.

Necksound revolutionizes the experience of listening to music and doing sport.

Put simply - we are a group of people passionate about music and sport. And we all have the same dream: to make Necksound a reality. We need you to share our dream and would like you to stay with us at every step of this journey. We will listen to and learn from you during this campaign, so please jump on board and join us.

Necksound SL has spent two years researching and developing this smart necklace. In late 2015, we decided to prioritize to designing the smallest size device possible, so we proceeded to recreate it in 3D.

We validated the different sizes and the most suitable type of material. We made the molds in different sizes to verify that the device electronics fitted properly. Now we have our first prototypes. We have travelled to Mexico to perfect them, to discuss manufacturing details and define the production plan.
story_txt: Necksound is a smart wireless wearable that revolutionizes the experience of listening to music and doing sport.It is a necklace-shaped audio device made with hypoallergenic silicone, with a modern and sporty design that provides top quality sound. Listen to music or talk on the phone while doing any type of physical activity without the need for headphones. Necksound is the perfect wearable to enjoy your private soundscape without being isolated from the world that surrounds you.Unlike other conventional headphones and hands-free devices, Necksound offers a different, safer and functional alternative. It’s the only device of its kind that combines all essential features.A couple of years ago, Alvaro, current CEO of Necksound, went out for a run as part of his daily routine. As always he was listening to music through his headphones, so focused that he didn’t hear a car approaching. Fortunately the driver of the car was able to stop quickly and avoided a potentially tragic situation. After taking stock, Alvaro kept on running, but he decided to remove his headphones and place them around his neck. At that moment he realized that he could listen to music without being isolated from the world around him.That sense of security, combined with the convenience of not having anything pressing against his ears led him to rethink how people listen to music while participating in any type of physical activity. Thus, Necksound was born. After two long years of perseverance, hard work and great enthusiasm, we have created this wearable necklace-shaped audio device: wireless, lightweight, comfortable and beautifully designed.1. It validates a Dream/Idea/ConceptHaving an idea is one thing. Proving that the idea can make a profit is something different. Crowdfunding provides a great opportunity to see where the market stands and how willing people would be to spend money on the product.2. Global outreachThis validation is a global one. You are making a pitch to the whole world.3. Real-time FeedbackSo now the whole world is listening. They are telling you what they enjoy or don’t like about the product. Best of all, this feedback can be reviewed in real-time.We have already raised €41,307 through Kickstarter and now we are getting into production. But first we offer you the option of becoming a backer and get your own Necksound before it is launched to the global market.We want you to be part of our dream and take with you the next big step in headphone tech. With Necksound we will create a more secure world and we will all be able to enjoy music without putting ourselves at risk.We are almost ready to launch. We have suppliers. We have approved budgets. We have the first prototypes. But we need funding to grow and to mass-produce Necksound. So now the only thing we need is your pledge and support, Backer. Be a #necksounder. story:
Our team was working on this project for almost 2 years before the final prototype was ready and fully tested. It uses a gyro sensor to display time and save power. So it will light up only when you need to display time. After tests we chosen the most powerful and compact phone battery, IN-16 Nixie tubes were the most stable working tubes. We understand that this technologies are complicated and this tubes are really hard to find. We decided to provide a lifetime warranty for watch and all it's components. And you can enjoy the Nixie tubes really warm and unusual shine and it's design will help you stand out of the crowd.

NIWA Nixie tube watches has two very distinctive features that are bound to impress who love innovative and eye-catching watches. First, the NIWA watch’s unusual and eye-catching look sets it apart from the thousands of other watches available in the market currently. Designed using high quality and reliable materials the NIWA watch takes the steampunk watch look to a whole new level. Secondly, the nixie tubes or old cathode display brings back the much-loved retro technology from the 70’s and 80’s.

AVAILABLE IN 2 COLOURS

Key Specs

 Measures 55mm diameter round watch

 Available in grey and black colours anodized cases machined from aircraft aluminium

 24mm watch straps

 Docking station for charging (USB powered)

 2 x IN-16 Nixie tubes

 2 x IV-15 tubes

 Lifetime warranty for Nixie tubes


 

You will receive:

1 NIWA Nixie watch

Dock station with stand

Extra 2 IN 16  tubes

Magnet for reed switches to set up time

Power USB cable

Wood box

Avaliable straps

You can choose one of the following straps together with your NIWA Nixie watch. Silicone, metal and leather.

NIWA Nixie watch shows time only when you want to. Usually you need to charge your watch each 4-6 days depending on how often you use it. Charging takes 3 hours.

NIWA Nixie watch has 2 reed switches and are not visible. You need a magnet to set up time and format. 

Also along with NIWA Nixie watch you can choose a combo-NIWA Nixie watch (grey or black) and NIWA Nixie clock in oak and brass case.

Also all watches ordered via Indiegogo will get an engraving on a back lid with your pledge number

story: It is our pleasure to inform you that ElSo has received an investment of an undisclosed amount of money to move forward with our manufacturing and distribution. As a result, we at ElSo have removed the our campaign as instructed by the investment company. As promised, all pledges made thus far will be honored. We will continue to provide frequent updates to our contributors.  If you have any questions or concerns, please contact us via the contact page on ElSo’s website. If you wish to receive a refund for you contribution, you will be refunded at the end of the campaign, as Indiegogo won’t allow us to refund during the campaign.  Thank you for supporting Double Impact Performance Socks.

story:
Our Story

BSL also known as Brown Skin Lady is a family collaborative of two generations of women (Zakiyah, Anisah, Inayah, Aliyah, and Khalima) out of the nation of Brooklyn. We have combined our many talents of fashion, makeup artistry, jewelry making and culinary arts to host our very first showcase, the BSL Pop-up shop. 

We are Black women who strive to make a dramatic entrance with our African Inspired designs on the fashion scene. Your contributions will help us to purchase our materials such as fabric and beads,  machinery such as sewing machines and sewing sergers as well as packaging costs. 

For your contributions, we would like to say thank you with the several perks we've provided. We are urging you to get the word out and make some noise about the upcoming BSL Pop-up shop and the funding we need to make it happen. The BSL Pop up shop will include clutches, skirts, earrings, necklaces, make-overs and culinary treats and will take place October 11, 2014. With your funding, we can finally step out and share our innovative and chic designs with the masses.

We are Black women who strive to make a dramatic entrance with our African Inspired designs on the fashion scene. Your contributions will help us to purchase our materials such as fabric and beads,  machinery such as sewing machines and sewing sergers as well as packaging costs.

The BSL Pop up shop will include clutches, skirts, earrings, necklaces, make-overs and culinary treats and will take place October 11, 2014. With your funding, we can finally step out and share our innovative and chic designs with the masses.

story:
Short Summary

Javascript Ninja?  Prove it.  Help us secure it and get your own subdomain for life.

The javascript.ninja domain is available, and we'd like to purchase it to share amongst other developers via sub-domaining! Advertise your sick JS skills with a domain like:

http://[yourname].javascript.ninja/


What We Need

We need: $1500 to cover the costs of server, development, and primary domain purchasing.


What You Get

A free [yourname].javascript.ninja domain!

Javascript Ninja SWAG


What happens Next?

Once fully funded, development will continue (already started).  When development is complete for the automated sub-domain registration and hosting service setup, We will open the site up to our contributors for use as "beta".  Following a rigorous beta testing phase, we will open to the public for registration at $5 per year per subdomain.  Hosting for a minimal site will be included*


What if you don't get all the funding?

Have you ever heard "try, try again"
If we don't succeed with funding on the first round, we will re-open the crowd-source funding option.  Don't worry, we aren't slowing down on development or getting the service live, we're just going to keep crowd-source open to recoup the cost of going live.  All the benefits of helping via crowd-sourcing will be available until the goal of 1500$ is reached.

Can i help in a more direct way?

Sure, if you'd like to join the project as a developer or customer service representative, We will be looking for members or the team closer to launch.

story:
Thanks for looking at my project 

remember the dead clothing was formed in the memory of my late friend Paul Cook who tragically passed away in 2013.

The reason that I need to raise £500 is to take my dream of owning my own clothing company to the next level.  I want to take my idea and make it a success using high quality materials and bold designs. 

please see a copy of the designs below. any feedback would be greatly accepted 



The main use of the funds will to have the garments printed.  I currently have 2 designs ready to go to print for our first release. The first being a custom designed mandala and the second being a skull . Both being bold striking designs that will catch every ones eye.

Secondly I will be using some of the funds to set up a online marketing campaign to help spread the word about remember the dead clothing. I will be using facebook, Twitter and Instagram to promote the company. 

We will also be using the internet to sell our products. Currently we are in the process of setting up a big cartel shop to be our main outlet. We are also in discussions with a number of local shops who are willing to stock our products.


if you would like to have a look at our online store please follow the link below 

www.rememberthedead.bigcartel.com

thank you for your time and Please help me to get my dream off the ground. 

Thanks 

chris harvey

story:
DripShip's campaign in 10 seconds (read below):

 

Why Should I contribute?

If you like T-Shirts (you're a fan): We're building a massive collection of one of kind tees, from bands, designers & businesses based all over the World. And, your contribution goes towards helping build our company while you get some wearable (one of kind) perks of your own.
Fans, check out some photos of your available Perks & Rewards right here!

If you sell T-Shirts (you're a client): Everytime an order comes in from your custom sales page (or website), we print, ship & manage your t-shirt orders for you. Why do we do this? So you can spend less energy shipping out shirts and managing orders (we give you more time to do what you love). AND...So you can make even more money per shirt sale, you'll make average of $5-$10 USD in net profit, per sale (which is way higher than any other online shirt distribution shop around).

Clients, get started today:
- For $200 you can submit two (2) designs to us today (50% off our normal pricing).
- For $400 you can have a custom design made for you by our design team.
- For $480 you can submit six (6) designs to us for sale (a 60% savings)

 

What if you don't reach your $30,000 goal?

Every dollar we earn goes straight towards our goals. Whether we go above $30,000 or not, we'll be able to achieve some awesome things and you'll be rewarded either way! If you like what we're doing, please contribute today!
Check out our goals here!

 

I have a question, who should I ask?

First thing first, read the rest of our campaign below, because you'll probably learn a lot about us. Secondly, check out our FAQ section of this campaign, it may help answer some of your basic questions...And If that didn't help you, please feel free to email us directly at: contact@dripship.net OR, fill out our online contact form.

 

 

Hello, we're the founders of DripShip (from left to right - Chais Meyer, Shawna Meyer & Aaron Timmens).  At DripShip we take our love for t-shirts & customer service and channel it into the highest quality clothing we can produce for you. We're very proud of our beautiful prints on our quality apparel, but we're even more proud that our company revolves around you.

 

Who are we currently working with?

  • Independent Artists - who prefer to create artwork instead of spending their time shipping orders out to their fans.

  • Small Businesses - who like to spend their time doing what they choose to make money, rather than worrying about managing their t-shirt inventory.

  • Musicians - who want to use their spare cash for touring the globe instead of paying thousands of dollars on upfront clothing costs.

  • And You - even if you're not one of the above three, but you'd like make some money from your own shirt line, we'd love to help you out.

 

What do we do?

For shirt fans: We give you an outlet where you can purchase hundreds of totally unique shirt designs (on high quality clothing) that were created by businesses, bands and artists all around the world, at one online shop (it's almost ready for you to come by and visit).

For our clients: We help you run your own clothing line without requiring thousands of dollars in upfront costs, hassling with managing your inventory, dealing with collecting payments, or spending your personal time shipping out orders.

Every time one of your shirts sell, you'll be making some of the highest profits in the industry, without having to be directly involved in the process (Your profits will range between $3 - $10 per shirt sale, depending on what you choose to sell your shirts for).

To get started, we print your artwork (brand identity, custom designs or fan wear) onto our select & quality apparel. After we print your artwork on the shirt styles you chose, you get to select at least one of our exclusive clothing models to represent and wear your apparel.  And yes, you will then be sent professional quality photographs of your threads, which you can then use to promote your wear however you choose.

 

Here's one of our models now (say "hello" to Jordan):

 

Our current printing process (which embeds the ink into the fabric for a super soft feel) is limited to the color of fabric we can print on. So, in order to maintain a consistent quality across the board, we need to upgrade our printing technology...which is one of our core goals: to purchase a printer. 

 

Our Reasons & Goals for this indiegogo campaign:

#1) To upgrade our printing technology, which will allow us to speed up our printing process, and give you more customization options for your designs & overall self-branding. The printer upgrade we're looking at costs around $26,000.00! 

#2) We need to create a technology tunnel (A.K.A hiring our own developer to do some super geeky stuff) which will allow your products to be listed for sale on any website domain that you choose. And, we'll still manage all the payment stuff to make your life easier! ;)

#3) Be able to purchase large quantities of our high end apparel, making every shirt you buy from us the lowest pricing that we can get. This will also allow the printing & shipping process to have a faster turnaround than ever before. And yes, your fans will fall even more in love with your brand, with every single purchase.

 

Even More Goals:

If we go over our initial indiegogo goal of $30,000 we’ll be able to do even more. Such as:

  • CLIENTS & FANS: We'll be offering eco-friendly & American-made clothing for those that prefer to only buy clothing that supports american workers and fabric that has been organically processed from start to finish.

  • CLIENTS & FANS: We'll be offering dozens more clothing options and colors to choose from. Including different styles of hoodies, sweatshirts, v-necks, long sleeve shirts, a variety of tank tops and more trendy shirt styles to our line-up of shirt options. Not to mention all the latest trends in colors (ie. neon colors, mint, coral, heather fabrics, burnouts and more).

  • CLIENTS & FANS: Help people in need by putting a shirt on the back of those that need it most: foster kids, individuals in homeless shelters, battered women. Every time one of our client's shirts is purchased, we will give a shirt away to someone in need.

  • CLIENTS & FANS: Setup an international distribution location (potentially in Thailand) in order to save big money on shipping costs. The average international shipping fee out of the USA is $11 to $12 per shipment. Out of a location like Thailand shipping internationally (almost anywhere in the World) only costs $3 to $5 per shipment!

  • CLIENTS: We'll set up real-time commission stats and notifications for clients that are using us to manage their sales. Specifically, notifications will be sent to you via SMS &/or Email every time your shirt is sold!

  • CLIENTS: Overall custom branding options like custom clothing labels inside the shirt, custom branding for the outside of the packing going to your customers & custom email notifications sent from your brand/organization.

 

Why should I help fund this campaign?

Fans: When you help fund our project, you'll not only get exclusive access to our sweet rewards listed to the right, but you'll also help us make our clothing cheaper for you, we'll provide you with more shirt options/styles to choose from and you'll even help to make the overall shipping costs as low as possible (keeping your wallets fatter while wearing clothes that you love)!

Clients: When you help us reach our goals, you'll have more customization options for your brand/identity and over clothing line, you'll help us make our upfront clothing costs even cheaper (which means you'll sell more shirts than before) and you'll be given an opportunity to pass along the business aspects of printing & shipping your shirts to a company that you can trust...A.K.A DripShip!

 

 

Every single dollar we get from this indiegogo will be used to complete our goals and make our company even more awesome for you.

When we reach $30,000, we'll be able to start the process of upgrading DripShip...BUT, we'd like to surpass our core goal, so that we can help make you more successful and make even bigger changes in this world, thanks to you!

 

 

Need a visual of our rewards? We don't blame you, we'd want to see what we were getting as a return for our donation as well!

Note: Not all the reward tiers are represented.  

 

 

 

 

 

 

The majority of our set was made out of cardboard with 1x2’s and 2x4’s acting as support.  

#1) We printed vinyl for decorative elements, such as the deer head you see in the first room, the fireplace, the lamp you see on the desk in the second room, all of the wall ornaments, plus the bar stools.  We attached them to cardboard & cut them out to use them around the set.

#2) We loved the deer head so much that we decided to include it in a couple of our reward tiers at the last minute. It is super cool and we're looking forward to sending it to you when you help fund us!

#3) The founders of DripShip, Chais, Shawna & Aaron constructed the set one week prior to production (with the help of some other awesome people too). It was a joy being hands on with our video and having the opportunity to appreciate all our hard work once it was completed.

#4)The World costume was hand-made out of chicken wire and papier-mâché! Many beers were consumed during the making of this celestial wonder...Can you tell? 

5) All of the people in our video are currently living in, and based out of Kearney, Nebraska (Population: 30,000).  Even though Chais & Shawna lived & worked in Thailand for two years, the business partners agreed that there is something special about Kearney. It's a great place to launch the domestic USA operations of DripShip. And immediately after this campaign is successful, we'll start researching where to launch an international distribution location overseas (to save money on international shipping costs)!

 

 

Frequently Asked Questions:

Question: What brands of shirts do you use?

Answer: We use only brands & styles of shirts that our team personally tries on and wears multiple times before we allow you to buy them from us. Some of the high quality brands we carry are: American Apparel, Bella+Canvas & Alternative Apparel.

 

Question: How do you know the shirt design I want & my size?

Answer: When this campaign is over, we'll be sending out a form that will ask you what shirt graphics you want printed and what size of shirt you'd like. So don't be worried if you contributed and haven't had someone communicate with us! :)

 

Question: How is DripShip different than Zazzle, Café press, Redbubble or Society6?

Answer: The first main difference is, our company revolves around you...and because of that we have an open channel of communication where we want to hear your thoughts and ideas, even if you think they might be small or insignificant.

The second way we're different is that we're helping to sell your brand, not ours. If your brand is "Joe's Awesome Shirts", we help you come up with a custom "Joe's Awesome Shirts" sales receipt (if you choose to have one for an extra fee), a "Joe's Awesome Shirts" online sales page (if you want one for free) and in the future we'll be adding custom packaging options and the ability to have "Joe's Awesome Shirts" custom clothing labels printed inside your shirts (this is one of our goals). We do all of this to help you be even more professional than you already are!

The last way we excel above the rest is that we give you actual profits for your shirt sales. With most other online shirt shops you may receive $1 to $4 per shirt sale (on the high end) but on our site we give you everything after our basic costs are taken out of the sale. Here's an example: If you sell a basic high quality shirt for $20, our rough fees will be around $10/shirt...so, the rest of that money ($10) goes straight into your pocket! But please remember that our cost changes depending on the quality & style of shirts you choose and how advanced your prints are. :) 

 

Question: Are the colors of the shirts represented under the reward tiers the only color of shirts I can receive?

Answer: Yes. We have dozens of different shirt colors available but in this case we are only using the selected colors you see above...we've teamed up with our designers to make sure your shirts will look as sexy as possible with these shirt color choices we've picked out for you.

 

Question: Does everyone that submits a design to you get accepted to have an online store?

Answer: For anyone that chooses a reward where that includes their designs to go on our site or amazon.com, then yes. But traditionally (outside of indiegogo) we are very exclusive with who we allow to be our clients. We put a lot of time and energy into helping build our client's brands, so if we we don't think a designer's shirt will sell, we'll give them our feedback and then they'll decide if we're still a good match or not. We're as honest as they come and our team has a good eye for design and shirt styles.

 

 

It has been nearly a solid year since DripShip was first thought of, and it became obvious that indiegogo was the right platform to help boost it into overdrive. indiegogo is not only a way to kick start our business, but it also gives us a chance to properly explain our company and see how the community (you and your friends) will react to what we're offering. We're already helping international businesses & individuals create their own apparel lines, and we're committed to launching more businesses through this campaign.

We are aware of the risks that similar campaigns have faced (delayed shipments, being overwhelmed with communication, etc), and because of that we've worked hard to put all the necessary logistics in place to avoid such occurrences.

The fact that we have created a strong relationship with all of the parties involved in this project makes us confident in our ability to fulfill our promises to each and every one of you. All of our partners and vendors know about the campaign and are really excited about how it will help make their businesses even better. We plan to keep an open dialogue with all our backers as well.

 

 

Many thanks to our team of “actors”:  

  • Real Artist: Drake Sauer (@DrakeSauer)

  • Real Business: Thunderhead Brewing (@ThunderHeadBrew)

  • Real Band: Bomb’s Blast (@BombsBlast)

     

Please note: Worldly is not real, but was indeed played by our good friend and comedian, Cory Helie.

A shout out to our talented friend, Michael Nyffeler, who filmed/edited our commercial and the indiegogo video. You helped make it a breeze Mikey.  Thanks man!

A GIANT Thank you to Seth Godin, even though you weren't knowingly involved in this project, your words (in physical books, audiobooks and from your blog) have impacted our team & helped us change the way we think about and do business for the past 5+ years! Did you notice Seth's book 'The Icarus Deception' in the beginning of our video?

A big kudos also goes out to the many people who collectively made this video possible.  You are all fabulous people and great to work with!

...and to you indiegogo & DripShip fans.  We greatly appreciate you donating.  You're helping to make a huge difference to the company and team of DripShip.net! Thanks a million!

 

.............................................................................................................

 

Even if you're not in a position to back us financially (by pledging money), but you believe in our project, you can still get involved by sharing this on Twitter, your Facebook timeline or any other Social Network that you prefer.

Keep on Keepin’ on!

 

Below are some 'behind the scenes' photos that we hope you enjoy. :)
story_txt:
DripShip's campaign in 10 seconds (read below):
 
Why Should I contribute?
If you like T-Shirts (you're a fan): We're building a massive collection of one of kind tees, from bands, designers & businesses based all over the World. And, your contribution goes towards helping build our company while you get some wearable (one of kind) perks of your own. Fans, check out some photos of your available Perks & Rewards right here!
If you sell T-Shirts (you're a client): Everytime an order comes in from your custom sales page (or website), we print, ship & manage your t-shirt orders for you. Why do we do this? So you can spend less energy shipping out shirts and managing orders (we give you more time to do what you love). AND...So you can make even more money per shirt sale, you'll make average of $5-$10 USD in net profit, per sale (which is way higher than any other online shirt distribution shop around).
Clients, get started today:- For $200 you can submit two (2) designs to us today (50% off our normal pricing).- For $400 you can have a custom design made for you by our design team.- For $480 you can submit six (6) designs to us for sale (a 60% savings)
 
What if you don't reach your $30,000 goal?
Every dollar we earn goes straight towards our goals. Whether we go above $30,000 or not, we'll be able to achieve some awesome things and you'll be rewarded either way! If you like what we're doing, please contribute today!Check out our goals here!
 
I have a question, who should I ask?
First thing first, read the rest of our campaign below, because you'll probably learn a lot about us. Secondly, check out our FAQ section of this campaign, it may help answer some of your basic questions...And If that didn't help you, please feel free to email us directly at: contact@dripship.net OR, fill out our online contact form.
 
 


Hello, we're the founders of DripShip (from left to right - Chais Meyer, Shawna Meyer & Aaron Timmens).  At DripShip we take our love for t-shirts & customer service and channel it into the highest quality clothing we can produce for you. We're very proud of our beautiful prints on our quality apparel, but we're even more proud that our company revolves around you.
 
Who are we currently working with?


Independent Artists - who prefer to create artwork instead of spending their time shipping orders out to their fans.


Small Businesses - who like to spend their time doing what they choose to make money, rather than worrying about managing their t-shirt inventory.


Musicians - who want to use their spare cash for touring the globe instead of paying thousands of dollars on upfront clothing costs.


And You - even if you're not one of the above three, but you'd like make some money from your own shirt line, we'd love to help you out.

 
What do we do?
For shirt fans: We give you an outlet where you can purchase hundreds of totally unique shirt designs (on high quality clothing) that were created by businesses, bands and artists all around the world, at one online shop (it's almost ready for you to come by and visit).
For our clients: We help you run your own clothing line without requiring thousands of dollars in upfront costs, hassling with managing your inventory, dealing with collecting payments, or spending your personal time shipping out orders. 
Every time one of your shirts sell, you'll be making some of the highest profits in the industry, without having to be directly involved in the process (Your profits will range between $3 - $10 per shirt sale, depending on what you choose to sell your shirts for).
To get started, we print your artwork (brand identity, custom designs or fan wear) onto our select & quality apparel. After we print your artwork on the shirt styles you chose, you get to select at least one of our exclusive clothing models to represent and wear your apparel.  And yes, you will then be sent professional quality photographs of your threads, which you can then use to promote your wear however you choose.
 
Here's one of our models now (say "hello" to Jordan):

 

Our current printing process (which embeds the ink into the fabric for a super soft feel) is limited to the color of fabric we can print on. So, in order to maintain a consistent quality across the board, we need to upgrade our printing technology...which is one of our core goals: to purchase a printer. 
 

Our Reasons & Goals for this indiegogo campaign:
#1) To upgrade our printing technology, which will allow us to speed up our printing process, and give you more customization options for your designs & overall self-branding. The printer upgrade we're looking at costs around $26,000.00! 
#2) We need to create a technology tunnel (A.K.A hiring our own developer to do some super geeky stuff) which will allow your products to be listed for sale on any website domain that you choose. And, we'll still manage all the payment stuff to make your life easier! ;)
#3) Be able to purchase large quantities of our high end apparel, making every shirt you buy from us the lowest pricing that we can get. This will also allow the printing & shipping process to have a faster turnaround than ever before. And yes, your fans will fall even more in love with your brand, with every single purchase.
 
Even More Goals:
If we go over our initial indiegogo goal of $30,000 we’ll be able to do even more. Such as:


CLIENTS & FANS: We'll be offering eco-friendly & American-made clothing for those that prefer to only buy clothing that supports american workers and fabric that has been organically processed from start to finish.


CLIENTS & FANS: We'll be offering dozens more clothing options and colors to choose from. Including different styles of hoodies, sweatshirts, v-necks, long sleeve shirts, a variety of tank tops and more trendy shirt styles to our line-up of shirt options. Not to mention all the latest trends in colors (ie. neon colors, mint, coral, heather fabrics, burnouts and more). 


CLIENTS & FANS: Help people in need by putting a shirt on the back of those that need it most: foster kids, individuals in homeless shelters, battered women. Every time one of our client's shirts is purchased, we will give a shirt away to someone in need.


CLIENTS & FANS: Setup an international distribution location (potentially in Thailand) in order to save big money on shipping costs. The average international shipping fee out of the USA is $11 to $12 per shipment. Out of a location like Thailand shipping internationally (almost anywhere in the World) only costs $3 to $5 per shipment!


CLIENTS: We'll set up real-time commission stats and notifications for clients that are using us to manage their sales. Specifically, notifications will be sent to you via SMS &/or Email every time your shirt is sold! 


CLIENTS: Overall custom branding options like custom clothing labels inside the shirt, custom branding for the outside of the packing going to your customers & custom email notifications sent from your brand/organization.
 
Why should I help fund this campaign?
Fans: When you help fund our project, you'll not only get exclusive access to our sweet rewards listed to the right, but you'll also help us make our clothing cheaper for you, we'll provide you with more shirt options/styles to choose from and you'll even help to make the overall shipping costs as low as possible (keeping your wallets fatter while wearing clothes that you love)!
Clients: When you help us reach our goals, you'll have more customization options for your brand/identity and over clothing line, you'll help us make our upfront clothing costs even cheaper (which means you'll sell more shirts than before) and you'll be given an opportunity to pass along the business aspects of printing & shipping your shirts to a company that you can trust...A.K.A DripShip!
 
 

Every single dollar we get from this indiegogo will be used to complete our goals and make our company even more awesome for you.
When we reach $30,000, we'll be able to start the process of upgrading DripShip...BUT, we'd like to surpass our core goal, so that we can help make you more successful and make even bigger changes in this world, thanks to you!
 
 


Need a visual of our rewards? We don't blame you, we'd want to see what we were getting as a return for our donation as well! 
Note: Not all the reward tiers are represented.

It's a great place to launch the domestic USA operations of DripShip. And immediately after this campaign is successful, we'll start researching where to launch an international distribution location overseas (to save money on international shipping costs)!

story:
THANKS FOR YOUR CONTRIBUTIONS!!

ENJOY YOUR SKITAKERS

Skitaker Team


INTERNATIONALLY PATENTED PRODUCT

Carry your skis effortlessly and faster with Skitakers.



Product begins shipping in March 2015, in time for THIS Ski season.

Skitakers make it easy to carry your ski's from the parking lot to the slopes and everywhere. They are easily adjustable onto any boot. With Skitakers, carrying your skis feels effortless. In a standard gray/black they are sure to match any ski boot.



YOU DON´T NEED TO DETACH THEM WHILE SKIING, NOR TO REMOVE YOUR BOOTS.



READY TO GO IN 1 MINUTE



The box includes:

  1. 1 right SkiTaker and 1 left SkiTaker.
  2. 4 short lateral pieces (attached to each SkiTaker) and 4 long lateral pieces, to fit a wide range of ski tail widths.
  3. Allen key to adjust the lateral pieces screws. 4 extra spare crews (to be used if the originally fitted screws are lost)
  4. Instructions.

ADJUSTABLE OPENING SLOT FOR EVERY SKI

The adjustable slot fits any type of ski, so you can use it for anyone in the family. SkiTakers can fit all ski tail widths from 6 to 12,8 cms.



EXTREMELY LIGHT

Skitakers weigh less than half of a pound, so you won't even notice them on your boot.



DESIGNED AND MADE TO LAST

We've manufactured Skitakers with materials to ensure that they are something you can use over a lifetime.



HIGH RESITANCE AND EXTRA LIGHT COMPONENTS
Main Body: Polyamide + Glass Fiber
Rubber parts: EPDM
Straps: Polyester
Screws: Stainless Steel
Buckle: Acetal

STRESS TESTED IN LABORATORY
-  90º Stretch resistance
-  Aging camera tests
-  580.000 rotating test cycles
-  23.000 ski insert cycles
-  Lateral pieces stretching tests



WHERE DO THE FUNDS GO?


ROADMAP TO LAUNCH
