story:
The Satu Adventure Pants are super comfortable while looking good and providing top performance. They’re even backed with a Lifetime Guarantee.

Since raising over a million dollars with our LoftTek Adventure jacket, you (our community) have been telling us to do more. So we’re back to bring you our next game-changing piece of gear!

We started with researching the perfect fabric and ended up partnering with Toray, a world leader in fabric innovation and quality.

We didn’t stop with the Satu Pants. We created a complete lower body system built for adventure and warmth. Our specially designed thermals and underwear completes the entire adventure set to give you unparalleled performance with sleek design.

  • NuYarn DragonWool™
  • ¾ Length
  • Reduced Bunching & Rubbing
  • Full-Length Quick Release
  • 50% Stronger Burst Strength
  • 35% More Loft & Warmth
  • Abrasion & Tear Resistant
  • Stronger Flatlock
  • Seams with 0% Overlap
  • NuYarn DragonWool™
  • Reduced Bunching and Rubbing
  • 50% Stronger Burst Strength
  • Abrasion & Tear Resistant
  • Quick-Drying
  • Optimal Heat Regulation
  • Designs for Men and Women
  • 50% Stronger Burst & Fewer Holes
  • NuYarn DragonWool™
  • 1/3 length zipper
  • Hooded
  • Thumbholes in sleeves
  • Drop back

Retail stores would charge you almost double for these pants, but thanks to our direct business model and personal relationship with Toray and our sewing providers, we're able to get you the best materials, the best designs, and the best quality all at an affordable price point.

Satu means one. We felt it was a fitting name. It’s the one pair of pants that gives you the comfort you need. The one pants that keeps you cool and protected on a big backpacking trip. The one pants that dries fast and stays odor free when traveling the world. The one pants that can replace all other pants for every activity. The one pants to rule them all…

We work extremely hard to make sure these products will fit you perfectly. With over well over 60 sizing samples of both pant and wool models tested internally and externally, we are convinced you'll love them! If for any reason you need to adjust your size, we are here to help you with that exchange. Simply reach out to us and we will help you every step of the exchange (or return) process.

 Weight: 13 oz (368g)*

*Weight measured from men's size 30x30 pants.
story_txt:
With a proprietary Japanese stretch weave and comfort design, the Satu Adventure Pants by Outdoor Vitals are the most comfortable pants you’ll ever wear. Not only that, but they are built to be at home and everywhere you go! Feel more comfortable at the office, on the trail, or in a foreign country!
The Satu Adventure Pants were built for ultra-comfort, incredible durability, and maximum performance — complete with a stylish design. Best of all, they’re backed with a lifetime guarantee. 
The Satu Adventure Pants are super comfortable while looking good and providing top performance. They’re even backed with a Lifetime Guarantee. 
 

Our products use quality materials, leading-edge manufacturing, fair employment practices, and innovative designs ensuring you get a superior product. We’re a direct-to-consumer business, so we’re able to cut out the middleman and pass the savings to you.Since raising over a million dollars with our LoftTek Adventure jacket, you (our community) have been telling us to do more. So we’re back to bring you our next game-changing piece of gear!
One major problem we found was with our current pant options was that we had pants for everything, but nothing as performance-focused and versatile as the LoftTek Jacket.We started with researching the perfect fabric and ended up partnering with Toray, a world leader in fabric innovation and quality.
Together, we developed a pair of pants that are powerfully functional, extremely comfortable, and exceptionally good looking in every situation.
 

The Satu Adventure Pants use Toray’s Japanese-designed mechanical stretch fabric. The proprietary weave and fabric construction makes them incredibly lightweight, flexible, strong, comfortable and remarkably fast drying.
Since the proprietary weave gives more than enough stretch to the fabric, we were able to construct Satu without heavy, slow-drying spandex. 
Spandex is heavy and loves to hold on to moisture, such as sweat. This means it takes forever to dry, gets heavier overtime, and builds up smells faster. Ever wonder why your gym clothes smell so bad? Now you know.
Satu’s Japanese mechanical stretch fabric is stretchier, lighter, stronger, and faster drying than spandex. It is an overall more advanced fabric — making it perfect for the Satu Adventure Pants. 

The Satu Pants are extremely lightweight — making them super comfortable and perfect for travel.
The Japanese Stretch Fabric is highly stretchable, giving you full freedom and mobility in absolute comfort.
A gusseted crotch gives you extra room where it matters. Stop restricting yourself and be free.
Keep the Satu Pants snug and comfortable without needing a belt. 
The proprietary fabric weave and lack of spandex make these dry significantly faster than other pants.  

Satu’s naturally odor-resistant fabric is treated with an additional medical-grade MAKSPEC antibacterial weave — ensuring they stay fresh super long, no matter what. 
No worries over spills or stains, the DWR Coating makes the Satu Pants water and stain-resistant.
Leave your gaiters at home! A removable lace clip and adjustable hem keeps your pants clipped in and snow/dirt out.
That’s right! We are so confident in the build quality that we guarantee it for a lifetime! Wear them everyday, everywhere, through anything — you won’t be disappointed. We guarantee it. 

Carry all your essentials without anyone noticing and while keeping a slim profile. Perfect for notebooks, passports, and more!
Tighten the pants when riding a bike, raise it for water crossings, or secure it around your boot to keep dirt and snow out!
Quickly cool down and air out. When closed, the vents lay flush with the seams — staying completely hidden.
When you need to go to the office or a date, belt loops let you add a belt and transform to a cleaner, more formal look. 
 
We didn’t stop with the Satu Pants. We created a complete lower body system built for adventure and warmth. Our specially designed thermals and underwear completes the entire adventure set to give you unparalleled performance with sleek design.
We used NuYarn DragonWool™ for all our accessories. DragonWool™ uses a patented process that strengthens and maximizes Merino wool’s potential without damaging it.
Enjoy the same ultra-softness, heat regulation, odor resistance, and moisture wicking ability of Merino wool heightened by the smooth, advanced, lightweight DragonWool™ weave. 

NuYarn DragonWool™
¾ Length
Reduced Bunching & Rubbing
Full-Length Quick Release
50% Stronger Burst Strength
35% More Loft & Warmth
Abrasion & Tear Resistant
Stronger Flatlock
Seams with 0% Overlap

Our thermals feature a ¾ length to prevent bunching with your socks. Get powerful warmth without the discomfort.
Full-length quick release zippers let you put on and take off the thermals without removing your boots!
The combination of merino wool’s natural properties and DragonWool™’s proprietary weave makes our thermals exceptionally effective at heat regulation. Stay warm when it’s cold and stay cool when it’s warm.
DragonWool™ is extremely fast drying allowing you to stay comfortable even when mother nature is throwing her best at you or you are highly active. The wool against your skin keeps you warm while the quick-drying polyester dissipates the moisture! 
Our thermals use a unique sew that keeps the seams flat and strong with zero overlap. This ensures you stay comfortable and prevents any unwanted abrasion on your skin. 

NuYarn DragonWool™
Reduced Bunching and Rubbing
50% Stronger Burst Strength
Abrasion & Tear Resistant
Quick-Drying
Optimal Heat Regulation
Designs for Men and Women
50% Stronger Burst & Fewer Holes

We made our boxers longer than typical boxers. The extra length keeps the boxers in place so they don’t bunch up or form uncomfortable wedgies — no more riding up!
The Merino wool used in DragonWool™ is naturally moisture-wicking, while the weave makes the fabric super quick-drying. This combination means sweat and moisture are quickly wicked and dissipated, so you always stay dry and odor-free.
Merino wool is already super soft. When combined with the DragonWool™ weave, the fabric suddenly becomes smooth as silk. You’ve never had underwear this smooth or lightweight.
We have boxer designs for both him and her — so everyone can enjoy the smooth, soft, lightweight comfort of our DragonWool™ boxers. 

NuYarn DragonWool™
1/3 length zipper
Hooded
Thumbholes in sleeves
Drop back

Our DragonWool Hoodie boasts a 50+ UPF rating to protect you from the sun and ultraviolet rays. Block out more than 98% of harmful UV-A and UV-B rays as you tackle your daily adventures.
Our hoodie is amazing at trapping more heat when worn in layers. Stay extra toasty when it’s chilly out and throw on the hood for even more warmth if you need it.
Not only is the DragonWool hoodie great at heat regulation, but it’s also powerfully breathable. As you get more active throughout the day, the hoodie lets air circulate through and can be worn as an outer layer to help you cool down without worry.
No more cold butts! The DragonWool hoodie features a dropped back to keep your bottoms warm even when you sit. It’s like having your own seat warmers wherever you go!
The Satu Adventure Pants were made for the modern age. They’re lightweight, flexible, comfortable, and all the “active” features were designed to be invisible, making these pants perfect for everyday wear.
Wear them out on your hike, then walk right into your conference meeting without switching them out. They look amazing and feel even better! 
Retail stores would charge you almost double for these pants, but thanks to our direct business model and personal relationship with Toray and our sewing providers, we're able to get you the best materials, the best designs, and the best quality all at an affordable price point.
In fact, we are so confident in the quality of the pants that we guarantee them, and all of our products, with a lifetime warranty!
Satu means one. We felt it was a fitting name. It’s the one pair of pants that gives you the comfort you need. The one pants that keeps you cool and protected on a big backpacking trip. The one pants that dries fast and stays odor free when traveling the world. The one pants that can replace all other pants for every activity. The one pants to rule them all…
Simplify your life and get the one pants that empowers you for every adventure! Start Living Ultralight on your terms. Grab your Satu Adventure Pants now! 

At the end of the campaign, we’ll send you a survey for your sizing, color choice(s) and shipping information to deliver your items when manufacturing is complete! 
We work extremely hard to make sure these products will fit you perfectly. With over well over 60 sizing samples of both pant and wool models tested internally and externally, we are convinced you'll love them! If for any reason you need to adjust your size, we are here to help you with that exchange. Simply reach out to us and we will help you every step of the exchange (or return) process.
You can get any waist size in any of the length measurements! Ex. men 40 waists with 34 inseam! Weight: 13 oz (368g)**Weight measured from men's size 30x30 pants.

 Weight: 8.7 oz (246g)*
*Weight measured from men's size M.



Weight: 3.8 oz (107g)*
*Weight measured from men's size M.


Weight: 9.9 oz (290g)*
*Weight measured from men's size M. 
 


 











 
Torture Tests


 



Hi, I’m Tayson. I started Outdoor Vitals to help outdoor enthusiasts “Live Ultralight” through the use of premium ultralight products that cut down on waste. My team and I believe Living Ultralight means using premium gear that works in any weather, is easy to pack, and won’t slow you down. It means buying less quantity to fill up our earth’s landfills and buying more quality products that are ready for all your adventures.
I knew that premium gear was inherently lighter, lasted longer, and provided better outdoor experiences. However, the price of the gear was out of reach for me and my family. I wanted outdoor adventurers to spend less on gear and more on experiences.
That’s why I designed Outdoor Vitals to sell directly to consumers and cut out middlemen retailers that markup prices sometimes by double. With this business model, we’ve been able to get quality products out to you for 40-50% less than a retail store.
I also recognize that I’m very fortunate to be where I am, while others around the world are not as fortunate. So Outdoor Vitals donates 1% of our revenue to sustainable poverty projects around the world.This will be our 3rd crowdfunding campaign. Our last campaign raised over $750,000 on Kickstarter and continued to hit over $1,000,000 on Indiegogo!
When we started, we only had $500 to put into the company — and we never took venture capital. We determined that a family-owned company is better at creating value for customers. While the company has grown to be a 9 figure brand, it's still extremely vital to our growth that we use crowdfunding platforms to help us compete with investment company-owned or venture capital-backed outdoor brands. We believe that focusing on long term value for our customers is more important than reporting to investors about how to maximize the next month’s profits.
The Outdoor Vitals team is made up of passionate outdoor enthusiasts that understand the demands and needs of outdoor attire and accessories. We constantly push the envelope by finding the latest and most innovative materials to build our products, and the Satu Pants are our biggest innovation yet!
Join us and start Living Ultralight today!

story:
Your bra is the most functional piece of clothing you put on your body, and you rely on its support each and every day. But, if you've ever worn one, you've probably experienced at least one of these pains:

  • straps digging into your skin or straining your shoulders to keep them from slipping
  • band riding up, pinching, or sliding throughout the day
  • wires poking out, prodding, stabbing, and/or irritating your skin
  • chronic back and shoulder pain
  • the feeling that you need to tear the thing off the second you get home

Why, if almost half the population wears these things almost every day, do they cause all these problems? Well, there's a few reasons why.

  • Big retailers put profits over great fits -- so they don't offer all of the sizes that accurately describe all of the different bodies we have.
  • On the other hand, lingerie production requires handmade precision, specialty equipment, and wide size ranges. That makes it a difficult and expensive industry to enter, which means it's hard for small brands to innovate and shake things up.  

This means for most people, the only options that exist are probably improperly fit, priced too high, not super sturdy, uncomfortable, bulky, or beige. Or a combination of all of the above. 

More people are rejecting uncomfy underwire and unnatural push-ups. In just the past year, bralette sales have soared by over 120%. However, the way these garments are traditionally sized, made, and sold still leaves a whole lot of people and bodies out of the bralette game. 

Most bralettes are sized like a T-shirt -- small/medium/large. This makes them easy for companies to produce, but it doesn't account for all the different body shapes we have. If you have a larger cup size or need support from a great fit and other design features, you're sized out -- and out of luck. 

Andy wears Helena in Black, 32B. Raji wears Helena in Peony, 30G.

Thankfully, you've found U.S. -- Uye Surana. We're a small indie brand that handmakes lingerie right from our studio in NYC. A few years ago, our founder and designer Monica developed her own patent-pending design techniques that make bralettes and soft bras actually work for a wider variety of people. 

Ever since then, we've been on a journey to bring comfort and inclusivity to lingerie through well-fit, beautiful, supportive bralettes and soft bras. They're everything you love about your favorite bra + everything you love about a bralette in one package, with none of the annoying parts of either.

Want to try one out? You're in luck. We're funding a limited run of our most accessible style right here on IndieGogo right now. You can try one out, handmade just for you in any size, starting at $55.

Raji wears Victoria in White, 30G. Tiffany wears Victoria in White, 32B.

Sam wears Helena in Peony, 28D. Stella wears Helena in Black, 42D.

Like all of our styles, Helena & Victoria take every feature you love from your favorite bra, and marries it with soft comfort and effortless elegance of bralettes. Added in to the mix? Our signature clever design, gorgeous shapes, and beautiful fabrics. 

Tired of plain and wish you could find a lacy little thing in your size? Helena is for you, available in three colors at $55. Want an everyday basic with superpowered support in a neutral, lace-free cup? Victoria is your new best bra, and just $65 here on IndieGogo.

Lohla wears Helena in Geode, 28D, and our matching Simple Panty in Fluorite, size S. Helena in Infinite Black is also pictured.

Andy wears Helena in Infinite Black, 32B, and matching Simple Panty in Black. Stella wears her Helena Bra in 42D. 

Lohla wears Helena in Geode, 28D, and matching Simple Panty in size S.

Raji wears Helena in Peony, size 30G. Andy wears Helena in Peony, size 32B.

Lohla wears Victoria in White, 28D. It's also pictured here in Black.

Lana wears Victoria in Black, 34C. Stella wears hers in 42D. 

We have a super simple, two-step sizing system. We just take two measurements and craft our bralettes to measure by band and cup. If you don't see your size on this chart, or if you have other fit concerns, we also offer free custom sizing, at no extra charge. We also offer panties in sizes XS through 3XL, along with -- you guessed it! -- free custom sizing. 

To be honest? We are a tiny team, and as more and more people discover the magic of U.S., we need to grow! We love handcrafting our bralettes one-by-one – it's what enables us to really perfect the fit and give excellent customer service for each and every person who discovers us. We couldn't pull it off if we moved our production to a factory. So we need your help to keep our super-small and efficient team at the studio.

You see, it's kind of a win-win for U.S. & you. Because you're pre-ordering your styles here on IndieGogo, we get to organize our production so we can make them a little more affordable. You get to enjoy our usual beautiful handmade craftsmanship on fully-featured, extra-supportive garments at a more accessible price than our general retail. You support us, we support you. And the U.S. team gets to work on even more projects that make everything we do even better. 

Here's a little chart of all the things you'll be helping us achieve when you order your new bra through this campaign:

When you pre-order your new bra through this campaign, you'll know that you are directly helping us achieve all of these goals:

  • fund this limited production run! We know how much work goes into our creations, but we still want better lingerie to be accessible to as many people as we can reach. By producing this batch in the pre-order format, we are able to bring the price per piece down to $55/$65, while keeping every piece of them handmade in-house. That's about average for what all of the customers throughout our size range might pay for an underwire bra -- for a handmade garment that makes you feel way more comfy & pretty than an old beige boulder-holder.
  •  add 8 new cup sizes to our core range this year. We just added 14 thanks to our Kickstarter campaign last fall! We're looking forward to grading & patterning these new sizes throughout all of our offerings. Help us out with budgeting the time & resources for it -- get yourself something pretty.
  • working on new designs, including future additions to our swimwear collection! We know -- swimwear is in basically as bad of a spot as traditional bralettes when it comes to the size and fit offerings available. We're so ready to bring some pretty, unique swim designs to everyone who needs a little more support in the summertime. Hopefully, this campaign will help us have more time and budget for sourcing new materials, creating new designs, and photographing them on plenty of dreamy U.S. babes.
  • growing & training our team! We currently have one of the fastest shipping windows for handmade lingerie, at accessible prices for great construction that's ethically produced. To keep it that way and pursuing our goals to bring better lingerie & representative images to people everywhere, we're going to need help. Your support directly helps us create a lingerie shopping experience that's a dream for all.

Current production stage

Good news -- we've already offered these styles before! That means almost every step of the process is completed, including:

  • creating the patterns, grading the sizing, testing and fitting the sizes
  • ordering the fabrics, hand-dyeing or ordering any components
  • creating samples, further assessing the materials and design
  • producing & selling the product range 

We have an excellent idea at this point of how long our production runs on these styles and how smoothly it ran for us last time. That means we couldn't be more confident about the quality of product we're offering to you! We also feel pretty good about the timeline we've set for ourselves.

Reviews, press & more!

Click here to read selected features: 

NYLON Magazine Studio Tour | Refinery29 Feature | Huffington Post | Allure | Reviews & features at The Lingerie Addict | Sweet | Harper's Bazaar |

    

Happy customers from our last campaign & website orders:

 

 
 

 

Risks, challenges, & transparency

Last fall, our previous crowdfunding campaign was fully funded in just 5 days. 30% of our preorders for that campaign were scheduled for holiday delivery. In just a three-month turnaround, those delivery goals were met. This time around, we've given ourselves a few extra weeks of time to budget for that same delivery deadline. We have also learned so much from organizing and shipping our last campaign's rewards. As a response, we've streamlined our offerings here so everyone gets their rewards as quickly as possible. The styles we're offering here have already been through a production round, so we have a really good grasp of how much time they take our team to create and produce.

Should we vastly exceed or goal, we're confident that we'll be able to scale production no matter how overfunded our campaign gets -- we'd actually love the opportunity to! Our production becomes more simple for us the more people participate in this preorder, so spread the word and share the campaign. 

 Production always comes with specific snags and challenges, but we are uniquely positioned as a brand in complete control of its development, from design to production. Because we produce everything in-house, there are no factory tie-ups and middle men to throw obstacles in our way. There's no miscommunicating on patterns and measurements; there's no mysterious fulfillment center where stock can disappear. We've already got several years of business under our belt, so we know how to handle our own production (because we handle that AND every other aspect of our business ourselves!) We have streamlined our offerings for this campaign to minimize loose ends and make organizing production as seamless as possible.

Really close customer service is one of our favorite things, so don't worry -- our backers will be receiving tons of updates, notes, photos, social media posts, and the like as we move forward. If even the slightest of delays turn up for any reason, you'll be the first to know.

One concern might be how we plan to handle expanding our team. Good news: we both have several years of experience managing and training interns and assistants. The structure of our company is well prepared to handle new additions, and we've already successfully grown our company since our last campaign.

Larger scale -- since we've gone over our confidence in fulfilling our rewards, we just want to mention we're also very confident about the goals we've set for ourselves with this campaign. They are all projects that are in process at the studio already, to varying extents, and we'll be keeping you updated on how they continue to develop before and after your rewards are sent out. We have already accomplished many of the initiatives we set out to achieve with our last crowdfunding campaign, so we know exactly what we're capable of and we're ready to keep going!

If you don't want to try our lingerie (or if you don't wear it yourself), but you like what we're doing and think we should keep at it, please consider donating, shopping for someone else, or checking out the smaller rewards we're offering -- even $1 helps! If you can't donate, consider sharing the campaign with someone you know who might appreciate it too. Shares really do help us out! 

Thank you so much for supporting us with our campaign. We admire the consciousness and thoughtfulness we've noticed among the people who choose to shop with us and support our projects, and we appreciate the trust and care that often goes into supporting a small brand with big ideas. 

#WeLoveUye!
story_txt:
Your bra is the most functional piece of clothing you put on your body, and you rely on its support each and every day. But, if you've ever worn one, you've probably experienced at least one of these pains:
straps digging into your skin or straining your shoulders to keep them from slipping
band riding up, pinching, or sliding throughout the day
wires poking out, prodding, stabbing, and/or irritating your skin
chronic back and shoulder pain
the feeling that you need to tear the thing off the second you get home
Why, if almost half the population wears these things almost every day, do they cause all these problems? Well, there's a few reasons why.
Big retailers put profits over great fits -- so they don't offer all of the sizes that accurately describe all of the different bodies we have.
On the other hand, lingerie production requires handmade precision, specialty equipment, and wide size ranges. That makes it a difficult and expensive industry to enter, which means it's hard for small brands to innovate and shake things up.  
This means for most people, the only options that exist are probably improperly fit, priced too high, not super sturdy, uncomfortable, bulky, or beige. Or a combination of all of the above. More people are rejecting uncomfy underwire and unnatural push-ups. In just the past year, bralette sales have soared by over 120%. However, the way these garments are traditionally sized, made, and sold still leaves a whole lot of people and bodies out of the bralette game. Most bralettes are sized like a T-shirt -- small/medium/large. This makes them easy for companies to produce, but it doesn't account for all the different body shapes we have. If you have a larger cup size or need support from a great fit and other design features, you're sized out -- and out of luck. Andy wears Helena in Black, 32B. Raji wears Helena in Peony, 30G.Thankfully, you've found U.S. -- Uye Surana. We're a small indie brand that handmakes lingerie right from our studio in NYC. A few years ago, our founder and designer Monica developed her own patent-pending design techniques that make bralettes and soft bras actually work for a wider variety of people. Ever since then, we've been on a journey to bring comfort and inclusivity to lingerie through well-fit, beautiful, supportive bralettes and soft bras. They're everything you love about your favorite bra + everything you love about a bralette in one package, with none of the annoying parts of either.Want to try one out? You're in luck. We're funding a limited run of our most accessible style right here on IndieGogo right now. You can try one out, handmade just for you in any size, starting at $55.Raji wears Victoria in White, 30G. Tiffany wears Victoria in White, 32B.Sam wears Helena in Peony, 28D. Stella wears Helena in Black, 42D.Like all of our styles, Helena & Victoria take every feature you love from your favorite bra, and marries it with soft comfort and effortless elegance of bralettes. Added in to the mix? Our signature clever design, gorgeous shapes, and beautiful fabrics. Tired of plain and wish you could find a lacy little thing in your size? Helena is for you, available in three colors at $55. Want an everyday basic with superpowered support in a neutral, lace-free cup? Victoria is your new best bra, and just $65 here on IndieGogo.Lohla wears Helena in Geode, 28D, and our matching Simple Panty in Fluorite, size S. Helena in Infinite Black is also pictured.Andy wears Helena in Infinite Black, 32B, and matching Simple Panty in Black. Stella wears her Helena Bra in 42D. Lohla wears Helena in Geode, 28D, and matching Simple Panty in size S.Raji wears Helena in Peony, size 30G. Andy wears Helena in Peony, size 32B.Lohla wears Victoria in White, 28D. It's also pictured here in Black.Lana wears Victoria in Black, 34C. Stella wears hers in 42D. We have a super simple, two-step sizing system. We just take two measurements and craft our bralettes to measure by band and cup. If you don't see your size on this chart, or if you have other fit concerns, we also offer free custom sizing, at no extra charge. We also offer panties in sizes XS through 3XL, along with -- you guessed it! -- free custom sizing. To be honest? We are a tiny team, and as more and more people discover the magic of U.S., we need to grow! We love handcrafting our bralettes one-by-one – it's what enables us to really perfect the fit and give excellent customer service for each and every person who discovers us. We couldn't pull it off if we moved our production to a factory. So we need your help to keep our super-small and efficient team at the studio.You see, it's kind of a win-win for U.S. & you. Because you're pre-ordering your styles here on IndieGogo, we get to organize our production so we can make them a little more affordable. You get to enjoy our usual beautiful handmade craftsmanship on fully-featured, extra-supportive garments at a more accessible price than our general retail. You support us, we support you. And the U.S. team gets to work on even more projects that make everything we do even better. Here's a little chart of all the things you'll be helping us achieve when you order your new bra through this campaign:When you pre-order your new bra through this campaign, you'll know that you are directly helping us achieve all of these goals:

fund this limited production run! We know how much work goes into our creations, but we still want better lingerie to be accessible to as many people as we can reach. By producing this batch in the pre-order format, we are able to bring the price per piece down to $55/$65, while keeping every piece of them handmade in-house. That's about average for what all of the customers throughout our size range might pay for an underwire bra -- for a handmade garment that makes you feel way more comfy & pretty than an old beige boulder-holder.
 add 8 new cup sizes to our core range this year. We just added 14 thanks to our Kickstarter campaign last fall! We're looking forward to grading & patterning these new sizes throughout all of our offerings. Help us out with budgeting the time & resources for it -- get yourself something pretty.

working on new designs, including future additions to our swimwear collection! We know -- swimwear is in basically as bad of a spot as traditional bralettes when it comes to the size and fit offerings available. We're so ready to bring some pretty, unique swim designs to everyone who needs a little more support in the summertime. Hopefully, this campaign will help us have more time and budget for sourcing new materials, creating new designs, and photographing them on plenty of dreamy U.S. babes.

growing & training our team! We currently have one of the fastest shipping windows for handmade lingerie, at accessible prices for great construction that's ethically produced. To keep it that way and pursuing our goals to bring better lingerie & representative images to people everywhere, we're going to need help. Your support directly helps us create a lingerie shopping experience that's a dream for all.

Current production stageGood news -- we've already offered these styles before! That means almost every step of the process is completed, including:
creating the patterns, grading the sizing, testing and fitting the sizes
ordering the fabrics, hand-dyeing or ordering any components
creating samples, further assessing the materials and design
producing & selling the product range 
We have an excellent idea at this point of how long our production runs on these styles and how smoothly it ran for us last time. That means we couldn't be more confident about the quality of product we're offering to you! We also feel pretty good about the timeline we've set for ourselves.Reviews, press & more!Click here to read selected features: NYLON Magazine Studio Tour | Refinery29 Feature | Huffington Post | Allure | Reviews & features at The Lingerie Addict | Sweet | Harper's Bazaar |    Happy customers from our last campaign & website orders: 
 

 

 
Risks, challenges, & transparencyLast fall, our previous crowdfunding campaign was fully funded in just 5 days. 30% of our preorders for that campaign were scheduled for holiday delivery. In just a three-month turnaround, those delivery goals were met. This time around, we've given ourselves a few extra weeks of time to budget for that same delivery deadline. We have also learned so much from organizing and shipping our last campaign's rewards. As a response, we've streamlined our offerings here so everyone gets their rewards as quickly as possible. The styles we're offering here have already been through a production round, so we have a really good grasp of how much time they take our team to create and produce.Should we vastly exceed or goal, we're confident that we'll be able to scale production no matter how overfunded our campaign gets -- we'd actually love the opportunity to! Our production becomes more simple for us the more people participate in this preorder, so spread the word and share the campaign.  Production always comes with specific snags and challenges, but we are uniquely positioned as a brand in complete control of its development, from design to production. Because we produce everything in-house, there are no factory tie-ups and middle men to throw obstacles in our way. There's no miscommunicating on patterns and measurements; there's no mysterious fulfillment center where stock can disappear. We've already got several years of business under our belt, so we know how to handle our own production (because we handle that AND every other aspect of our business ourselves!) We have streamlined our offerings for this campaign to minimize loose ends and make organizing production as seamless as possible.Really close customer service is one of our favorite things, so don't worry -- our backers will be receiving tons of updates, notes, photos, social media posts, and the like as we move forward. If even the slightest of delays turn up for any reason, you'll be the first to know.One concern might be how we plan to handle expanding our team. Good news: we both have several years of experience managing and training interns and assistants. The structure of our company is well prepared to handle new additions, and we've already successfully grown our company since our last campaign.Larger scale -- since we've gone over our confidence in fulfilling our rewards, we just want to mention we're also very confident about the goals we've set for ourselves with this campaign. They are all projects that are in process at the studio already, to varying extents, and we'll be keeping you updated on how they continue to develop before and after your rewards are sent out. We have already accomplished many of the initiatives we set out to achieve with our last crowdfunding campaign, so we know exactly what we're capable of and we're ready to keep going!If you don't want to try our lingerie (or if you don't wear it yourself), but you like what we're doing and think we should keep at it, please consider donating, shopping for someone else, or checking out the smaller rewards we're offering -- even $1 helps! If you can't donate, consider sharing the campaign with someone you know who might appreciate it too. Shares really do help us out! Thank you so much for supporting us with our campaign. We admire the consciousness and thoughtfulness we've noticed among the people who choose to shop with us and support our projects, and we appreciate the trust and care that often goes into supporting a small brand with big ideas. #WeLoveUye!

story:
www.Thickstem.com

 

About us,

 


Thickstem was created by Jeremy Farr and Richard Boucher, two strapping young lads from a small town in Ontario that truly believe that Hemp is the way of the future. After moving to Vancouver and being influenced by her beauty and resources, Thickstem was incubated and brought to life! We have a vision of creating a line so comfortable and stylish, yet comical and ironic that speaks to the wearers sense of humour, compassion for nature, and general out look on life. As we attempt to take over the world via our Hemp Chariot we will expand our line into hats, gloves, sweaters, polos, socks, and eventually have a snowboard that is 100% hemp based.  


Why support Thickstem?

Much like every business in it's start up phase, capital is required to get off on the right foot. We are aiming to raise $5000 for our first order of shirts, advertisement and distribution costs, a booth at two local weekend events to help spread the goodness and all excess is used to research and develop new articles of clothing. As much as we care about the environment, we also care about the animals that dwell within it. A percentage of all sales made are donated to SPCA to help with Animal Care, Animal Control, Community Education and Medical Care. 

We want to include our Thickstem customers in as much of our daily routine as we can! upload your photos of you wearing your shirt or where you stuck a sticker and have it voted on by our community to receive a free shirt in our monthly draw.

Got a funny idea of "Animals doing to people what people do to animals"? Send us your images and ideas and we'll put it up for a vote on your Facebook and twitter pages. You win, you got yourself a shirt with your creation on it! The possibilities are endless.

$30 bucks a shirt taxes included. We still can't figure out why most retailers deceive their customers with the ol' "plus tax". Just tell us what we gotta pay, no guessing and no calculators.

One shirt sale allows us to produce two more, now you know.

 

The Flagship Thickstem Shirts...

Our vision to provide a shirt with an inborn high quality comes with a few perks over your typical retailer solid apparel. They are a 55% hemp / 45% Organic Cotton material that wicks away sweat and moisture with ease. They humbly provide UVA/UVB radiation, odour and bacterial resistance. Due the structuring of the hemp/organic cotton blend, they hold their shape and elasticity longer to help accent those body lines. All these features add up to a one helluva shirt that looks great and stays comfortable!


Some Hemp facts to make you feel warm and fuzzy...

It has so many benefits compared to typical cotton and polyester that it cant be ignored no longer!

Hemp is one of the most versatile plants known. It can be grown in most climates, is drought resistant, requires little fertilizer, minimal pesticides or herbicides, and has a range of uses. The seeds can be used as food, and can be processed to produce hemp oil. The stalks provide fiber for textiles, clothing, rope, paper and building products. Anything that trees/timber can be used to produce, hemp can produce and more, including house construction! 

One crop can provide the basics of life – food, shelter, clothing, fuel and medicine. As a renewable resource from living plants hemp does not contribute to the greenhouse effect. The growing plants absorb as much CO2 as will later be released when oil or other plant matter is burnt. Unlike fossil fuels (oil, coal, gas) or nuclear fuels hemp could supply us with raw materials for thousands of years, without ever changing our climate and without producing waste that remains radioactive for millions of years. 


Hemp is a natural plant material that can be grown with little or no herbicides and pesticides, and little fertilizer. Therefore in terms of the agricultural system it is more ecologically sensitive. In paper and textile production, it can be processed without toxic chemicals, whereas alternatives like cotton or textiles and wood pulp for paper, require large amounts of toxic chemicals.


Because hemp is not a fussy grower and can grow in a wide range of soils and climatic conditions, it is ideal for a bio regional approach. It is a bulky crop and does not require high capital technology to process, making it ideal to process locally, increasing local employment and economy, and saving transport costs and pollution.

Please like our Facebook page!

https://www.facebook.com/pages/Thickstemcom/491501434235396

 

PLEASE INDICATE WHICH SHIRT YOU WOULD LIKE BY USING 1, 2, OR 3 BESIDE YOUR NAME IN THE SHIPPING INFORMATION AND SIZE. ie. JOHN DOE 1L or for multiples JOHN DOE 2S, 1M

*If no shirt design or size is shown we will send a medium black Thickstem original T.

1. Thickstem original mushroom logo

2. Chainsaw tree

3. Boycow

story:
THANK YOU EVERYONE!

To everybody who backed this project -- thank you. Your incredible support and feedback transformed the Berg Backpack from an idea to reality. I will continue to do everything that I can to ensure that the direction of our products is to enrich the lives of people who buy our products.

Buy the Berg Backpack HERE

story:
INTRODUCTION

Love Fashion Moms!
This is your chance to be a part of making an incredible fashion "Real Legit Magazine! We're extremely proud to finally announce a Fashion magazine that invests in you.
Real Legit Magazine is one of the most exciting things to hit the "World" in a long time:
   •   Not only are we extending our fashion magazine visuals through a high quality, visually rich print format, but we're also doing our part to enrich the inner beauty with in each and everyone... by giving it away at fashion shows, celebrity functions, red carpet events and industry events! No subscriptions, just high unique couture fashion fit for the average person to be seen my top celebrities!
   •   The entire magazine is printed in full color with a full bleed on HP Indigo digital presses. These commercial presses have been calibrated to provide a high quality output of all your content, from crisp text to brilliant graphics in full color, glossy paper, with bright and vivid ink, dramatic stage photographs! 


MAGAZINE IMPACT

   •   Real Legit Magazine is already "Award Winner" in "Hollywood.  We have a huge demand in Germany, Australia, Japan, China and looking forward to expanding into the world markets. Accepted as the leader in "Hollywood" industry in print and digital format.
   •   Our strong networking abilities has placed us in a very unique position in Hollywood! Not only do we cover the very best red carpet events nearly each and every day, but we attends and cover exclusive private celebrity parties and events throughout the year, including The "Grammy's" "Emmy's" "NAACP"" Soul Train Music Awards". We have great relationships with musical artists and celebrities that keeps our fashion driven content fresh and exciting and direct to our audience… with a strong eye towards it's rich fashion elements. We may well be one of the only companies in the world that have reached our exclusive market in a minimal amount of time with "Your" help.
   •   We have assembled the largest fashion interest social media fan base on the planet. ...And these are not just big impressive numbers to look at: but more importantly "who" you in our magazine. We know this because we average thousands of Facebook friends a month and growing every day.
Simply put, with your help we'll be creating Real Legit Magazine in the print format in our continued mission to change the way women and men can find their inner beauty through fashion. We love to transform the average inner beauty to the high fashion beauty inside and out.


CHECK OUT THE MAGAZINE: http://www.magcloud.com/browse/issue/701666


WHAT YOUR FUNDS COVER

To make this happen we need your help!

Here's how you can help us at "Real Legit Magazine" and be a part of fashion history:
   •   We need to raise $300,000 to cover the cost of printing & shipping 50,000 copies of the maiden voyage of the Real Legit Magazine. We'll be covering the expenses for the international traveling, equipment, photography, layout, marketing, branding and more ourselves.
   •   Please check out some of exciting perks on the right side of this page. Some of these items are one-of-a-kind, and you won't be able to get them anywhere else. "Contribute what you can". Every dollar will get us closer to this goal. We know there are a lot of fashion supporters that will be excited to hear about this. It would mean a lot to us if you ask them to help as well!
   •   Even if we don't reach our goal, we are still going to print in the spring. We will just adjust the number of copies to match the amount of money raised.
Real Legit Magazine is focused on one thing: Doing our part and take the perception of a "Fashion Magazine' to the next level, and enrich your beauty from within! We believe that not only visual strength literally the foundation for nearly all fashion magazine, but that imagery is still EXCITING, and there's no shortage of great stories to get excited about!


OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

We realize that some people just can’t contribute financially, but that doesn’t mean they can’t be extremely valuable to this campaign:
   •   Social media is a big part of the lives of many people. You can help us do this by sharing this campaign on Facebook, Twitter and any other social media networks.
   •   Use the Indiegogo share tools whenever possible. They make sharing very easy!
   •   Email or tell a friend about this campaign.

story:
OUR INITIAL GOAL IS:

$8,000.00


OUR STRETCH GOAL IS: $10,000.00



  • You will participating in a chance to change the way the world sees fashion and they way that we are impacting the earth with not so smart fashion choices. What do you think sustainability means? Sustainability is when you take responsibility for the waste you are outputting into the world, in doing this we are making an effort to reduce our carbon foot print and be more responsible in the way that we view fashion.  
  • Americans discard an estimated 68 pounds of clothing a year, (most of which are made in sweat shops). Per person that's 13.1 million tons of textiles. In 2006, 2.5 billion pounds of fabric were kept from the landfills by used-clothing purchases, Yet about 99 percent of what is thrown away can be recycled. Clothing and household textiles, consisting of fabrics such as cotton, polyester, nylon and rayon, make up almost 5 percent of the total garbage in landfills. 
  • Sustainable business practices that address current needs in the context of how to support long-term economic vitality, environmental health, and strong communities.
  • We want to make fashion that counts, and street-wear that you can be proud of wearing. 

Other Ways You Can Help:

We understand that some people just can't contribute, But that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • PAY US WITH A POST, REBLOG, OR BLAST! Share the link to this indigogo & get the word out!

  • SHARE SHARE SHARE: Please help us to get the word out by sharing this on your page, reblogging it from our tumblr, and posting it to your social networks!

Thank you for taking the time to read our story, watch our videos and contribute in any way that you can. 

You can follow our progress on 

WWW.THRIFTQUEENED.COM, 
WWW.FACEBOOK.COM/THRIFTQUEENED, WWW.FACEBOOK.COM/GETKINGED
WWW.INSTAGRAM.COM/THRIFTQUEENED
WWW.INSTAGRAM.COM/GETKINGED

story:
Try to think about having a bag with an unmistakable luxury that fits to every outfit, occasion and even your ever changing mood. Everything in one bag, with the possibility to change it whenever you want.
Try to think about a handmade bag produced in Italy, that respects the environment because it is made of regenerated leather.

You are thinking about File Bag!



Respect for the environment is related not only to the use of recycled materials, but also the innovative locking system and interchangeable flaps that allows to modify, quickly and easily, your own bag.
Different, suitable to every outfit and every mood, it wears and turns as the soul of the contemporary woman at any time of the day. In this way File Bag fits the principle of sustainability perfectly turning it into the ultimate lifetime product. 


With File bag every woman will have the freedom to create and re-create her own bag of heart over the years.
A unique bag that combines the luxury of reinventing itself every day but remaining itself like every woman Regenesi.



We want to keep on transforming waste into luxury items, beautiful and sustainable, as the exclusive File Bag. To do this we want to involve you!

Our goal is to share the challenge, start production of the collection, launch it on the market and especially to know the thoughts, opinions and tastes of each individual member of the community of which you'll be joining.

Protagonists the interchangeable flaps of File Bag, it will be offered in absolute preview.



What we want to achieve together?
With your contribution we would like to be able to offer the best flaps to make File Bag even more unique, giving it the ability to transform itself continually.
But you'll also be the first to have got them in the world!



EARLY BIRD: ONLY FOR FIRST 20 OF YOU!
File Bag Dark Blue or Cognac (including Pois Flaps and shoulder belt) - Big Size
$ 180 (Save $ 155 off Retail)
After you can take them at $ 210 (saving however $ 120 off Retail!)


CHOOSE YOUR FAVOURITE FLAP!
File Bag Dark Blue (including Pois Flaps and shoulder belt) - Big Size
+ 1 set of Flaps
$ 245 (Save $ 180 off Retail)

WHAT WILL BE YOUR FAVOURITE ONE?



CHOOSE YOUR FAVOURITE SHOULDER BELT!
File Bag Dark Blue or Cognac (including Pois Flaps and shoulder belt) - Big Size + 1 Shoulder belt
$ 245 (Save $ 180 off Retail)

RIBBON OR CHAIN: WHAT WILL BE YOUR FAVOURITE ONE?



TAKE A LOOK AT THE BEST OUTFITS CREATED BY AMANDA MARZOLINI, A FAMOUS ITALIAN FASHION BLOGGER, WITH FILE BAG!

  
 AS SEEN ON


...AND OTHER





Risks and challenges

We have a highly experienced team looking after this Regenesi project. We work with a very professional, organized factories that have decades of experience. Moreover we support them in every manufatcturing phases in order to produce in a timely manner. 
Although virtually no Kickstarter campaign is without a level of uncertainty in terms of volume and levels of interest, we are nevertheless confident that we've set ourselves achievable targets and delivery dates.

If you live outside EU, you will be responsible for any applicable duty/VAT charges. Regarding customs, some countries are known for being very slow with customs, and you probably know if you live in one. We will do everything for delivering fastly but we are not able to help them get through faster.

We'll update you frequently about our progress, and if there are any blips along the way, we'll let you know!

story:
We all love sunglasses! They’re the first thing someone notices about you. Having the right shades can be the difference maker in how we look, how we feel, and even how we perform.Most of all we just want our sunglasses to go together with everything we do just like hats, shoes or handbags. shadesclub™ is an all-inclusive solution for sunglasses.

Tired of paying $100s for sunglasses and losing them? 

Sunglasses are expensive! Marked up to over 20 times what they actually cost to make. With the huge price tags, it’s been impossible to afford all the sunglasses you need. You lose and break them easily, and they’re a pain to purchase and replace. Fighting over parking spots, long lines, poor service, the locked up cases, the brutal price gouging and shadiness. We were completely fed up.

So, we created a new way! We’re cracking open the sunglasses vault, giving you access to the one combination that’s always demanded, but never existed: Sunglasses that are incredibly designed and incredibly priced at the same time

Make no mistake – there was a lot of work to be done here! If you were to go out today and buy 12 designer pairs, you’d easily spend well over $1,500.00! 

This, is shadesclub™

It’s 12 premium pairs for the price of 1. It’s an entire collection in your home. We think you’ll really be into it. It’s simple, fun and affordable. Each month your shadesclub™ box will feature a brand new pair of sunglasses, designed for you to create new ways to coordinate and accessorize your world. We added modern convenience of home delivery, super-flexible terms and great service. All at the push of a button.

With shades for guys, and shades for girls.

Delivered right to your door.

So you can own an entire collection.

Your shades will change, but the familiar quality won’t and that’s our secret recipe. We make your shades at the same places as the world’s largest brands, and take away the huge markups while passing the savings on to you. With your continued support as a member, we can keep the quality high and prices low for our community. 

It’s simple, fun and affordable.

shadesclub™ is an all-inclusive solution for sunglasses, featuring each month's best styles, loaded with accessories and delivered right to your door. We think you’ll really be into it.Now, we need your support to lead the revolution to make shadesclub™ a reality. We hope you will become a member, and a part of history!

 

www.shadesclub.com



Flexible Terms!

We're beyond passionate. 

 We've got great lenses!

Comfortable frames.

With detailed precision.

 We have been working like mad scientists.

 Inspired to inspire.

We even fixed this.

Also receive our signature fold-up case in each box!

Our Signature Fold-up Case fully protects your shades, folds down to the size of an iPhone, and slides conveniently in your pocket or purse fitting your on-the-go lifestyle.

And bonus accessories.

We always aim for timeless.


How our 5-years of experience got us here.

Our trusted ability as designers is backed by an impressive, less than 1% return rate.We've been fully-focused over the past 5 years, with our own existing brand, Dicks Cottons. People who have tried our sunglasses, appreciate better quality and prices. So if you see a Stickman Logo on your shades, you'll know what it stands for universally. We focus on service and listening to people's needs, so much that owning multiple pairs is the new normal! Our customers have become our inspiration, as well as our friends. Naturally, shadesclub™ was created to take things even further, continuing to disrupt the industry, by pure demand.

What people are saying.

We've secured established industry connections, giving us the ability to make really nice quality eyewear. We pass the savings on to you. That’s it, it’s pretty simple. Finally, you can have the shades you need!

 

www.shadesclub.com


Our designs have inspired incredible pictures from around the world. As such, all of the images in our Kickstarter are from our customers, and were 100% user-submitted.

We treat customer service like we treat family. We'll be transparent and open, the way things should be. If you're not happy, for any reason at all, let us know and we'll fix it. We want your experience to feel like the perfect sunny day at the beach. We let the other companies provide the shadiness.

If you want to see why "designer" sunglasses are so expensive, 60 minutes did an exclusive on the industry. Watch this video and you'll understand who we're up against, and why we need your help to change an entire industry!

We're ready!

We chose crowdfunding, to meet people who like the idea of doing things made differently. Fun ideas that make sense, and make life easier.

We have over 5 years experience designing sunglasses. We’re optimistic to hit the ground running and get our initial three-month batch of shades ready for you. So far, we received very positive response from potential shadesclub™ members, from Kickstarter backers, as well as many notable industry leaders. We’re proud to give this to you first, before anyone else. Like all things, no one knows about your movement until it’s moving. 

We have world’s best sunglasses factories standing by, ready to produce for us. Not only will this make sure you that your membership starts on time, but ensure that it will be the highest possible quality. Getting to the next stage requires ordering in large volumes, which makes getting the prices down to for you, so please share. If you were to go out today and buy 12 pairs of designer sunglasses, you’d easily be spending well over $1,500.00! 

By backing our campaign today, you will be one of the first people in the world with a shadesclub membership. We’re in this for the long haul. We will continue to blaze the trail, fueled with fun, creativity, innovation and most importantly your support to build a community. So, grab your friends, and grab your shades. Let’s keep doing this our way. From us directly to you. Always.

Thanks,

- T.J. & Rich

 

www.shadesclub.com


Get Your Project Funded Today 

Risks and challenges

We've been in the industry for over 5 years, and we eat, sleep, and dream about sunglasses all day, every day. We've got some great experience under our belts on how to manufacture high-quality goods and fulfill lots of orders for them.

We also have the experience of dealing with completely unexpected issues, and always dealt with them in a way that leaves every last customer happy with their purchase and proud to support our company.

Our existing customers know that we always try to go the extra mile, no matter what. In short, we know what we're doing, and you should be very confident that we will deliver what we say we will, when we say we will. And we solemnly swear that should unforeseen issues come up, we will handle them with the utmost transparency and care for you, our backers. That is our guarantee.

Forecasting Risk 
If all goes well during our funding campaign, we'll finish up with a giant heap of preorders for shadesclub. Of course we're trying our hardest to predict our future demand and plan accordingly, but it's far from an exact science. While we have prepared for a large influx of members, it could be slightly off.

Supply Chain Risk 
As we've been working with certain manufacturers for several years now, we are confident in their ability to deliver for us. That being said, there could be unforeseen issues that arise that we will solve accordingly.

Acts of God 
We're based in Orlando, FL. Whatever happens, we'll get through it together. We promise.

We use the highest quality Polarized, CR-39, and REVO lens types! With mirrors, gradients and signature combinations, creating crisp, clear views with 100% UVA/UVB protection you can count on.
Comfortable frames.


With detailed precision.

Our handmade line showcases our innovation, with these insanely-cool hinges that self-tighten, instead of becoming loose!
 We have been working like mad scientists.

Sometimes, we even throw some inspirational quotes on the inside, to help keep you going!
We even fixed this.


Also receive our signature fold-up case in each box!

Our Signature Fold-up Case, fully protects your shades, folds down to the size of an iPhone!




Our Signature Fold-up Case fully protects your shades, folds down to the size of an iPhone, and slides conveniently in your pocket or purse fitting your on-the-go lifestyle.
And bonus accessories.

Bring your koozie to your BBQ, a concert and your ultimate tailgate!

Your included microfiber doubles as a lens cleaning cloth!

story:
We’re Jenn and Parker; co-founders of EROIX Underneathwear. We’ve created a men’s garment that makes your first layer your best layer.

We believe that every day is an adventure. We believe in intimacy. We believe in starting from the beginning. And we believe that, sometimes, the craziest ideas are the best ones. 

Creating EROIX is an expression of these beliefs. We started from the beginning. With your closest wearing garment.

And got this crazy idea:

We said no to what every other underwear manufacturer is doing: We said NoLastic to Elastic.

We created a precise, tailored, true-to-size fit that embraces your body instead of constricting or hanging off of it.

We’ve made your first layer just as good looking as the rest of your clothing. Something you can be proud to wear and to be seen in.

The result: EROIX Underneathwear. The perfect beginning to perfect style.

Underneathwear fits under all of your outerwear. Underneath shorts, EROIX breaths exceptionally well. Their minimal profile fits effortlessly under skinny or regular fit jeans, and their sleek tailoring is invisible underneath slacks or business attire. Best of all, Underneathwear will look great when you take any of those clothes off.

We've created two styles: The Boardroom, with a button closure. And The Suit & Tied, with a drawstring closure.

Along with a test-run of 300 pairs, we’ve spent the last year-and-a-half perfecting the cut and style of Underneathwear. The feedback we've received has been so positive that we're ready to officially launch EROIX here on Indiegogo.

We need your help to make sure EVERYBODY knows about EROIX. Please follow us on social media, tag your friends, relatives, and coworkers, and people you think would like or look good in Underneathwear, or send an email to your contacts. Together, we can change the look and feel of men’s underwear.

We’ve done a huge amount of work to get this far. You are the tipping point. By backing us, you help bring a unique concept to life, and disrupt an entire industry. That’s why we came to you. Together we make a powerful community.

Thanks for your support!

Photography and Videography by our close friend and professional, Kristen Hook. 

Editing by our close friend and professional, Craig Keefer.

Brian Ferguson and Lindsay Longacre for their invaluable consult, guidance, and friendship.

John Reyno for bringing an expert eye to everything we do.

Dan Noyes for helping us be seen and heard, and more importantly, for being a friend and mentor.

To our families, who provide us with support and encouragement, honest feedback, and free babysitting.

story:
who are we?

hi. we're BEVY. 

we're really into funky, unique, industrial-looking jewelry and pieces that have a lot of meaning-- two things that don't often mix.

on a plane ride back from new york city, our founder fatima (hi!) noticed a really trendy, hipster girl wearing a necklace with hearts gemstones that didn't match her skinny jeans, beanie, and motorcycle boots...at all.

while we're sure this piece had a ton of meaning, we wondered if we could do just a bit better: combine sexy, chic, and modern with personal and meaningful. that's when we came up with the GRID.

what is the GRID?

gone are the days of frilly hearts, birthstones, or obvious "special occasion" fare.

the GRID is the first industrial-chic necklace that celebrates a special date without compromising style.

with the GRID, you can walk down the street with a stellar necklace on and its special meaning will rest with you and only you. 

how it works:

 

say you want to celebrate your anniversary, which was on valentine's day 1996. we'll make you a customized pendant in gold or silver that commemorates your singular special date with black antiquing just like this:

our necklackes come in two styles:

what we need & what you get

BEVY's really been a labor of love for us -- we've worked tirelessly drawing and refining our design, getting 3D CAD illustrations and molds made for manufacturing over the last several months. we have our prototype ready, some photography complete, packaging design nearly done, and now we simply need to start manufacturing.

the quality of our pieces is really important to us so we've chosen to work with an excellent local manufacturer in portland, oregon.

however, since every one of our pieces is personalized and custom, our costs are higher than the average jewelry business. but there are ways that we can bring our costs down and make every piece affordable (but awesome quality) for you.

...and here's where you come in.

we need to raise $6,500 within the next 20 days so that we can:

  • pre-order 26 inch necklace chains in silver and gold in bulk.
  • place batch orders of pendants in silver and gold-plated silver (that we will then customize after each order). batch orders help dramatically reduce set up cost and keep each piece affordable for you.
  • complete packaging design and place our initial packaging orders.
  • order more photography for our website.

with our perks, we want to show our enormous appreciation for your help in getting us on our feet and give you first dibs at these amazing necklaces.

more than that, our goal is to turn BEVY into a full line of customized jewelry with the GRID necklace being our first of many pieces.

in addition to all of the perks listed on our indiegogo page, we'd also like to offer that all contributors in this initial round of funding will eligible for special "GRID Founders" discounts on future orders. 

...and here's the great news!

our perks are designed for us to guarantee that we can deliver on what we're offering but the closer we can get to our goal, the bigger the batches we can order, which will help us reduce our expenses and build the inventory we expect for the holiday season.

other ways you can help

we cannot wait to get started and your contributions will mean everything to our little operation. 

but there are other ways you can help too: spread the word! let your friends and family (and anyone looking for a sexy, unique, and meaningful gift for the holidays) know about the GRID.

if we get less than 50 people to purchase a necklace, we've met our goal and will hit the ground running! that's only two per day from anywhere in the world-- so please spread the word!

like us on facebook: http://www.facebook.com/BevyJewelry

thanks so so much!
