We offer custom sleeve and torso lengths for an uncompromised fit. We removed that traditional muffin top bunchingWe removed the elastic rib that bugged so many of you in traditional sweaters. We designed a straight-line t-shirt bottom to create a naturally slimming, bunch-free silhouette. Made your way. No need to shop aroundWe offer both v neck and crew neck in the most requested colors - classic navy and black. No need to shop around looking for the perfect combination. Reengineering a sweater with the best technical MerinoThe Better Sweater is made with a unique, technical 100% Italian Merino wool that traps any extra wool hairs inside itself. The result in a contemporary, cleaner look that's cool to the touch and soft on the skin. The sweater is odor resistant, breathable and moisture wicking. The Better Sweater is designed to be loved and worn all year around. “Quality that would cost two or three times as much at Bergdorf or Barneys.” — Joe, TF CustomerMade individually with 3D-knitting robots and humans in USAWe developed a proprietary technology to customize and manufacture each of our products individually and on demand so that each product can be customized to your style, color and fit preferences. All made in the US with Japanese robots. Made with zero wasteBy making apparel custom and on demand, we're creating wanted products with a home. We're fighting the mass manufacturing that results in unwanted and unsold products that end up in landfills and contribute to the 15 million tons of textile waste each year.Our business model and manufacturing method produces zero textile waste. Even more, our yarn comes from an Italian mill that uses solar power and a hydroelectric dam. Dammmmm.Fit GuaranteeWe proudly stand by all of our products. They are guaranteed to fit. If they don't fit the way you want the first time, we offer free exchanges for those in the US.  Additional rewardsWe are excited to offer some of our best-selling products as part of the rewards in this campaign. You can view many of them on www.thursdayfinest.comAll are customizable. All ship out for the holidays.Select a perk on the right. We'll email you instructions on how to customize it to your preferences after your purchase. The Founding TeamWhy does it seem like there are so many products and yet nothing fits? Instead of mass producing products in sizes that only fit mannequins. Why not custom make them to fit each person?Three years ago, Veronika and Michael, the husband and wife team behind Thursday Finest, set out to change the current fashion industry. To make customizable knitwear to fit each individual person and make it simple to get what you want. And do it all sustainably and in the US.⠀We studied in Japan to become 3D-knit programmers and developed the technology and programming in-house to reengineer these everyday products. If you are excited about creating a better future together and want to get a customizable product for yourself or someone for the holidays, we'd love to make it for you. Accessories and gift cards ship in December. FAQs:How do I make a purchase?Select a perk on the right and submit it. We will email you after you purchase with instructions on how to customize it. Thank you for your support!How will I customize the sweater? How will you know my size?At the conclusion of the campaign, we will send you a survey to take your sizing information. The questions are pretty easy. They are things you know right away (height, pant size etc.). We match that information to some data science on our side and customize your sweater to your perfect size.What if the sweater doesn't fit me?We stand by our products. If they don't fit the way you want the first time, we offer free exchanges for those in the US.  Do you do international shipping?
We offering international shipping.
Taxes and duties are not included in the shipping price since each country is different and will need to be paid when receiving your order.
When will I receive my order?
If you're purchasing socks, hats, scarves or tie rewards - DecemberAfter placing your order on indiegogo for the type of product you want, we will email you with instructions on how to customize. Your order will be made before the completion of the campaign and will be mailed in December.

If you're purchasing a sweater gift card - DecemberSweater gift cards will be mailed to the address on file the week of December 11th.

If you're purchasing a sweater - JanuaryYou will receive an email with instructions on how to customize your sweater at the end of the campaign. Sweaters will be made in January and February 2018 and mailed out on a rolling basis.

What if I don't know someone's size, but I want to them a gift?You don't need to know any sizing when purchasing a reward. You will have time to specify this after purchase.I want to get multiple items at once, but I'm having trouble at check out.
Each reward item needs to be purchased individually.
If you're trying to buy several items at once or want a corporate deal for a larger quantity, please email us at humans@thursdayfinest.com.
I have more questions, who can I ask?Email us: humans@thursdayfinest.com and we'll be happy to help!

story:
Short Summary

I've been making and selling these 1" round pin-back badges (buttons) for nearly ten years, just for some extra spending cash to supplement my disability allowance.  Unfortunately, in addition to many other physical ailments, I've been diagnosed with carpal tunnel syndrome and a ganglion cyst in my right wrist, and the circle-cutter I've used for years is now unusable to me --I can type with my splint, but I cannot operate the manual circle cutter, and using scissors or an X-Acto knife is too imprecise to be efficient (especially for such a small size).  I have found a graphic punch from the on-line store where I usually buy my badge parts, and it is significantly less than the minimum Indie Go-Go requires, but still out of my price range (about $200 after shipping).

What We Need & What You Get

  • $150 - graphic punch for circles to fit 1" pinback badges
  • $15 - optional pop-up accessory for cut circles (hopefully making things easier on my wrists)
  • $15 - shipping via UPS
  • $45 - extra parts,
  • $40 - extra printer ink (Epson Stylus), 
  • $6 - a ream of paper,
  • $5 - snacks for my cat,
  • remainder - travel fare to the next event I take these to or maybe I'll just withdraw any extra in Sacagewea dollars, and roll around on them in a speedo, like Scrooge McDuck, chanting "Gold! Gold!" in a bad Scottish brogue, then perhaps upload the video somewhere, because I have no shame

The Impact

  • When my wrists were still good, I provided badges at a bulk rate to local (and occasionally national and international) bands, vintage clothiers, art galleries, club nights and DJs, and even bloggers and podcasters.
  • Since the carpal tunnel syndrome has only been progressing in severity, I've had to turn down people who want badges.
  • If some-one goes some-where else for badges, this might not guarantee the same quality and fair pricing I can promise. 
  • My Etsy store is also impacted by this, as once I run out of designs I have plenty stock of from weekenders and other events (I will post my last "New Design" on 30 October 2012), my ability to make more in time to update the shop is anybody's guess.  My Etsy customers will be very sad and my ability to procure new customers will be reduced every week. :-(  Then eventually I'll completely run out of badges, and then I'll be sad. :-(

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Spread the word!  Post this to places, and hopefully every few hits will become a dollor or two, and that adds up.
  • Please don't message me to just get surgery.  I know several people who've had surgery for carpal tunnel syndrome and still don't have the mobility in their wrists that they had before the carpal tunnel problems began.  I'm also already getting surgery for the cyst, but my primary physivial says that even after the surgery, it could come back if I go back to doing shit like operating that old circle cutter.
  • I'm not sure when the next time is that I'll bring my badges to an event, but if you watch my blog at http://omo.peacockfairy.com, I'll give an update on when and where that may be, so stop over and say "Hi".
  • Favourite my store on Etsy
  • If you have a store, blog, band, or anything else that you might want little promotional badges for, just ask me for my info and we can work something out after my circle punch is here.  I've often worked for trade rather than cash --popular trade itens include: records (LPs or 45s; CDs are OK, too), vintage clothing and accessories (provided it can fit), books, listed for a club night/performance and drink tickets, t-shirts and other band swag....

My Etsy store is also impacted by this, as once I run out of designs I have plenty stock of from weekenders and other events (I will post my last "New Design" on 30 October 2012), my ability to make more in time to update the shop is anybody's guess.  My Etsy customers will be very sad and my ability to procure new customers will be reduced every week. :-(  Then eventually I'll completely run out of badges, and then I'll be sad. :-(

I'm not sure when the next time is that I'll bring my badges to an event, but if you watch my blog at http://omo.peacockfairy.com, I'll give an update on when and where that may be, so stop over and say "Hi".
Favourite my store on Etsy

If you have a store, blog, band, or anything else that you might want little promotional badges for, just ask me for my info and we can work something out after my circle punch is here.  I've often worked for trade rather than cash --popular trade itens include: records (LPs or 45s; CDs are OK, too), vintage clothing and accessories (provided it can fit), books, listed for a club night/performance and drink tickets, t-shirts and other band swag....

story:
Robby Brisco is currently a junior at Avon High School in Avon, CT and celebrated his sixteenth birthday back in November. He has been a member of the Avon High School soccer team for three years and he has also played on the AJAX premier team out of Bristol, CT for five years.

In early February of this year, Robby was diagnosed with desmoplastic small round cell tumor, an extremely rare form of childhood bone cancer. As of 2004, only two hundred cases have ever been described in medical literature and having this type of primary tumor in a bone has only been reported twice before Robby. He will have surgery later this year to remove part of his femur and his knee, as well as two surgeries to remove tumors which have already spread to his lungs. It is unlikely he will be able to play soccer or any other type of contact sport. Robby is a special kid.

Immediately after the cancer diagnosis, Robby began aggressive treatment. He has fourteen chemotherapy treatments scheduled about every two weeks, giving his body time to try and recover between treatments. These treatments are extremely costly and his family has dropped everything to support Rob through this fight. In fact, his two older brothers withdrew from college to be with him (you can see Robby and his brothers in the picture). His brothers played soccer at Avon High School for all four years and played on premier soccer teams too.

Our goal, through this tournament, is to help the Brisco family with costs of medical treatment, along with basic essentials. We want to show Robby that the soccer community is behind him! Therefore, we are dedicating our annual 4 v 4 tournament to Robby in his fight to “give cancer the boot”! Please support us in any way you can because we would love to give back to this loving family.

Sincerely, The Quinnipiac Women’s Soccer Team

story:
The Ayurveda Sundial ...

... is a chronograph with either two numeric or two graphically depicted time dials that simultaneously show the solar time (local apparent time) and time zone time (»normal« time). For this, 24- but also 12-hour dials are used. Sun cycles and ayurvedic dosha cycles as well as conventional time can be read within one display.

Using this new relational depiction, an extended type of viewing time has been developed, which may balance some of the deficits of time zone time.

  • Dynamic Solar Time
  • The Ayurveda Aspect
  • Welcome to Realtime
  • Timing and Status
  • The Funding

More informations, pictures and movies you find on our home page →

 

Dynamic Solar Time

Just since the 14th century - with the invention and propagation of the mechanical clockwork - has a fixed determination of the hour to 60 minutes and the division of the minute into 60 seconds been defined. Dividing a day (sunrise to sunset) into twelve units (hours) already began several thousand years ago. Because the time between sunrise and sunset is longer in summer than in winter, the length of an hour varies according to the season. Thus in ancient Rome, the longest hour in a day took about 75 minutes while the shortest took approximately 45 minutes according to today's time

↑ top

 

 

 

The Ayurveda Aspect

In the traditional Indian medicine of Ayurveda (»knowledge of life«, sanskrit: Ayus, Life und Vid, knowledge) day and night are divided into so-called doshas (essences). The »Kapha« dosha, for example, is present from 06:00 a.m. until 10:00 a.m. This time corresponds to the attributes of the representative elements (earth and water): heavy, inactive, cold, moist, etc.

It can be assumed that the essences of a particular time of day are determined primarily by the sun. Therefore the culmination of the sun is analogous to the energetic maximum in our self. At midday the »Pitta« dosha (corresponding to fire, heat, etc.) is dominant. 

The question is: »when is the middle of the day«?

The Ayurveda Sundial does not divide the day according to the »time zones«, but is based upon the position of the sun (local apparent time). Depending on the season, therefore, the first dosha may start at 7:50, and instead of the assumed four hours, it may laast only three hours. Or you may discover that midday seldomly arrives at 12:00, but rather that the high point of the sun and with it the height of the Pitta cycle sometimes may occur hours later.

↑ top

 

 

Welcome to Realtime

One of the deciding factors why I began to develop the Ayurveda Sundial eight years ago, was that stupid idea of »Daylight Saving Time«. Although the time zone difference can have a more significant impact on the time structure, the time change in March and October is the most irritating.

The effect of the energy balance is controversial. The consequences are highly questionable.

However, as you probably expect, such time manipulations do not influence the Ayurveda Sundial. Even if the time zone time is changed, the solar time (local apparent time, LAT) remains the same. 12:00 noon solar time (ST) is midday. The sun always rises at 6:00 a.m. ST at the first sun hour and sets at 6:00 p.m. ST at the first night hour. They are just as reliable as the daily dosha cycles.

↑ top

 

 

Architectural Installations (view page →)

 

Timing and Status

Presumably the App will be has been published in july May 2012 (see updates). With your contribution, very probably at an earlier date. There are still some little finishings on the interface and final compatibility test to do. Finally the app has to be approved by Apple. In case of the Android version no institutional checkup is necessary. IT's DONE, yipiiiiiie

You can already place your order for architectural installations. Further developments (Wrist Watches etc.) will start presumably in summer/autumn 2012.

 

The Funding

With your contribution you will save the finalisation of the App and the further development/realisation of the wrist watches and architectural installations. To become a contributor you just have to press the contibute-now-button and choose a perk, an amount and fill out a short form (sign up) – that's it. IndieGoGo accepts PayPal and credit cards.

Thanks a lot!

More informations, pictures and movies you find on our home page →

↑ top

 

Ayurveda Sundial Wrist Watches (view page →)

In case of the Android version no institutional checkup is necessary. IT's DONE, yipiiiiiie
You can already place your order for architectural installations. Further developments (Wrist Watches etc.) will start presumably in summer/autumn 2012.

To become a contributor you just have to press the contibute-now-button and choose a perk, an amount and fill out a short form (sign up) – that's it. IndieGoGo accepts PayPal and credit cards.

story:
Who I am

My name is Christian McMullin and I'm 27.  I have always wanted to design T-shirts and other appareal.  Z.O.R.D. (Zombie Operations Response Division) will soon be a company with your help.  These shirts will be made in the USA.  

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

I'm asking for $2000 so I may get my first batch of t-shirts and hats printed.  Eventually I will be expanding to other appareal like hoodies, hats.  Also will be making stickers, window decals, duffel bags, back packs, and all sorts of different things.  Donating will be able to get you stickers, t-shirts, and hats.  All money i recieve will go toward the production of shirts, and hats.  All perks will be shipped out once this campaign is over and I've got the product made.  If I get enough donations I will be sending more then 1 shirt to the people to claim those perks.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

go to https://www.facebook.com/zombieoperationsrespon... my facebook page to help spread the word.  You can also see some of the shirts and hat there.  Also the sticker that will come with one of the perks.

 

UPDATE:

If you would like to see one of the male shirts made into female shirts let me know.

I have added more perks for easier selection of a T-shirt.

I have added additional T-shirts and will work on coming out with more female shirts.

Hi! I'm Aristides and i'm a master's student in London College of Fashion.


                                                       pic.1   silk pyjamas



        The aim of the campaign is to raise money in order to produce my final collection.


                                          pic.2   work in progress


          But my goal is to show what's more in today's menswear fashion.

                                                pic.3   work in progress



In order to achieve the best quality i'm using digital print for the entire collection. Loungewear is a part of it, that's why i'm using silk twill, silk viscose velvet and silk satin as well as cotton satin, cotton drill and cotton poplin for the rest of the collection.

                          pic.4   pattern pieces to show how i work in photoshop




                                                 pic.5   silk pyjamas back



That's why i need your help!!


If you help me raise this amount of money I'll give my entire sketches collection printed or selected previous prints printed or handmade print t-shirt from the trakatrouka  collection or an invitation for the photo shooting in London or an invitation for the internal show.

                                                       pic.6   original sketch





                 THANK YOU FOR SUPPORTING ME AND MY PROJECT!!!!!!!

story:
She compels the world to notice her. She doesn’t want to look like everyone else, but she wants the same choices - the pleasure of exquisite buttons, the feel of real silk, the fit of fine wool, a tailored fit, and lingerie that is definitely NOT her mother’s. She understands it all. She wants it and she’s willing to pay for it.

Unfortunately, she knows the score. The fashion world is tone deaf to her needs. Sure, she could go to the “plus girls” shop or she could make her way to the “Women’s department” in the back…in the corner…in the dark, and find… Sweat pants to the left. Smock tops to the right. A muumuu here, a muumuu there.

Definitely not her style...

Plus-size retail is growing at about 4 to 6 percent yearly, versus 2 to 4 percent for the overall apparel industry. Estimates of this category’s annual sales range from $17 billion to $25 billion. That’s a healthy target population that is currently underserved. That’s an opportunity….

hippsTOO is the fun and highly marketable solution to the full figured woman’s frustration. hippsTOO will be THE TOP retailer bringing Edgy
fashion forward clothing for +Sizes to the door of this underserved
market. That’s right. We said DOOR!

Because hippsTOO will be the Southeast’s plus size mobile
boutique!

 

It’s not a new concept. In response to our highly mobile society’s
habits, vendors know convenience is key. Restaurants have done it for years, and retailers have adopted this exciting new business model. Now hippsTOO will bring this cutting edge mobile marketing to an underserved market, and retail magic is going to happen!

 

 

hippsTOO will operate out of a pre-owned, renovated and customized panel truck to keep capital startup investments low.  The hippsTOO truck will be equipped to provide our products and services in a comfortable and clean atmosphere.  The truck has ample space to store the products and seating space to allow sellers to take their time helping customers choose from our apparel lines. The truck will even offer dressing room space and a checkout counter. The layout has been carefully designed to eliminate any chance that our customer feels crowded or closed in. Instead, she will experience shopping nirvana in an intimate, private environment. Because, best of all, the hippsTOO truck will be completely stocked with classic, elegant, stylish, affordable fashions and accessories for the +size shopper. The setting, the service, and the offerings are designed and
guaranteed to SELL>SELL>SELL!

hippsTOO clothing will focus exclusively on +Sizes. But our accessories will be irresistible to women of all sizes.

The artfully designed truck will act as its own mobile billboard.  hippsTOO also plans to heavily utilize social media to promote the truck’s whereabouts. Each day our social media will be updated with
new arrivals, the location of the truck, and special sales.

Driving hippsTOO to success will be the ability to GO TO our customer rather than wait for them to a brick and mortar store. We will cater to private homes, offices, schools and churches, select the best
festivals for our target demographics…and party with the girls all over town.

-- hippsTOO will be zipping all over the south… in vibrant markets like Atlanta, Birmingham, Charlotte, and Chattanooga… and emerging markets like Macon, Athens, Greenville, Montgomery and more.

 

-- hippsTOO has initial funding through our savings. In addition to these funds, hippsTOO is working to raise $39,825. All donations will help with: purchasing and renovating the truck and obtaining licensing and permits.

But hippsTOO needs your help to raise additional start up funds.

So come on…DO IT! Kickstart hippsTOO!

Got hips? Love somebody who does?

Recognize an economic opportunity to clothe an underserved market? Like to invest in a sure thing? ALL of these are GOOD reasons to put hippsTOO on the road!!

Select the level of giving that you desire. And make a difference in our
entrepreneurial lives!

The collective spirit of generous angel investors like you will change the world…..

Please help us get the keys to the TRUCK…go to indiegogo.com ….RIGHT NOW!!


We hope that you feel empowered to support hippsTOO mobile boutique and if you do ...we will send you a VERY SPECIAL Thank you gift. Check out our list of donor rewards…hugs and kisses, social media thank you’s, swag bags, custom hippsTOO tee shirt, and even a hippsTOO dinner party in Atlanta.

 

We are reaching for the heavens and with your help ….curvy women all over the Southeast will be feeling – and looking – like superstars!

 Want to learn more about my fashion journey to get here? 

 

Thank you, from all of us at hippsTOO!
>>>  Contact us at ck@hippsTOO.com for more information
story_txt: She compels the world to notice her. She doesn’t want to look like everyone else, but she wants the same choices - the pleasure of exquisite buttons, the feel of real silk, the fit of fine wool, a tailored fit, and lingerie that is definitely NOT her mother’s. She understands it all. She wants it and she’s willing to pay for it.Unfortunately, she knows the score. The fashion world is tone deaf to her needs. Sure, she could go to the “plus girls” shop or she could make her way to the “Women’s department” in the back…in the corner…in the dark, and find… Sweat pants to the left. Smock tops to the right. A muumuu here, a muumuu there. Definitely not her style...Plus-size retail is growing at about 4 to 6 percent yearly, versus 2 to 4 percent for the overall apparel industry. Estimates of this category’s annual sales range from $17 billion to $25 billion. That’s a healthy target population that is currently underserved. That’s an opportunity….hippsTOO is the fun and highly marketable solution to the full figured woman’s frustration. hippsTOO will be THE TOP retailer bringing Edgyfashion forward clothing for +Sizes to the door of this underservedmarket. That’s right. We said DOOR!Because hippsTOO will be the Southeast’s plus size mobileboutique! It’s not a new concept. In response to our highly mobile society’shabits, vendors know convenience is key. Restaurants have done it for years, and retailers have adopted this exciting new business model. Now hippsTOO will bring this cutting edge mobile marketing to an underserved market, and retail magic is going to happen!  hippsTOO will operate out of a pre-owned, renovated and customized panel truck to keep capital startup investments low.  The hippsTOO truck will be equipped to provide our products and services in a comfortable and clean atmosphere.  The truck has ample space to store the products and seating space to allow sellers to take their time helping customers choose from our apparel lines. The truck will even offer dressing room space and a checkout counter. The layout has been carefully designed to eliminate any chance that our customer feels crowded or closed in. Instead, she will experience shopping nirvana in an intimate, private environment. Because, best of all, the hippsTOO truck will be completely stocked with classic, elegant, stylish, affordable fashions and accessories for the +size shopper. The setting, the service, and the offerings are designed andguaranteed to SELL>SELL>SELL!hippsTOO clothing will focus exclusively on +Sizes. But our accessories will be irresistible to women of all sizes.The artfully designed truck will act as its own mobile billboard.  hippsTOO also plans to heavily utilize social media to promote the truck’s whereabouts. ALL of these are GOOD reasons to put hippsTOO on the road!!Select the level of giving that you desire. story:
English

The CWA (Club Waterpolo Anglès) is a waterpolo club from Catalunya which was founded in 1996.

You can find us in Catalonia, the northeastern part of Spain, in our village called Anglès.

We play in the catalan league region and the age of our players goes from six up to fourteen years old.

Due to the economic crisis that is facing our country, we have many difficulties to finance the activities of the club, hence we have organized this half maraton to raise funds for our cause. The objective of the Half Maraton Dospiks is to obtain funds for the CWA activities once covered the costs of the running event (insurances, infrastructure, trophies, drinks, etc).

Then, we will be able to offer to our young members the facilities and services needed. All the coaches from CWA are volunteers who work without wage compensation.

We need 2000 $ for the Half Maraton Dospiks and we expect to get about 4800 $ from running inscriptions. These 4800$ would represent about 30% of the annual budget of the CWA.

If you are thinking about running the Dospiks, we will be glad to help you in case you need advice about accommodation, transport, etc. Do not hesitate to contact us at dospiks@yahoo.es. 

Thanks for your attention.

CLUB WATERPOLO ANGLÈS

Castellano

El CWA es un club de waterpolo de Catalunya, el club fue fundado el 1996.

Somos de Anglès, un pequeño pueblo de la provincia de Gerona. (C.P.17160).

Jugamos a waterpolo a la liga catalana. Nuestro equipo junior está formado por jóvenes que van de los 6 a los 14 años.

Debido a la fuerte crisis económica que está sufriendo nuestro país, tenemos muchos problemas para financiar la actividad de nuestro club y es por esta razón que realizamos esta carrera de montaña. Necesitamos dinero para cubrir gastos de la carrera y si tenemos excedentes se destinaran a contribuir a los gastos de desplazamientos de la próxima temporada.  

Nuestro único objetivo es recaudar fondos para mantener el club con su actividad.

Necesitamos 1500 € y con este dinero podremos obtener aproximadamente unos 3500 € de las inscripciones de los corredores. Estos  3500 € obtenidos equivalen a un 30% del presupuesto anual de gastos de una temporada.

Muchas gracias por tu atención.

CLUB WATERPOLO ANGLÈS 


Català

El CWA es un club de waterpolo de Catalunya, el club es va fundar el 1996.

Som d’Anglès, un petit poble de la provincia de Girona (C.P. 17160)

Juguem a waterpolo a la lliga catalana. El nostre equip junior esta format per jugadors d’edats compreses entre els 6 i els 14 anys.

Degut a la forta crisis econòmica del nostre país, tenim molts problemes per finançar l’activitat del nostre club i es per això que fem aquesta cursa de muntanya. Necessitem diners per pagar les despeses de la cursa i si tenim excedents es destinaran a pagar els desplaçaments de la propera temporada.

El nostre únic objectiu es recaudar fons per mantenir el club amb la seva activitat.

Necessitem 1500 € i amb aquests diners podem obtenir aproximadament 3500 € de les inscripcions dels corredors. Aquests 3500 € obtinguts equivalen al 30% del pressupost de despeses d’una temporada.

Moltes gràcies per la teva atenció.

CLUB WATERPOLO ANGLÈS.

Junior team just before the match!

The youngest members of the club, the future is comming!

story:
The Rosa Bag is an elegant, vegan leather bag with timeless style and maximum wearability as a crossbody, backpack or shoulder bag.

 

 

The handmade bag’s sustainable material is scratch-proof and stronger than leather, but you’d never know by the delicate designer look!

 

 

 

No more changing bags throughout the week (or day!). With The Rosa Bag, you’ll feel good and look good while carrying everything you need in the most convenient, sustainable way.

 

 

 

 


Every Rosa Bag is made from one pound of recycled car glass from landfills, helping reuse an important source of waste that otherwise contaminates the planet. Compared to one traditional leather bag, we save 9.7 gallons of water and generate zero methane gas emissions!

 

 

Most vegan leather products are just plastic—they come from PU or PVC and aren’t truly eco-friendly, but not The Rosa Bag! There is no other vegan leather bag that is made from recycled car glass.

 


This vegan leather’s extreme durability is what allows our bags to last a lifetime. And the best part? You can’t tell it’s recycled and you won’t believe it’s not leather!

 

 

 

 

Say goodbye to your receipt, hair tie and gift-card graveyard known as a purse!

 

 

The Rosa Bag carries 20 perfectly-organized pounds effortlessly so you never have to compromise on an ‘essential’ to stay stylish. Despite its large capacity, you never have to worry about it looking bulky.

 

 

It’s designed to look slim and sleek even while full!

 

 

It’s like a magician’s hat—it stays slim no matter how many essentials you put in!

 

 

 

 

 

No more digging for your keys, spilled water bottles or finding everything ‘floating’ in your bag. The Rosa Bag’s clever organization ensures you can carry everything you need and easily find it.

 

 

 

 

The Rosa Bag can be worn as a handbag, crossbody or backpack so you can transition seamlessly from work to the gym to nighttime chic!

 

 

When it comes to bags, you usually have to choose one per function: one handbag for work, one backpack for commuting on your bicycle and one crossbody for shopping or a night out. The Rosa Bag will be your last bag, because you can literally wear it every day, forever!

 

 

 

 

 

 

Handbag: Attach the rounded shoulder strap to each side of the bag using both clasps.

 

 

Backpack: Place the two flat adjustable straps on the back of the bag, attaching both straps to the top central loop, and then attaching the other side of each strap to one of the loops on the lower back sides. You can remove the rounded shoulder strap or leave it, as well.

 

 

Crossbody Bag: With just one of the flat straps, attach each side with the snaps to each of the side loops in the bag. Adjust the size by sliding the buckle.

 

 

 

 

The modern-day lifestyle is changing. We have to be conscious of our buying actions and the lines that used to separate our work lives from our social lives, from our family lives and so on, are blurry now and seem to disappear. 

 

 

Unfortunately, the fashion industry hasn’t caught up yet—it’s rife with waste and full of trade-offs. If you want a vegan bag, it looks cheap and is made of plastic.

 

 

We need one bag that seamlessly transitions with our daily activities. 

 

 

Its creation responds to the growing demand for fewer, better, long-lasting fashion items.

 

 

Pick the perfect Rosa Bag for you with 3 chic color options: Grey, Black or Cognac. 

 

 

The Burgundy and Rose color options are achievements that can be unlocked and available by sharing this campaign on social media.

A survey will be sent to all backers once the campaign completes which will allow you to select the color of your bag and the color of your ad-ons.

 

 

 

The large outer flap closes with a convenient snap button that keeps your bag completely closed in transit.

 

 

The Rosa Bag is handmade in Spain in a workshop that also manufactures bags for top tier European designer brands.

 

 

It’s not manufactured on an assembly line or made by machines, it’s actually handmade using traditional techniques that take a lot of time on each piece—going back to the basics of craftsmanship. 

 

 

Look closely at details like the stitching and edge painting to see for yourself!

 

 

 

The Rosa Bag doesn’t have to be your last bag. It’s just likely you won’t need another bag for years—it’s that tough and versatile!

 

 

 

Carry your laptop, books and other business-y essentials and still look cute and stylish. Your Rosa Bag will keep everything organized so you can find your glasses, pen or headphones at a moment’s notice!

 

 

 

The Rosa Bag is tear-proof, water-resistant, stain-proof and scratch-proof, making it kid and pet-friendly.

 

 

The bag’s vegan leather exterior is so tough because car glass uses Polyvinyl Butyral (PVB). It’s a resin used for applications that require strong binding, like laminated glass in automobile windshields.

 

 

You’ll enjoy your Rosa Bag in top condition for years to come!

 

 

The Rosa Bag’s 3-way wearability means you can stay comfortable even if you’re on-the-go for hours. If your arm or shoulder gets tired carrying it one way, switch up the straps. Or if you need to carry more than usual, put your Rosa Bag in backpack mode to effortlessly carry up to 20 pounds!

 

 

 

Commuting through town? Put your Rosa Bag in backpack mode for maximum mobility and then stroll into work, school or wherever you are with a tasteful handbag fit for the runway.

 

 

 

No more pre-trip packing breakdowns, overweight baggage or broken suitcases—at least not due to multiple purses!

 

 

The Rosa Bag is 3 bags in 1 so you have maximum space for clothes, shoes and toiletries!

 

 

Concert, bar or birthday party—someone will notice your Rosa Bag. They may comment how high-end it looks or simply mention they like it. Either way, be prepared to share you have the first purse made of recycled car glass! ;) 

 

 

 

 

 

We’re a small, women-owned business that makes stunning fashion products with kindness and care. While all our products benefit the environment and give back to those in need, The Rosa Bag is special.

 

 


Our core purpose is to provide women with beautiful fashion accessories that are socially and environmentally conscious, and set an example for sustainable fashion along the way. All our products are eco-friendly and vegan, and 10% of our profits go towards helping young women in Bogota, Colombia access education and develop leadership skills.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


We have worked extremely hard to make this product ready for full-scale manufacturing and fulfillment, but here are what we see as the risks and our plan to assess them:

MANUFACTURING: The manufacturer is lined up, and we have quality assurance people on site during production.

FULFILLMENT: Sometimes things get a bit crazy and stuff happens that can’t be planned for: a supplier misses a deadline or a shipment gets lost. Those things could cause a delay. We are using an experienced logistics team to get our products to you. We’ll keep open and honest communication with you through our process so you know where your product is and when it’s going to get to you.

story:
“Traditional craftsmanship is the foundation of our vision. Quality is high, while prices stay fair. How so? We reach consumers around the world directly from the traditional workshops in the heart of France, cutting out any unnecessary middle-man”

DEPANCEL is the contraction of Delage, Panhard and Facel Vega, illustrious jewels of the French industry. Our inspiration lies in their industrial vision, as well as in their "Made in France" to which they are closely linked. Industrial dynamics, accessibility and know-how: these are the three essential components of Depancel. 

 

 

The AUTO 24H - 9120 has a 24H function. It single-hand at 6H on the dial shows a time display of 24H. This type of watch is used by military, astronauts or airline pilots, among others. They are particularly useful for those who cross different time zones in both directions or who are deprived of the view of the sun as a landmark.

 

  

 

 

                                                                             

 

Our straps are handmade in France with bull leather. You will be able to choose from one of five straps after the campaign, if you want more than one strap just add 50€ per extra strap to your pledge!

You can pick the strap of your choice:

20mm straps matching our entire collections

This strap is made from high quality bull-skin here in the France. We designed these to be that "all-purpose" strap that goes with everything. 

These straps are a play on those amazing 1960s racer-style straps seen on the great timepieces of early Formula 1, but with an upgraded hide, increased durability and with a decidedly more aggressive look. Each Depancel Racing Strap is hand-made in France.

These leather and tweed fabric straps were designed to bridge the gap between casual and dressy styles. This tweed pattern is inspired by vintage car seat and suit fabric. The leather lining ensures comfortable wear on the wrist.

Have you noticed our signature? The tricolor stitches, a tribute to our French origins...

Our straps width is  20/18mm with 9 holes. They fit 16 to 24 cm wrists perfectly and are available in three different colors: black, brown and tweed.

 

Smooth Leather Watch Pouch

Our Smooth Leather Pouches are handmade in France with calf leather crust, and these are a great way to carry and protect a single watch. On the flap you will find our logo discreetly placed. Due to the unique nature of the materials used, and the human element of their construction, each pouch has a personality all its own.

Leather Covered Notebook

We all love a good notebook, to save our next big ideas. Which is why we decided to create one with a calf leather crust cover handmade in France. You can see Depancel logo on the cover. Unlike many other notebooks, this one lies perfectly flat, so it's easy to carry it everywhere on your pocket.

9 × 14 cm, 48 pages, Paper: 90g wood-free, Made In France

Our company has been manufacturing watches since 2015, we have already sold and delivered several thousand watches under the brand KOPPO, with which we already made a Kickstarter campaign in 2016 (176k€ raised). This first experience allowed us to set up a solid supply chain, from production to delivery.

WARRANTY:  

We believe that our products should be built to last. That’s why every Depancel watch isguaranteed for life (except for the sapphire crystal glass and the strap). We are able to offer this guarantee because we source only the best available watch components and rigorously examine our watches at each step of production to ensure every timepiece shipped from our factory operates with flawless precision. 

SHIPPING:

Depancel watches and accessories will be shipped worldwide from France. You may be responsible for taxes and duties applicable in your country. All our timepieces will be shipped in an oak wooden box:

 ESTIMATED DELIVERY:  

We have spent more than one year working on and testing our prototypes to meet the qualifications we ourselves would expect from a Mechanical watch. With the solid experience we built we are confident that we will meet our projected delivery dates. We have built the schedule with our manufacturing partners to ship by the projected dates. Our manufacturers stand ready to activate production as soon as we meet our Kickstarter funding goal.  

So we will start shipping the watches in September 2018.

 

DO YOU NEED TO CONTACT US?

 You can ask us anything at help@depancel.com

Discover more pictures of our watches on our instagram :

 

 

 

 

 

La fabrication en France est au cœur de notre projet. Comment pouvons-nous vraiment vous proposer des produits d’une grande qualité fabriqués en France qui restent si accessibles ? C’est simple, nous distribuons nos produits directement sans intermédiaire.

Depancel est la contraction de Delage, Panhard et Facel Vega, illustres fleurons de l’industrie française. Notre inspiration se trouve dans leur vision industrielle, ainsi que dans leur « Fabriqué en France » auquel elles sont étroitement liées. Dynamique industrielle, accessibilité et savoir-faire français : voilà les trois composantes essentielles de Depancel. À parts égales. 

 

                                                    

Nous avons choisi de rendre hommage aux savoir-faire français à travers une première collection de montres inspirées de l’univers automobile, de son ancrage local, de la dynamique industrielle qu’elle a insufflé à la France entière il y a tout juste 100 ans.

Le modèle AUTO 24H - 9120 possède une fonction 24H, mono aiguille qui permet un affichage du temps sur 24H afin de se situer immédiatement dans la journée. Les montres de ce type sont notamment utilisées par les militaires, les astronautes ou les pilotes de ligne. Elles se révèlent en effet particulièrement pratiques pour tous ceux qui traversent différents fuseaux horaires dans les deux sens ou qui sont privés de la vue du soleil comme point de repère.

 

                                      

                                           

 

 

Nos bracelets sont fabriqués en France avec du cuir de taureau. Vous serez en mesure de choisir parmi l'un des cinq bracelets proposés après la campagne.

Tous nos bracelets sont compatibles avec des montres d'une entrecorne de 20mm. Si vous souhaitez plus d'un bracelet, il suffit d'ajouter 50 € par bracelet supplémentaire à votre contribution !

Ce bracelet est fabriqué à partir de cuir de taureau de haute qualité ici en France. Ces bracelets ont été pensés pour être  «passe partout», ils sublimeront votre montre en toutes circonstances.  

Ces bracelets inspirés du style des montres de course des années 1960 vues sur les circuits de Formule 1, donneront un look résolument sport à votre montre. Chaque bracelet racing Depancel est fait à la main en France.

Ces bracelets bi-matières en cuir et tweed ont été pensés pour proposer un compromis original entre les styles sport et habillé. Ces modèles sont inspirés de l'habillage des voitures anciennes et des tissus de costumes. La doublure en cuir assure un confort optimal au poignet.  

Avez-vous remarqué notre signature sur nos bracelets ? La surpiqûre tricolore est un clin d’œil à notre engagement pour le Fabriqué en France... 

Pochette de voyage :   

Nos pochettes en croûte de cuir, fabriquées en France sont un excellent moyen de transporter et de protéger votre montre. Sur le rabat, vous trouverez le logo Depancel marqué à chaud. 

Pochette pour montre en croûte de cuir

6,5 × 13,5 cm, fermeture à pression, Fabriqué en France

 Carnet de notes en cuir :  

Nous aimons avoir un petit carnet, pour y graver toutes nos idées. C'est pourquoi nous avons décidé d'en créer un qui nous ressemble, avec une couverture en croûte de cuir faite à la main en France. Vous pouvez voir le logo Depancel sur la couverture. Robuste et peu épais, ce carnet se glisse sans problème dans la poche arrière du pantalon ou dans celle d'une veste, afin de le garder avec vous dans toutes les circonstances.

9 × 14 cm, 48 pages, papier : 90g wood-free, Fabriqué en France  

 

Notre société existe depuis 2015 et nous avons déjà vendu et livré plusieurs milliers de montres sous la marque KOPPO, avec laquelle nous avons déjà fait une campagne Kickstarter en 2016 (176k€ de précommandes). Nous n'en sommes donc pas à notre coup d'essai, puisque cette première expérience nous a permis de mettre en place une supply chain solide, de la production à la logistique. 

GARANTIE À VIE :  

Nous croyons que les produits doivent être faits pour durer. C'est pourquoi chaque montre Depancel est garantie à vie (à l'exception du verre saphir et du bracelet). Nous sommes en mesure d'offrir une telle garantie parce que nous utilisons toujours les composants les plus fiables.

LIVRAISONS :  

Toutes nos montres seront expédiées dans un coffret en bois :

Les montres et accessoires Depancel seront expédiés dans le monde entier depuis la France. Attention, si vous habitez hors de l'UE, vous êtes responsable des taxes et droits de douanes qui pourraient être applicables dans votre pays.

Nous avons passé plus d'un an à travailler sur nos prototypes afin de répondre aux spécifications que nous attendons d'une montre mécanique. Grâce à la solide expérience que nous avons acquise, nous sommes confiants sur le fait que nous respecterons le délai de livraisons. Nous avons mis en place le calendrier avec nos partenaires afin d'expédier les montres dans les délais prévus.

Nous allons donc commencer à expédier les montres en septembre 2018.

ECRIVEZ-NOUS !

Vous souhaitez nous poser une question ? Ecrivez-nous à l'adresse suivante : help@depancel.com

Découvrez plus d'images de nos montres sur notre instagram :
story_txt: “Traditional craftsmanship is the foundation of our vision. Quality is high, while prices stay fair. How so? We reach consumers around the world directly from the traditional workshops in the heart of France, cutting out any unnecessary middle-man”DEPANCEL is the contraction of Delage, Panhard and Facel Vega, illustrious jewels of the French industry. Our inspiration lies in their industrial vision, as well as in their "Made in France" to which they are closely linked. Industrial dynamics, accessibility and know-how: these are the three essential components of Depancel.   The AUTO 24H - 9120 has a 24H function. It single-hand at 6H on the dial shows a time display of 24H. This type of watch is used by military, astronauts or airline pilots, among others. They are particularly useful for those who cross different time zones in both directions or who are deprived of the view of the sun as a landmark.                                                                                   Our straps are handmade in France with bull leather. You will be able to choose from one of five straps after the campaign, if you want more than one strap just add 50€ per extra strap to your pledge!You can pick the strap of your choice:20mm straps matching our entire collectionsThis strap is made from high quality bull-skin here in the France. We designed these to be that "all-purpose" strap that goes with everything. These straps are a play on those amazing 1960s racer-style straps seen on the great timepieces of early Formula 1, but with an upgraded hide, increased durability and with a decidedly more aggressive look. Each Depancel Racing Strap is hand-made in France.These leather and tweed fabric straps were designed to bridge the gap between casual and dressy styles. This tweed pattern is inspired by vintage car seat and suit fabric. The leather lining ensures comfortable wear on the wrist.Have you noticed our signature? The tricolor stitches, a tribute to our French origins...Our straps width is  20/18mm with 9 holes. They fit 16 to 24 cm wrists perfectly and are available in three different colors: black, brown and tweed. Smooth Leather Watch PouchOur Smooth Leather Pouches are handmade in France with calf leather crust, and these are a great way to carry and protect a single watch. On the flap you will find our logo discreetly placed. Due to the unique nature of the materials used, and the human element of their construction, each pouch has a personality all its own.Leather Covered NotebookWe all love a good notebook, to save our next big ideas. Which is why we decided to create one with a calf leather crust cover handmade in France. You can see Depancel logo on the cover. Unlike many other notebooks, this one lies perfectly flat, so it's easy to carry it everywhere on your pocket.9 × 14 cm, 48 pages, Paper: 90g wood-free, Made In FranceOur company has been manufacturing watches since 2015, we have already sold and delivered several thousand watches under the brand KOPPO, with which we already made a Kickstarter campaign in 2016 (176k€ raised). This first experience allowed us to set up a solid supply chain, from production to delivery.WARRANTY:  We believe that our products should be built to last. That’s why every Depancel watch isguaranteed for life (except for the sapphire crystal glass and the strap). We are able to offer this guarantee because we source only the best available watch components and rigorously examine our watches at each step of production to ensure every timepiece shipped from our factory operates with flawless precision. SHIPPING:Depancel watches and accessories will be shipped worldwide from France. story:
NOW BEING SOLD ON OUR WEBSITE ARDENCOVE.COM

This campaign is now closed. Please visit our website to order these bags! We have more styles of anti-theft and waterproof bags and accessories, and new ones are available for pre-order.

 

Arden Cove makes beautiful, durable bags for travel and everyday use: protect your belongings in style.

 

 

Overview | Colors | Stretch Goals | Story | Features | Perks | Sizes | Timeline | Share | Specs | Team | FAQ

 

The Anti-Theft Travel Crossbody comes in 5 awesome colors! Click here for a closer look & written description of each color. 

 

*NOW FUNDED! We're cooking up some more bonus features & upgrades as thanks for helping us reach our stretch goals! ;)

 

PERFECT FOR TRAVEL OR EVERYDAY

 

While traveling, we’ve seen our fair share of crime on the road:

  • You bump into someone while exiting the train, while another person reaches into your bag from behind.
  • Standing at a museum, you hear a little “click” from your purse, only to turn around and suddenly realize someone was standing a little too close.
  • The train comes to a stop and in the ensuing crowd you realize someone has grabbed your bag and is quickly leaving the station.
  • You’re standing in line and notice someone moving a strange device a little too close to your bag. Were they scanning your credit cards?

We’ve designed a beautiful bag to combat these all-too common crimes, to ward off thieves and opportunists while providing an elegant and functional bag that’s perfect for travel or everyday use.

We’ve made our way through several bags that promised to protect our things, and they fall apart in a matter of months. Caught out in a sudden downpour? Everything in your bag soaked and damaged. And worst of all: over time the material rips and falls apart leaving you in a pickle.

Not with the Arden Cove Anti-Theft Crossbody.

Born out of necessity, the Arden Cove Anti-Theft Crossbody is a beautiful, functional, and sturdy day bag designed for the tasteful modern woman. With extreme attention to functionality and durability, the Anti-Theft Crossbody is made to not only protect your belonging from people who want to take it from you, but also withstand the climates and stress bags undergo while in everyday use or while traveling.

Arden Cove started with two sisters who wanted to make bags they couldn’t find on the market. Tired of poorly-made or cute-but-useless bags. We wanted bags that were beautiful and functional. Bags that would endure the abuse we put our belongings through day in and day out.

Over several months we’ve gone through many prototypes and iterations. We’ve refined our core vision for what the Anti-Theft Crossbody can be while also making something beautiful and functional suitable to a wide range of uses. All of this hard work and effort has led us to the bag you see here. The perfect companion for every-day use or the on-the-go traveler.

 

 

Every single feature you see on the Arden Cove Anti-Theft Travel Crossbody has been purposefully built and extensively tested for optimal functionality.

Full Body Anti-slash

Most “Anti-theft” bags currently on the market are actually only anti-slash on the bottom portion of the bag. That doesn’t protect you if a thief is standing behind you on a crowded bus and decide to do a little digging with a pocket knife. While we still suggest you to keep your bag in front of you in crowded areas, even if you get a little distracted looking at the Mona Lisa, our bag is protected from all sides, so thieves can BACK OFF!

Cut-proof strap

Having a anti-slash body is no use if a thief just cuts the strap and makes off with the whole bag! Our strong, chainlink strap will deter thieves targeting purses with thin leather straps. The strap comes in two lengths: 18", 20", and 23" drop length. See our chart below under "Size Guide" to figure out which length is perfect for you. 

Detachable Strap

The Strap also clips open so that you can wrap it around your chair at a restaurant or a pole on a train. That way they can’t grab or kick the bag. While it’s not a lock, thieves are looking for easy paydays, so if they see that your bag is attached, they’ll move on to an easier target.

Lobster Clasp Zipper pulls

Sneaky little fingers might try to pull a zipper or two open. Our clip zippers will lock onto the metal clip, deterring potential thefts from trying to open your bag. Chose to use it all the time, or lock up when you’re in a crowded area.

RFID protection

The built in wallet provides RFID protection, which means that tech-savvy thieves won’t be able to pick up your private information with RFID readers.

Waterproof Body & Zippers

Even if you’re caught in a sudden downpour in the middle of a rice paddy in Bali and still have to walk 30 minutes back to your hotel (true story), your valuables will be protected! Not just water resistant, our bag is 100% waterproof with a waterproof nylon exterior and waterproof zippers. So never fear a sudden change in weather, or you know, someone spilling their drink on you (also a true story).

Comfortable Padded Strap

The chain strap comes with a microfiber vegan leather pad for added comfort. Rather than transitioning the strap from chain to leather, which can be easily cut, the pad wraps around the chain. It is also adjustable up and down the chain to find a comfortable position for you.

Ample Storage for all your stuff

The bag is sized to perfectly store all necessities, but also be non-invasive when out and about all day. See our “What Size to Choose” to see what works for you.

Metal Studs Protect the Bottom 

The Full size crossbody will have 4 metal stud feet to protect the bottom of the bag from wear and tear when you set your bag down. 

  • Dimensions:
    • Full: L: 8.5”, H: 6.5”, W: 2.5”
    • Mini: L: 6.5”, H: 4.5”, W: 2.25”

 

The best way to determine the length for you is to take a crossbody you already love the length of on you. Then measure it from the top of the center of the bag to the apex of the strap when taught. Here is a general height guide, but of course, you are welcome to pick the length you prefer since everyone has different preferences!

Click here for more for images of both Full Size and Mini size bags on a 18", 20", and 23" drop length chain strap on models at various heights.

 

 

 

Below you can find all the specs for the Anti-Theft Travel Crossbody.

If there is a spec that you don't see, you can always contact us for more information.

  • Dimensions:
    • Full: L: 8.5”, H: 6.5”, W: 2.5”
    • Mini: L: 6.5”, H: 4.5”, W: 2.25”
  • Drop Length:
    • ​Two options, 20" or 23"
  • Weight:
    • Full: 1.2 lbs (19.2 oz)
    • Mini: 0.8 lbs (12.8 oz)
  • Material: Waterproof Nylon, Vegan Leather, Satin Polyester
  • Waterproof: Yes, Body & Zipper
  • Number of Exterior Pockets:
    • Full: 2
    • Mini: 1
  • Number of Interior Pockets:
    • Full: 2 Wall pockets, 1 Zipper pocket
    • Mini: 1 Zipper pocket
  • Built in Wallet: Yes
    • Full: 8 card slots & Bill slot
    • Mini: 4 card slots & slot for folded bills

 

Arden Cove was founded by two sisters born and raised in San Francisco, California. Ever since we were little, we always found projects to work on together: baking cakes, making clay models, building a website. Our DIY attitude drove us to continuously ask ourselves what we wanted, and how to make it better. We haven't stopped since.

We are dedicated to making delightful functional bags that solves problems. Earlier this year, we launched our Daily Laptop Backpack. When we were contemplating our next bag, we turned to our shared love of travel and started dreaming up the Anti-theft waterproof crossbody. After months of iterations, we have arrived at our dream bag, and want share it with the world.

Carmen always found startups scary and fascinating, and is interested in all things entrepreneurial and tech. While working as a Program Manager for the Ads API at Twitter and with a long history in performance marketing, she’s always tinkering with something in her free time, including making home-brewed Kombucha, programing games, and is now taking on the challenge of running a business!

Karin is the creative one in the partnership. With a double major in Fine arts and Art History and a background in graphic design, photography, and film/publications, she’s obsessed with creating bags that not only look nice, but are also functional and practical. True to both sisters’ maker mentality, she had created over 145 videos for her educational art history channel, Little Art Talks on YouTube.

 

WHY INDIEGOGO?

We are launching on Indiegogo to raise the funds to meet our minimum order. We want to make sure it's a bag you'll love, so we are excited to have this direct relationship with you through this platform. By raising funds directly from customers, we can ensure that the bags are what you are really looking for, and build our product with the support of an engaged community.

If I purchase a Combo pack (more than one bag) can I mix and match the colors?

Yes, you will be able to pick the color for each individual bag you purchase from the colors available by the end of the campaign. We will send an survey to backers asking what colors they are interested in if stretch goals are met. At the end of the campaign, an official survey will be sent to select the colors of your bags. 

How long is the chain strap? Is it adjustable?

The chain strap is not adjustable, but instead will be available in three lengths. At the end of the campaign, choose from either a 18", 20", or 23" drop length. We suggest taking a crossbody you already enjoy the length of, and measuring from the center of the top of the bag, or the apex of the strap when taught. Then select the length closest to this number. A general height guide we suggest is the following: 18": <5'2", 20": 5'2"-5'8", 23": > 5'5". We do suggest the first method if possible due to different torso lengths and preferences.  Click here to read our blog post and see more pictures. 

I would prefer a non-chain strap. Can you make this an option?

Many people have requested this, and we spent a good deal of time trying different prototypes. Unfortunately, they ended up being labor intensive, and thus expensive to produce. While we would love to offer this, we opted to not offer this alternative to not delay our timeline and instead extended our offered chain lengths. Hopefully with the three offered chainlengths (18", 20", 23" drop length) everyone will be able to find a length they enjoy! 

Will the wall pockets of the full size bag fit my iPhone 6/7 ? 

Yes, the wall pocket is large enough to fit the iPhone 6, 7, and Google Pixel XL. It will also comfortably fit any smaller smart phones.

Risks and challenges

The Arden Cove team has experience in manufacturing, logistics, and product design. We do not anticipate any major problems in the production or being able to deliver the Anti-Theft Travel Crossbody on time. If any major concerns regarding design comes up, we will be sure to address it as necessary.

MANUFACTURING

Our factory is located in China. We have personally visited and developed a strong relationship with the factory for the past 2 years, and have collaborated before on our Daily Laptop Backpacks. We tested with other factories when producing the first Anti-Theft Waterproof Crossbodies, and we ultimately came back to our original manufacturer due to their quality craftsmanship and reliability. In the event of substantial demand for the Anti-Theft Travel Crossbody, we are confident our factory will be able to ramp up production and deliver on time while maintaining the quality they are known for.

We are in constant communication with the factory and will personally be on-site for material sourcing and to oversee production and solve any problems in person.

We’ve refined our core vision for what the Anti-Theft Crossbody can be while also making something beautiful and functional suitable to a wide range of uses. All of this hard work and effort has led us to the bag you see here. The perfect companion for every-day use or the on-the-go traveler.  Every single feature you see on the Arden Cove Anti-Theft Travel Crossbody has been purposefully built and extensively tested for optimal functionality.Full Body Anti-slashMost “Anti-theft” bags currently on the market are actually only anti-slash on the bottom portion of the bag. That doesn’t protect you if a thief is standing behind you on a crowded bus and decide to do a little digging with a pocket knife. While we still suggest you to keep your bag in front of you in crowded areas, even if you get a little distracted looking at the Mona Lisa, our bag is protected from all sides, so thieves can BACK OFF!Cut-proof strapHaving a anti-slash body is no use if a thief just cuts the strap and makes off with the whole bag! Our strong, chainlink strap will deter thieves targeting purses with thin leather straps. The strap comes in two lengths: 18", 20", and 23" drop length. See our chart below under "Size Guide" to figure out which length is perfect for you. Detachable StrapThe Strap also clips open so that you can wrap it around your chair at a restaurant or a pole on a train. That way they can’t grab or kick the bag. While it’s not a lock, thieves are looking for easy paydays, so if they see that your bag is attached, they’ll move on to an easier target.Lobster Clasp Zipper pullsSneaky little fingers might try to pull a zipper or two open. Our clip zippers will lock onto the metal clip, deterring potential thefts from trying to open your bag. Chose to use it all the time, or lock up when you’re in a crowded area.RFID protectionThe built in wallet provides RFID protection, which means that tech-savvy thieves won’t be able to pick up your private information with RFID readers.Waterproof Body & ZippersEven if you’re caught in a sudden downpour in the middle of a rice paddy in Bali and still have to walk 30 minutes back to your hotel (true story), your valuables will be protected! Not just water resistant, our bag is 100% waterproof with a waterproof nylon exterior and waterproof zippers. So never fear a sudden change in weather, or you know, someone spilling their drink on you (also a true story).Comfortable Padded StrapThe chain strap comes with a microfiber vegan leather pad for added comfort. Rather than transitioning the strap from chain to leather, which can be easily cut, the pad wraps around the chain. It is also adjustable up and down the chain to find a comfortable position for you.Ample Storage for all your stuffThe bag is sized to perfectly store all necessities, but also be non-invasive when out and about all day. See our “What Size to Choose” to see what works for you.Metal Studs Protect the Bottom The Full size crossbody will have 4 metal stud feet to protect the bottom of the bag from wear and tear when you set your bag down. 
Dimensions:

Full: L: 8.5”, H: 6.5”, W: 2.5”

Mini: L: 6.5”, H: 4.5”, W: 2.25”

 The best way to determine the length for you is to take a crossbody you already love the length of on you. Then measure it from the top of the center of the bag to the apex of the strap when taught. Here is a general height guide, but of course, you are welcome to pick the length you prefer since everyone has different preferences!Click here for more for images of both Full Size and Mini size bags on a 18", 20", and 23" drop length chain strap on models at various heights.   Below you can find all the specs for the Anti-Theft Travel Crossbody.If there is a spec that you don't see, you can always contact us for more information.

Dimensions:

Full: L: 8.5”, H: 6.5”, W: 2.5”

Mini: L: 6.5”, H: 4.5”, W: 2.25”



Drop Length:
​Two options, 20" or 23"


Weight:

Full: 1.2 lbs (19.2 oz)

Mini: 0.8 lbs (12.8 oz)



Material: Waterproof Nylon, Vegan Leather, Satin Polyester

Waterproof: Yes, Body & Zipper

Number of Exterior Pockets:

Full: 2

Mini: 1



Number of Interior Pockets:

Full: 2 Wall pockets, 1 Zipper pocket

Mini: 1 Zipper pocket



Built in Wallet: Yes

Full: 8 card slots & Bill slot

Mini: 4 card slots & slot for folded bills


 Arden Cove was founded by two sisters born and raised in San Francisco, California. Ever since we were little, we always found projects to work on together: baking cakes, making clay models, building a website. Our DIY attitude drove us to continuously ask ourselves what we wanted, and how to make it better. We haven't stopped since.We are dedicated to making delightful functional bags that solves problems. Earlier this year, we launched our Daily Laptop Backpack. When we were contemplating our next bag, we turned to our shared love of travel and started dreaming up the Anti-theft waterproof crossbody. After months of iterations, we have arrived at our dream bag, and want share it with the world.Carmen always found startups scary and fascinating, and is interested in all things entrepreneurial and tech. While working as a Program Manager for the Ads API at Twitter and with a long history in performance marketing, she’s always tinkering with something in her free time, including making home-brewed Kombucha, programing games, and is now taking on the challenge of running a business!Karin is the creative one in the partnership. With a double major in Fine arts and Art History and a background in graphic design, photography, and film/publications, she’s obsessed with creating bags that not only look nice, but are also functional and practical. True to both sisters’ maker mentality, she had created over 145 videos for her educational art history channel, Little Art Talks on YouTube. WHY INDIEGOGO?We are launching on Indiegogo to raise the funds to meet our minimum order. We want to make sure it's a bag you'll love, so we are excited to have this direct relationship with you through this platform. By raising funds directly from customers, we can ensure that the bags are what you are really looking for, and build our product with the support of an engaged community.If I purchase a Combo pack (more than one bag) can I mix and match the colors?Yes, you will be able to pick the color for each individual bag you purchase from the colors available by the end of the campaign. We will send an survey to backers asking what colors they are interested in if stretch goals are met. At the end of the campaign, an official survey will be sent to select the colors of your bags. How long is the chain strap? Is it adjustable?The chain strap is not adjustable, but instead will be available in three lengths. At the end of the campaign, choose from either a 18", 20", or 23" drop length. We suggest taking a crossbody you already enjoy the length of, and measuring from the center of the top of the bag, or the apex of the strap when taught. Then select the length closest to this number. A general height guide we suggest is the following: 18": <5'2", 20": 5'2"-5'8", 23": > 5'5". We do suggest the first method if possible due to different torso lengths and preferences.  Click here to read our blog post and see more pictures. I would prefer a non-chain strap. Can you make this an option?Many people have requested this, and we spent a good deal of time trying different prototypes. Unfortunately, they ended up being labor intensive, and thus expensive to produce. While we would love to offer this, we opted to not offer this alternative to not delay our timeline and instead extended our offered chain lengths. Hopefully with the three offered chainlengths (18", 20", 23" drop length) everyone will be able to find a length they enjoy! Will the wall pockets of the full size bag fit my iPhone 6/7 ? Yes, the wall pocket is large enough to fit the iPhone 6, 7, and Google Pixel XL. It will also comfortably fit any smaller smart phones.Risks and challengesThe Arden Cove team has experience in manufacturing, logistics, and product design. We do not anticipate any major problems in the production or being able to deliver the Anti-Theft Travel Crossbody on time. If any major concerns regarding design comes up, we will be sure to address it as necessary.MANUFACTURINGOur factory is located in China. We have personally visited and developed a strong relationship with the factory for the past 2 years, and have collaborated before on our Daily Laptop Backpacks. We tested with other factories when producing the first Anti-Theft Waterproof Crossbodies, and we ultimately came back to our original manufacturer due to their quality craftsmanship and reliability. In the event of substantial demand for the Anti-Theft Travel Crossbody, we are confident our factory will be able to ramp up production and deliver on time while maintaining the quality they are known for.We are in constant communication with the factory and will personally be on-site for material sourcing and to oversee production and solve any problems in person.

story:
Get your reward today... because life is large.

THE SITUATION:

You have an extra-large sense of humor with a frame to match, but can never find funny T-shirts in your size. (Or you know a friend or family member who fits this description.)

THE SOLUTION:

WEIGHTEES tees, sold ONLY in sizes XL-6X!

WeighTees is a new brand founded by and designed for people of size. Our shirts are made only in sizes XL to 6X. These aren't cheap tees – they're quirky, quality shirts that are colorful and smartly decorated. They're both funny and fun to wear, and there's no extra charge for these larger sizes!

WeighTees' goal is to ensure that everyone can join in the comfort and fun that goes with wearing America's casual shirt of choice - the classic, colorful tee with great graphics!

WHAT WE'RE DOING:

The funding we receive from this Indiegogo campaign will help secure our initial stock of WeighTees T-shirts in the necessary sizes, so please reserve your FIRST-EDITION SHIRT(S) now!

WeighTees will open its Web store in the fall of 2013 with an initial line of 12 T-shirts, each of which is available as a first edition through this Indiegogo campaign.

Our online store will offer one-price T-shirts and shipping/handling rates based on the number of shirts (and not the size), you’ll love our prices! Our shirts are brand-name, heavyweight T-shirts selected for their combination of features:

  • preshrunk 100% cotton (cotton/poly for some colors)
  • double-needle stitching, and fabric that helps wick away moisture
  • a tagless, stay-flat collar with a seamless ribbed neck

After you make your purchase on our secure site, a dedicated, experienced customer-service professional will personally inspect, tag, and pack your order by hand prior to USPS shipment. Nice, huh?

REWARDS:

Our reward levels, shown to the right, offer something for everyone. You can secure a cuddly, plush Manfred the Manatee, or get 1, 2, 6, or all 12 of our first-edition T-shirt designs in any size we offer.

With any reward level, you'll receive membership in the WeighTees Founders' Club, with benefits including advance notice of sales, opportunities to pre-order limited edition shirts, and the power to vote on future additions to the WeighTees line.

Our favorite deal is the $50 BODYGUARD combo, which includes Founders' Club membership, one first-edition T-shirt of your choice, and a plush Manfred the Manatee gets to go along for the ride!

Executive levels include a special addition: a card good for 10 percent off EVERY shirt at WeighTees.com, including sale items and limited-edition offerings. These reward levels are limited in availability, however, so don't miss out.

U.S. shipping and handling is included at each level. 

PLEASE SECURE YOUR REWARD TODAY. THANK YOU!

story:
My passion & vision is to build a sustainable farmstead for women and children survivors of domestic abuse. I dream of creating a Christ-centered environment where these families will learn the value they bring to this broken world by offering different aspects of living in healthy community through agricultural & culinary components. 

In order to do this, I need some training. Kinda like missionary boot camp...

Boot camp is coming up October 2013 in Mijas, Spain, so I need to raise $6000 in a hurry!! This will cover my books, tuition, food & housing. I will pay for airfare & other incidentals on my own.

If you are like me and lose your attention span in 30 seconds and you are sold on this idea, you can stop here and click CONTRIBUTE NOW! Or if you can't donate at this time, please share this page with everyone you know :o) If you like lots of possibly interesting details, by all means, feel free to continue reading my ramblings...

So, here is the plan...

After the 6 months of boot camp is complete, I will head back to the states to begin this ministry & journey. (If you have a farm you would like to donate, please get in touch with me here!)

On the farm, we will teach business & other necessary work-related & life skills (like marketing, product development, administration, networking, but not to forget canning, baking & selling, too!) to help launch women into the workforce when they may not have any other opportunity to do so. This will help ensure that they don't return to their abusers because of financial reasons. Many women return to their abusers because they feel like they have no other option. I want to give them an option! Sadly, 1 in 4 women will experience domestic abuse in her lifetime, but for every 5 victims, only 1 will get outside help. I desperately want to make help available so this doesn't continue to happen!

Your contibutions will be the building blocks of a future community ministry to offer hope to women who feel as if there isn't any. I have been there myself. Thankfully, resources were available for me to get help. Please consider partnering with me financially and prayerfully.

Peace, love & farming,

Jessie
