story:
It took time to incorporate who we are and our philosophies into the eyewear brand you see today. OJOS Eyewear is continually inspired by like-minded travelers, entrepreneurs, artists, and innovators. We wanted OJOS to stand for something bigger than ourselves. It represents a mentality and lifestyle we’ve learned from traveling country to country and from the people we’ve met along the way.  The OJOS mantra was born during this experience: “Go, Be, Do.” GO explore the globe, BE the change you want to see in the world, DO something extraordinary. Together, as the OJOS Eyewear collective, we are advocates of action to live and preserve this mantra to the best of our ability.

THE OJOS EYEWEAR MISSION STATEMENT:

"We are an outpost for global citizenship in our mantra to "go, be, do". We uphold unparalleled style and quality while implementing environmentalism to limit the eco-impact of doing so. We exist to support this lifestyle and eco-consciousness as we travel the globe and protect it collectively"


The vehicle of our company is our product. We are an outpost for global citizenship and we want our eyewear to last during the experiences of our worldwide supporters living the “go, be, do” mantra (That is why we guarantee our sunnies with a lifetime warranty). The entire OJOS collection is designed independently and one of a kind by us.  In designing our products, we made sure of 2 things: a fashionable and timeless design with the highest quality, most durable materials possible.

Our sunglasses feature handcrafted acetate frames, 100% UVA/UVB protectant & POLARIZED CR-39 lenses, barrel 5 stainless steel spring hinges, stainless steel flush-embedded OJOS logos, heat tempered wire core temples, and high quality prints of 1% for the Planet membership, OJOS Environmentalism logo, and model name.

Our design inspiration encompasses the same global approach found in contemporary, street, and surf fashion. We radiate the eclectic and fashion-forward identity that makes us who we are – implementing timeless style and trend true to our home of Venice, California.


>>>> Click Here for full 'OJOS EYEWEAR LOOKBOOK 2014' >>>>



*All 6 models are unisex, polarized, and available in gloss black and tortoise shell


>>>> Click Here for full 'OJOS EYEWEAR LOOKBOOK 2014' >>>>


*All 6 models are unisex, polarized, and available in gloss black and tortoise shell


>>>> Click Here for full 'OJOS EYEWEAR LOOKBOOK 2014' >>>>


Our custom made pouches are handwoven and microfiber lined to ensure your sunnies are scratch protected even when they are not on your face. Additionally, our pouches project was implemented and made possible through us setting up a micro-financed, grassroots campaign with indigenous women of India to support their way of life - providing jobs and income and preserving traditional craft. We're super proud of this project and and equally excited to provide such a timeless, quality product along with our sunnies. 



We illustrate our global philosophy together with our non-profit partners. We proudly plant 10 trees for every pair of eyewear sold, implement a self-imposed 1% “Earth tax” which we donate to our NPO partners (via 1% for the Planet membership), manufacture our display cases locally in California utilizing reclaimed beetlekill pinewood, use packaging with 5 eco certificates in recycling, green power, energy, and forestry, and make the pouches for our eyewear through a micro-financed, grassroots campaign with indigenous women of India to support their livelihood, way of life, and traditional craft. 

For every pair of eyewear sold, we plant 10 trees. As one of our carbon offset methods, we’ve partnered with Trees for the Future and The Nature Conservancy to plant trees in countries around the world that suffer from deforestation and soil degradation. 

Using the best of what’s around is a cornerstone of our company. All OJOS display cases utilize a reclaimed pinewood called Colorado Beetlekill. A species of beetle carries a type of bacteria that is naturally deforesting mass amounts of US National parks and forests – collectively this deforested area is 1,760,000 acres. We reclaimed this wood from Colorado that would otherwise end up in landfills for all of our custom, hand-crafted display cases.

All OJOS packaging and print materials come with 5 different eco-certifications to represent our eco-driven philosophy and foundation. These certifications include the Forest Stewardship Council (FSC), Sustainable Forest Initiative (SFI), EPA Green Power Partner, 100% recycled paper, and non-toxic, vegetable based inks and dyes.

We took the initiative to make a social impact with the OJOS multifunctional pouches that our eyewear comes in.  All OJOS pouches are made via a micro-financed, grassroots campaign with indigenous women of India to support livelihood, way of life, and traditional craft. This trade fair certified project allows us to support an amazing cause and provide our supporters with an extremely unique item (see more above in the "OUR CUSTOM POUCHES" section).

We are a proud member of 1% for the Planet and voluntarily tax ourselves a 1% “Earth Tax” to donate to worldwide organizations that work to protect, preserve, and sustain healthy environments. We work to cover our environmental footprint for our generation, and generations to come. In 2014, our 1% goes directly to the Surfrider Foundation to protect the world’s oceans, beaches, reefs, and aquatic ecosystems.


We want to thank you and the Indiegogo community for the support! We are looking forward to our full-scale launch with this campaign but we simply cannot make that happen without your help. All funds generated from this campaign are going towards our production run so we can fully and successfully launch OJOS. Feel free to take off your coat and stay awhile, let us know if you have any questions. Cheers from us at OJOS!


                                                        ***  FAQ  ***

                                           (as answered by Tyler & Phil)

I have a question or I want to drop you a line, how do I contact you?

Drop us a line anytime: info@ojoseyewear.com

Where is the money going?

All funds generated are going right towards our first production run to get OJOS off the ground and running. The funds generated from this campaign help us do just that... and we genuinely thank you for all of your support. 

When will my OJOS sunnies be delivered?

Keep in mind, these are handcrafted. In creating the OJOS brand, we worked hard to make sure durability, quality, and style are second to none. This does mean that lead times take longer because of the attention to detail and quality. Our first production run and lead time won’t allow us to ship them right away but you can expect to get the OJOS sunnies of your choosing 8-12 weeks after your pledge is complete. Don’t fret, of course they’ll arrive before summer.  We want you all looking good.

Is there a warranty for OJOS Eyewear?

Absolutely, we've got you covered. We at OJOS pride ourselves on design, quality, and durability of our sunglasses and expect them to last during your "Go, Be, Do" travels & experiences. Within 1 year of purchase, we offer a no questions asked, “Halo” warranty, whereby we will replace your sunnies at no additional cost to you.  There is also a lifetime guarantee against manufacturer's defects on all sunglasses.  If something is to ever happen via a manufacturing defect, send your sunnies in and we will replace them and ship a pair back to you. All we ask is that you provide proof of purchase along with sunnies for any warranty claim.

How large is the OJOS Eyewear collection?

We are launching with 6 different models all of which are available in both gloss black and tortoise shell – a total of 12 different options for you to choose from.  For now.

Are OJOS sunglasses polarized?

Of course, your eyes are important and we see no point in ever producing or purchasing sunglasses that are not polarized. Our entire OJOS line features 100% UVA/UVB protectant, polarized CR-39 lenses.

Is OJOS Eyewear available in retail stores?

Not yet, but soon. We’re talking with some of the best contemporary, street, and surf retailers on the map. We will be in retail stores after this Indiegogo campaign. 

Do you ship internationally?

Not in the US? No worries. We will just need you to add $15 for international shipping on your total when checking out OR you can choose to contribute $15 on a separate transaction. We are excited to spread the OJOS love around the globe!

OJOS threads. I want them. What are the details of the "Support OJOS via Threads" perk?

Word. With our eco-identity and philosophy it only makes sense to provide our shirts made of eco-friendly/recycled materials. We've partnered with Alternative Apparel to provide our OJOS threads via their "Alternative Earth" collection: Super comfy, super high quality, super eco-friendly, super OJOS. Made in the USA. Available for men and women in Eco-Black as shown. Check sizing/fit on the Alternative Apparel website (the Women's shirt is called the "Ideal Tee" and Mens is called the "Eco-Heather Crew"). Price includes shipping. After purchased, please email: orders@ojoseyewear.com with "OJOS threads" in the subject line and sex/size in the content.



THANKS AGAIN FOR ALL OF YOUR SUPPORT!!!

Again, we simply cannot do this without you and we appreciate all of your support. Together, as the OJOS collective (not only us but supporters like you globally), we are looking forward to making an amazing global impact while providing unparalleled style/quality sunnies. Simply just spreading the world about OJOS via social media is huge. You can join in on the action here:

Facebook    www.facebook.com/ojoseyewear

Twitter         www.twitter.com/ojos_eyewear

Instagram    www.hashgr.am/u/ojos_eyewear

Vimeo          www.vimeo.com/ojoseyewear

tumblr blog   www.ojoseyewear.tumblr.com


Once again, thanks! We will keep you all posted as this campaign progresses with live updates, videos, etc...

Together, as the OJOS collective (not only us but supporters like you globally), we are looking forward to making an amazing global impact while providing unparalleled style/quality sunnies. Simply just spreading the world about OJOS via social media is huge. You can join in on the action here:Facebook    www.facebook.com/ojoseyewearTwitter         www.twitter.com/ojos_eyewearInstagram    www.hashgr.am/u/ojos_eyewearVimeo          www.vimeo.com/ojoseyeweartumblr blog   www.ojoseyewear.tumblr.comOnce again, thanks! We will keep you all posted as this campaign progresses with live updates, videos, etc...

story:
QUICK ACCESS

 We believe SPEED is not about having a lot of outer pockets, it's about having the most intuitive way to find your things when you need them the most.

SELF-ADJUSTING STRAPS

Our patent pending strap system automatically distributes the load on both shoulders to guarantee the perfect balance at all times. 

ANTI-THEFT MAGNETIC CLOSURE

Our revolutionary inverted magnetic closing mechanism (patent pending)  allowed us to make it theft proof without compromising the fast access.

EXPANSION UP FROM 20 lts TO 35 lts

 

ALL FEATURES​

COLORS AVAILABLE

CARRY ON FRIENDLY

BODY TEMPERATURE REGULATION CHANNELS

 Keeps you cool and dry.

REVIEW FROM THE GADGET FLOW

Combine style and functionality on your travels with The Frenchie Co. Speed Thermoregulated Backpack. This bag is loaded with innovation for total convenience. It takes its name from the fact that you can easily and quickly access anything you need. In fact, accessing items inside the bag only requires one movement. There are also two quick access pockets for conveniently storing items you use the most. Featuring an anti-theft magnetic closure at the top, the bag even keeps zippers hidden against your back. The rain-resistant Speed Backpack features ballistic nylon and the same thermoregulation found in astronaut suits. The result is impressive regulation for high-temperature variations, ensuring optimal temperature on your back. Furthermore, the Speed Backpack has expandable storage to give you 20 to 35L of space. In addition, there are an impressive 29 different pockets to safely stash away your gear.

SPECIALLY DESIGNED FOR

SEE IT IN ACTION

 

 

OUR STORY

Three years ago, my brother and I were looking for a wallet we couldn't find so we decided to join forces and our passion for quality goods to make what we believed to be the best products on the market.

 

OUR MISSION

Help people be more productive and feel more comfortable by making super functional top quality products they would be proud to use.

FAQ

ARE COLORS EXACTLY AS THEY APPEAR HERE?

It‘s very hard to represent the exact color of the real product, specially considering that every screen shows colors differently. However, we tried to show the colors as accurate as possible.

CAN THE SPEED BACKPACK FIT A 15" LAPTOP? 

Yes, It is designed to fit a 15" Laptop.

HOW MANY POCKETS DOES THE SPEED BACKPACK HAVE?

The Speed Backpack has 29 pockets.

IS THE SPEED BACKPACK WATER RESISTANT?

Yes,  the Speed Backpack is water resistant. However, please keep in mind it is not water proof.

HOW MUCH DOES SHIPPING COST?

We offer free worldwide shipping. However, please keep in mind that import fees or any other carrier fees are not included. Depending on your country's custom's regulations, you will have to pay for them upon arrival.

CAN I PAY WITH CASH ON DELIVERY? 

No, unfortunately it‘s not possible for us to receive payments on cash. The
purchase must be made with a credit card on Indiegogo.


HOW MUCH ARE IMPORT TAXES TO MY COUNTRY?

Import taxes are established by each country's customs regulations. They also vary depending on other aspects such as the price of the product. Therefore, we can‘t know this information beforehand.

WHERE DO YOU SHIP EVERYTHING FROM?

We manufacture and ship all of our products from Colombia, South America.

I HAVE A PROBLEM/NEED TO SPEAK TO SOMEONE! CAN I CALL YOU? 

We don't offer international phone call service at the moment. Please contact us at support@thefrenchieco.com We'll be more than happy to help you.

story:
Thanks to our successful Kickstarter campaign we've already kicked off production of our proprietary fiber, but hitting this goal will allow us to buy the machine we need to make *every* pair we ship to our backers this fall sheer from waistband to toe (our most requested feature!). We'll also be able to add high end finishes like flat seams and an invisible control top. To hit this goal we're offering the Indiegogo community our classic style AND exclusives like our NEW footless sheers and a moisture wicking headband.




 
 
Interested in covering Sheerly Genius? View our press kit to download more assets.
 
 

The word 'pantyhose' does not do these
Sheerly Genius sheers justice.


We know you need a product that can take you from morning through night, without sacrificing on comfort or style, so our sheers are not just strong but as light weight as your tights, but as comfortable as a pair of leggings.
 
Our sheers are made with the strongest pantyhose in the world. They are patent pending and tested up to 50 wears. They are made with proprietary ballistic fibers, up to 10x stronger than steel but look and feel like regular sheers. 
 

Proprietary Fiber 

We searched high and low to find a sheer fiber strong enough to produce a truly lifeproof pair of sheers. Unsatisfied with all of the options available in traditional apparel, we set out to produce the world's first pair of sheers made using the same type of fiber used in bulletproof vests. Aka: some of the strongest fibers in the world.

Ridiculously Comfortable 

Our sheers have been designed using a complex system of knitting techniques, ensuring a run-resistant pantyhose look, always. So your clear nail polish can stay in the clear. Our fibers are not only some of the strongest and most durable in the world, but they are also non-toxic, naturally anti-bacterial, and soft to the touch - making them ridiculously comfortable. These sheers are expertly crafted, with reinforced seams and an invisible waistband. They are designed to look great on any body type. 

Patent Pending 

Sheerly Genius sheers are patent pending and our manufacturing process is a trade secret. So if you’re thinking you’ll find something like Sheerly Genius at your local pharmacy, think again. #sorrynotsorry   


Because smart woman do their homework.
From wash and wear to wood snags,
we've put our product to the test.
Literally. 

 

THE VELCRO TEST

Velcro is no match for the sheer strength of Sheerly Genius.

 

THE ZIPPER TEST

Zip 'em up, these sheers will hold up to anything.

 

THE RING TEST

Your 24-karat diamonds won’t be a problem for Sheerly Genius.

 

THE PULL TEST

Pull as hard as you can. You won’t rip these babies.


 



 


 

1 Billion (1,000,000,000)

disposable pairs of sheers
end up in the landfill every year. 
 

By backing Sheerly Genius you're saying no to the almost 1,000,000,000 pairs of sheers that end up in the landfill (or dead in your drawer) each year. You wouldn't throw out your underwear after one wear - so why should you have to throw out your sheers?

The Sheerly Genius Recycling Program

When you receive your Sheerly Genius sheers you will also have the opportunity to send us all of the old, broken and destroyed pairs of sheers you have sitting in your drawers (what we like to call your pantyhose graveyard!). We work with recycling partners to take your old sheers and transform their raw materials into new products. Let no pair go to waste!

Reusable Wash Bag

Not even our packaging is disposable. Every pair of Sheerly Genius come with their own mesh back laundry bag. It’s even cute enough to use as a clutch! Use the bag to store your tights and then throw them in the washing machine. No bleach, fabric softeners, no ironing. Just wash in cold water and hang to dry.

Back us now, and you will have the opportunity to select your size when we fulfill.

If you don’t see your size here, we still want to make Sheerly Genius for you! Please back this project so we can grow as a company and make it possible to create the sizes you need. Please also write to us in the comments with your size preference!


 


 

 

The competition really are are no match for Sheerly Genius. Watch our videos to see how Sheerly Genius holds up against the rest.
 

Watch us compare Sheerly Genius to brands like Wolford, Commando and Spanx. You'll have your finger through a pair of the other guys in seconds - while Sheerly Genius will hold up to whatever life throws at it! 

 

Not even a metal zipper can tear through Sheerly Genius!

 

Say goodbye to silk, gloves, extra pairs and clear nail polish!

 

Sheerly Genius is proprietary from toe to waist. There is nothing else like Sheerly Genius on the market. Trust us, we've literally tried everything.

 

Our proprietary fiber is naturally cooling. Go science!
 
 
 



We've tested Sheerly Genius up to 50 wears. It would take 25 pairs (!!) of sheers to get the same number of wears out of the average brand of sheers. 
 

Some things just make sense.

(and we're not just talking fashion sense)

In 50 wears you'll have saved 25 pairs of sheers from the landfill.

 

1.  Ignorance is bliss

Your support will give us the funding we need to produce the first production size batch of our proprietary fiber, and will allow us to retrofit more machines to work with our insanely strong fibers!
story_txt:
Want to stay updated? Sign up today for our VIP list and get exclusive access to new products and discounts!

Sheerly Genius has developed the world's first pair of indestructible sheers using our proprietary yarn which has been developed from the same fiber used in bulletproof vests.The sexiness and breathability of a pair of sheers, and the strength and comfort of your favorite leggings!


 


Disclaimer: While Sheerly Genius has been developed using ballistic grade fibers, the end product is not in itself bulletproof. These are for the boardroom, not the battlefield! 
 
Our proprietary yarn
is the strongest yarn in the world.
 
Our sheers took over a year of R&D, which included the development of our yarn.  Sheerly Genius yarn combines ballistic grade fibers (up to to 10 times stronger than steel), with a proprietary knit and manufacturing process to create the world's first pair of indestructible sheers. Think your favourite sheer tights but the strength, durability, and comfort of leggings. Our fibers are so strong they actually break traditional pantyhose machines so we've retrofit machines specifically to work for our product. Our sheers are not only reusable - but tested up to 50 wears!
After a successful Kickstarter campaign, production of our proprietary yarn is already underway, but hitting our goal here on Indiegogo will allow us to buy the machine we need to make *every* pair of sheers we ship to all our backers this fall sheer from waistband to toe (our most requested feature!). We'll also be able to add high end finishes like flat seams and an invisible control top.See this behind the scenes footage of our founder, Katherine Homuth, hanging from Sheerly Genius vs. a regular pair of sheers while filming our crowdfunding video! Spoiler alert: the regular sheers do not hold up.
 Thanks to our successful Kickstarter campaign we've already kicked off production of our proprietary fiber, but hitting this goal will allow us to buy the machine we need to make *every* pair we ship to our backers this fall sheer from waistband to toe (our most requested feature!). We'll also be able to add high end finishes like flat seams and an invisible control top. To hit this goal we're offering the Indiegogo community our classic style AND exclusives like our NEW footless sheers and a moisture wicking headband.





  Interested in covering Sheerly Genius? View our press kit to download more assets.  The word 'pantyhose' does not do theseSheerly Genius sheers justice.
We know you need a product that can take you from morning through night, without sacrificing on comfort or style, so our sheers are not just strong but as light weight as your tights, but as comfortable as a pair of leggings. Our sheers are made with the strongest pantyhose in the world. They are patent pending and tested up to 50 wears. They are made with proprietary ballistic fibers, up to 10x stronger than steel but look and feel like regular sheers.  Proprietary Fiber We searched high and low to find a sheer fiber strong enough to produce a truly lifeproof pair of sheers. Unsatisfied with all of the options available in traditional apparel, we set out to produce the world's first pair of sheers made using the same type of fiber used in bulletproof vests. Aka: some of the strongest fibers in the world.Ridiculously Comfortable Our sheers have been designed using a complex system of knitting techniques, ensuring a run-resistant pantyhose look, always. So your clear nail polish can stay in the clear. Our fibers are not only some of the strongest and most durable in the world, but they are also non-toxic, naturally anti-bacterial, and soft to the touch - making them ridiculously comfortable. These sheers are expertly crafted, with reinforced seams and an invisible waistband. They are designed to look great on any body type. Patent Pending Sheerly Genius sheers are patent pending and our manufacturing process is a trade secret. So if you’re thinking you’ll find something like Sheerly Genius at your local pharmacy, think again. #sorrynotsorry   
 

Because smart woman do their homework.From wash and wear to wood snags,we've put our product to the test.Literally.  THE VELCRO TESTVelcro is no match for the sheer strength of Sheerly Genius. THE ZIPPER TESTZip 'em up, these sheers will hold up to anything. THE RING TESTYour 24-karat diamonds won’t be a problem for Sheerly Genius. THE PULL TESTPull as hard as you can. You won’t rip these babies. 
  1 Billion (1,000,000,000)disposable pairs of sheersend up in the landfill every year.  By backing Sheerly Genius you're saying no to the almost 1,000,000,000 pairs of sheers that end up in the landfill (or dead in your drawer) each year. You wouldn't throw out your underwear after one wear - so why should you have to throw out your sheers?The Sheerly Genius Recycling ProgramWhen you receive your Sheerly Genius sheers you will also have the opportunity to send us all of the old, broken and destroyed pairs of sheers you have sitting in your drawers (what we like to call your pantyhose graveyard!). We work with recycling partners to take your old sheers and transform their raw materials into new products. Let no pair go to waste!Reusable Wash BagNot even our packaging is disposable. Every pair of Sheerly Genius come with their own mesh back laundry bag. It’s even cute enough to use as a clutch! Use the bag to store your tights and then throw them in the washing machine. No bleach, fabric softeners, no ironing. Just wash in cold water and hang to dry.Back us now, and you will have the opportunity to select your size when we fulfill.If you don’t see your size here, we still want to make Sheerly Genius for you! Please back this project so we can grow as a company and make it possible to create the sizes you need. Please also write to us in the comments with your size preference!   The competition really are are no match for Sheerly Genius. Watch our videos to see how Sheerly Genius holds up against the rest. Watch us compare Sheerly Genius to brands like Wolford, Commando and Spanx. You'll have your finger through a pair of the other guys in seconds - while Sheerly Genius will hold up to whatever life throws at it!  Not even a metal zipper can tear through Sheerly Genius! Say goodbye to silk, gloves, extra pairs and clear nail polish! Sheerly Genius is proprietary from toe to waist. There is nothing else like Sheerly Genius on the market. Trust us, we've literally tried everything. Our proprietary fiber is naturally cooling. Go science!   We've tested Sheerly Genius up to 50 wears. It would take 25 pairs (!!) of sheers to get the same number of wears out of the average brand of sheers.  Some things just make sense.(and we're not just talking fashion sense)In 50 wears you'll have saved 25 pairs of sheers from the landfill. 

Check out this behind the scenes video of our prototyping and manufacturing facility, also featured in our launch video!

It turns out, creating the world's first pair of indestructible sheers is no easy feat!  1.  Ignorance is blissWhen we started our first thought was, what are the strongest fibers we know? Let's just make a pair of pantyhose out of that. But let's just say we were being a bit naive. And that's probably a good thing because I don't think we would have started if we knew just how hard it was going to be at the start!
2.  We don't know what we don't know
The thickness of a fibre is measured in denier. Pantyhose starts at 100 denier or less. Sheer pantyhose are 30 denier or less. We quickly found our that most low denier fibers are also low tenacity (meaning they aren't very strong). We needed a miracle fiber that would be both super low denier and super high tenacity.
3.  Let's start a process of elimination.
When you think strong fibres, most people's first thought is kevlar. But the lowest denier kevlar comes in 1000 denier. So it was a non-starter. All of the other lower denier fibers we found on the market would break when we'd pull them off the spool with little or no effort.
4.  We found the miracle fiber.
Eventually we were able to get our hands on the strongest fiber in the world. 10 times stronger than steel, and used in ballistic applications like bulletproof vests. We knew 100 denier wouldn't be fine enough for a final product, but at least it was within range of other pantyhose and it gave us a place to start. After initial testing we were amazed by the strength of this fiber. Literally none of us could break it. We knew if we could get it in a lower denier we could produce some pretty badass pantyhose with it.
5.  This is not going to work.
But there were a few problems, not only was it not fine enough, the fiber was not dyeable, meaning we'd only ever be able to make white pantyhose, and it had no stretch.
6.  I guess we just need to build our own fiber.
To solve the denier and color issues we went directly to the fiber manufacturers and after a year of R&D developed the first fiber of its kind that was colored, and under 30 denier.
7.  It's so strong it's breaking the machines.
Now that we had the fiber we needed, we hit another roadblock. It turns out that the strongest fibers in the world are actually so strong they break hosiery machines. After lots of trial and error we ended up hosiery machines down and rebuild the from the ground up to work for our application.
8.  Now we need our own machines.
Even once we had the fiber, and the hosiery machines working we still had to figure out how to make the fiber stretch without compromising the strength of the end product. To do this we developed a proprietary yarn that results in a product that is not just ridiculously strong, but also stretchy.
9.  Holy s*** we did it.
After over a year of R&D, we did it! We had created a pair of pantyhose that doesn’t rip, snag or tear, and we were ready to take it to the world. Help us get the product in the hands of women around the world by backing the project here today. Your support will give us the funding we need to produce the first production size batch of our proprietary fiber, and will allow us to retrofit more machines to work with our insanely strong fibers!    
Sheerly Genius is a Y Combinator backed company, with manufacturing and design operations based between Mountain View, California and Toronto, Canada.Sheerly Genius Founder Katherine Homuth is a serial entrepreneur and angel investor. Katherine's first venture backed startup, ShopLocket, was acquired in 2014 by global manufacturing and design company PCH.

Following ShopLocket's success Katherine went on to become an active angel investor. To help support other women getting into startup investing Katherine founded Female Funders an online education platform which was acquired by Highline Beta in 2017.

She has been named one of the Women to Watch in Wearables, one of Canada’s Top 100 Most Powerful Women and one of Flare’s Sixty Under 30.

Katherine has been quoted in the New York Times on fashion tech and was recently interviewed for the Oprah Winfrey Network.  

 
 

I live outside Canada/US can I still order?Yes! We gladly ship globally.
I’ve submitted my order but need to make a change, what do I do?Simply email us at hello@sheerlygenius.com and we’d be happy to help you update your order.
Does Sheerly Genius cover taxes/duties for international orders?Regrettably, our prices don't include local taxes, duties, brokerage fees, and VATs. Make sure you consider all fees prior to ordering because once your order arrives you'll be required to pay all taxes, duties, etc.
Is this for real?Right!?! Yes it is! We’ve worked with the world’s leading experts in textile engineering to develop this product from scratch. Our fibers are proprietary, you won’t find them anywhere else on the market – and our design and manufacturing techniques are patent pending.
Why has nobody done this before?When I set out to start Sheerly Genius we asked ourselves, “why hasn’t this been done before?”
Turns out, developing the world’s first pair of indestructible panthose is no easy feat. But like the #GirlBosses we are, we accepted the challenge.
First, we needed to find a fiber strong enough to withstand the modern woman’s lifestyle, but silky enough to produce a beautiful pair of sheer hosiery.
After months of R&D, we discovered an innovative (and indestructible) fiber technology. Working directly with fiber manufacturers we’ve been able to adapt this technology to produce fibers never before available - fiber both strong and sheer enough to produce sheer, light-weight hosiery. Not to brag, but our fibers are literally the strongest in the world.
By working with industry experts and state of the art machinery we were able to take these fibers and do what others thought was impossible. We developed the world’s first pair of indestructible sheer pantyhose. Pantyhose built to hold up to whatever your day throws at them.
Will it look at feel like regular pantyhose?Sheerly Genius pantyhose look and feel exactly like your typical pair of pantyhose, silky and sheer. But Sheerly Genius also has some amazing bonuses compared to regular pantyhose. Our fibers are naturally antibacterial and stay cool to the touch.
Can I put it in the washer?For sure! Every pair of Sheerly Genius comes with their own mesh laundry bag. It’s even cute enough to use as a clutch! Use the bag to store your tights and then throw them in the washing Machine. No bleach, fabric softeners, no ironing. Just wash in cold water and hang to dry. Voila!
How do I pick my size?Back us now, and you will have the opportunity to select your size when we fulfill.
Sheerly Genius is available in Small (90-130lbs, 4'10" - 5'5"), Medium (120-150lb, 5'2" - 5'9"), Large (140-170lb, 5'5" - 6'), X-Large (160-2l0lb, 5'5" - 6’), XX-Large (200-275lb, 5'5" - 6’).
If you don’t see your size here, we still want to make Sheerly Genius for you! Please back this project so we can grow as a company and make it possible to create the sizes you need. Please also write to us in the comments with your size preference!

story:
THE ULTIMATE PANT FOR TRAVEL, OUTDOOR, & EVERY DAY. 

After three years of searching for the perfect fabric, we are finally ready to present to you our finest, most versatile product yet - The Evolution Pant. A highly-functional pair of pants designed to be the only pants you need for travel, outdoors and everyday. Built with a unique stretch nylon Supplex® fabric, The Evolution Pant is stronger, softer, stain-proof and packed full of travel features to allow you to do more with less!

The Evolution Pant is the only pair of pants you need. A pair of pants that can be worn multiple days in a row without washing. A pair of pants that packs small than a t-shirt, moves with the body, and replaces at least three pants in your closet. A pair of pants that dresses up enough to get through any meeting, yet is rugged enough for any outdoor activity. Designed from the yarn up to feel like a fine cotton, but perform like a high-grade nylon. One pant for travel, outdoor, and everyday. The Everyday Pant, Elevated.

Available exclusively for pre-order, back the project and save 30%.

 

1. Back this project- You will be pre-ordering the pants

2. Select your reward level- Get Indiegogo exclusive discounts!

3. Calculate your Add-Ons

Please note, with add-ons you will select these products after the campaign is over. For now, just add the “add-on dollars” that represent what you will select after the campaign. Don’t worry if you get this wrong we can help you after the campaign.

 

The Evolution Pants are stain-proof, water-resistant, durable, packable, and versatile. Making them the ultimate pant for travel, outdoors, or everyday!

The Evolution Pants are packed full of features and meticulously crafted. They have been designed from the fiber up to be the best pants for traveling, outdoor activity, and the best everyday pants on the planet.

 

STRETCH GOAL REACHED!

 

Thanks to your overwhelming support we’ve quickly reached our stretch goals, and will now be able to offer The Evolution Pant in THREE classic colors of your choosing and THREE inseam lengths from Short, Regular and Long. Thanks for casting your color votes, sharing and helping make The Evolution Pant a reality!

                                                                                                                     

 

WHAT MAKES THE EVOLUTION PANT SO REVOLUTIONARY?

 

ARE THESE OUTDOOR PANTS? 

 

Let's make one thing clear - these aren't just travel or outdoor pants! The Evolution Pant has been meticulously designed and crafted from the yarn level up to perform, look great, and feel great in every scenario no matter the weather or occasion.

 

 

COLORS:

Thanks to your overwhelming support we’ve quickly reached our stretch goals, and will now be able to offer The Evolution Pant in THREE classic colors: Charcoal, Khaki, and Navy.  

 

 
 

 

To create the most versatile pants ever, we had to start from the yarn. We searched for years to find the ideal fabric with the soft feel and look of a cotton fabric, the durability and toughness of a nylon, stretch, and stain resistance. We finally found the ideal partner to create this fabric at a fully vertically integrated, sustainable, Bluesign approved mill in Sweden.

 

 

The key to the Evolution Pant is the nylon Supplex® fabric. Nylon is an incredibly durable fiber used in many products from rock climbing harnesses to parachutes. Supplex® takes the durability of nylon to the next level. The uncommonly strong fibers are air-texturized to make them incredibly soft. Supplex® takes hundreds of these extremely fine, air-texturized nylon fibers and spins them into thick durable yarns. The added fibers cause the yarns themselves to be stronger, but also more dynamic. The resulting fabric is abrasion resistant, ultra-durable, with the soft hand feel of cotton, and the perfect drape and stretch.

 

                                                                                                 

 

Available in:

 

  • Color: Charcoal, Navy, and Kahki
  • Sizes: 28-40 
  • Inseam: Short 30in, Regular 32 in extendable to 34 in, Long 36 in extendable to 38 in

               

REWARDS:

 

 ADD-ONS:

GOALS:

 

STRETCH GOAL REACHED! 

Thanks to your overwhelming support we’ve quickly reached our stretch goal of $300,000, and will now be able to offer The Evolution Pant in THREE classic colors: Charcoal, Navy, and Kahki. We will also offer the pants in THREE inseam lengths: Short, Regular and Long. See details under Fit and Care. 

Thanks for helping make The Evolution Pant a reality! 

 

 

 

FIT:

 

 

 THE EVOLUTION PANT LONG

  Model: 5'10' 160 lbs, size 32

 

 

 

CARE:

 

Due to our pieces having a Durable Water Repellent application, they will absorb less odor and staining. Thus, they can and should be washed less frequently.

CARE: Wash with like colors with mild detergent cold. Tumble dry low or lay flat. Do not use fabric softener during wash as this may damage the water repellency. Do NOT bleach. Do NOT dry clean.

 

A BETTER PROCESS: 

 

 

Why Bluesign? The Bluesign® system regulates and reduces environmental impact through the entire textile supply chain from yarn to the finished product. The system reviews the use of chemistry, energy usage, water and air emissions, worker safety and consumer safety. By developing guidelines and monitoring the implementation of the bluesign® system, Bluesign Technologies is encouraging the textile industry to increase their efforts in sustainability and reduce their environmental impact across the entire textile supply chain.

 

 

Western Rise was founded on a desire to make multi-functional clothing that looks amazing and performs even better. We were overwhelmed by the amount of stuff in the world and wanted to simplify our lives and focus on the things that actually matter. Stylish, versatile, performance clothing allows you to do more with less meaning you can ditch the big suitcase, travel light, do more and see more.

It took a lot of people to bring this project to you, and we couldn’t be more excited!

 

 

We truly believe that it is not only our responsibility, it’s our obligation to protect the world we are part of and enjoy. Because of this we are 1% For The Planet Members and donate 1% of our revenue (gross revenue, not profit) to a group of certified nonprofits.

 

Please note that per Kickstarter guidelines, we cannot use this crowdfunding project to raise funds for charity. We will certainly support our beneficiary organizations outside of Kickstarter, and celebrate this commitment with our backer community.

 

We can't say it enough. Thank you for supporting believing in us. We can't wait to get these new pants in your hands.
story_txt:
THE ULTIMATE PANT FOR TRAVEL, OUTDOOR, & EVERY DAY. After three years of searching for the perfect fabric, we are finally ready to present to you our finest, most versatile product yet - The Evolution Pant. A highly-functional pair of pants designed to be the only pants you need for travel, outdoors and everyday. Built with a unique stretch nylon Supplex® fabric, The Evolution Pant is stronger, softer, stain-proof and packed full of travel features to allow you to do more with less!The Evolution Pant is the only pair of pants you need. A pair of pants that can be worn multiple days in a row without washing. A pair of pants that packs small than a t-shirt, moves with the body, and replaces at least three pants in your closet. A pair of pants that dresses up enough to get through any meeting, yet is rugged enough for any outdoor activity. Designed from the yarn up to feel like a fine cotton, but perform like a high-grade nylon. One pant for travel, outdoor, and everyday. The Everyday Pant, Elevated.Available exclusively for pre-order, back the project and save 30%. 1. Back this project- You will be pre-ordering the pants2. Select your reward level- Get Indiegogo exclusive discounts!3. Calculate your Add-OnsPlease note, with add-ons you will select these products after the campaign is over. For now, just add the “add-on dollars” that represent what you will select after the campaign. Don’t worry if you get this wrong we can help you after the campaign.  The Evolution Pants are stain-proof, water-resistant, durable, packable, and versatile. Making them the ultimate pant for travel, outdoors, or everyday!The Evolution Pants are packed full of features and meticulously crafted. They have been designed from the fiber up to be the best pants for traveling, outdoor activity, and the best everyday pants on the planet. STRETCH GOAL REACHED! Thanks to your overwhelming support we’ve quickly reached our stretch goals, and will now be able to offer The Evolution Pant in THREE classic colors of your choosing and THREE inseam lengths from Short, Regular and Long. Thanks for casting your color votes, sharing and helping make The Evolution Pant a reality!  
 
                                                                                                                       
 WHAT MAKES THE EVOLUTION PANT SO REVOLUTIONARY?  
 ARE THESE OUTDOOR PANTS?  Let's make one thing clear - these aren't just travel or outdoor pants! The Evolution Pant has been meticulously designed and crafted from the yarn level up to perform, look great, and feel great in every scenario no matter the weather or occasion.  COLORS:Thanks to your overwhelming support we’ve quickly reached our stretch goals, and will now be able to offer The Evolution Pant in THREE classic colors: Charcoal, Khaki, and Navy.    
    
 
 To create the most versatile pants ever, we had to start from the yarn. We searched for years to find the ideal fabric with the soft feel and look of a cotton fabric, the durability and toughness of a nylon, stretch, and stain resistance. We finally found the ideal partner to create this fabric at a fully vertically integrated, sustainable, Bluesign approved mill in Sweden.  The key to the Evolution Pant is the nylon Supplex® fabric. Nylon is an incredibly durable fiber used in many products from rock climbing harnesses to parachutes. Supplex® takes the durability of nylon to the next level. The uncommonly strong fibers are air-texturized to make them incredibly soft. Supplex® takes hundreds of these extremely fine, air-texturized nylon fibers and spins them into thick durable yarns. The added fibers cause the yarns themselves to be stronger, but also more dynamic. The resulting fabric is abrasion resistant, ultra-durable, with the soft hand feel of cotton, and the perfect drape and stretch.                                                                                                    
 Available in: 

Color: Charcoal, Navy, and Kahki

Sizes: 28-40 

Inseam: Short 30in, Regular 32 in extendable to 34 in, Long 36 in extendable to 38 in
               REWARDS:  ADD-ONS:  GOALS: STRETCH GOAL REACHED! Thanks to your overwhelming support we’ve quickly reached our stretch goal of $300,000, and will now be able to offer The Evolution Pant in THREE classic colors: Charcoal, Navy, and Kahki. We will also offer the pants in THREE inseam lengths: Short, Regular and Long. See details under Fit and Care. Thanks for helping make The Evolution Pant a reality!   
   FIT: Model: 5'10', 160 lbs, size 32
 
 
STRETCH GOAL 2 UNLOCKED- Evolution Pants in Short, Regular and Long
Thanks to your overwhelming support we’ve quickly reached our stretch goal of $200,000, and will now be able to offer The Evolution Pant in THREE inseam lengths: Short, Regular, and Long. See details below.
THE EVOLUTION PANT SHORT

 THE EVOLUTION PANT REGULAR 
  THE EVOLUTION PANT LONG   Model: 5'10' 160 lbs, size 32   CARE:
  Due to our pieces having a Durable Water Repellent application, they will absorb less odor and staining. Thus, they can and should be washed less frequently.CARE: Wash with like colors with mild detergent cold. Tumble dry low or lay flat. Do not use fabric softener during wash as this may damage the water repellency. Do NOT bleach. Do NOT dry clean. 
 
A BETTER PROCESS:   Why Bluesign? The Bluesign® system regulates and reduces environmental impact through the entire textile supply chain from yarn to the finished product. The system reviews the use of chemistry, energy usage, water and air emissions, worker safety and consumer safety. By developing guidelines and monitoring the implementation of the bluesign® system, Bluesign Technologies is encouraging the textile industry to increase their efforts in sustainability and reduce their environmental impact across the entire textile supply chain. Handmade in the USA
 USA Factory
 USA Factory
  
 Western Rise was founded on a desire to make multi-functional clothing that looks amazing and performs even better. We were overwhelmed by the amount of stuff in the world and wanted to simplify our lives and focus on the things that actually matter. Stylish, versatile, performance clothing allows you to do more with less meaning you can ditch the big suitcase, travel light, do more and see more.It took a lot of people to bring this project to you, and we couldn’t be more excited!  We truly believe that it is not only our responsibility, it’s our obligation to protect the world we are part of and enjoy. Because of this we are 1% For The Planet Members and donate 1% of our revenue (gross revenue, not profit) to a group of certified nonprofits. Please note that per Kickstarter guidelines, we cannot use this crowdfunding project to raise funds for charity. We will certainly support our beneficiary organizations outside of Kickstarter, and celebrate this commitment with our backer community. 
 We can't say it enough. Thank you for supporting believing in us. We can't wait to get these new pants in your hands.    
Risks and Challenges:
We have been in the clothing business since 2014 and have brought over 24 styles to market. Our team has extensive experience in fabric design and manufacturing high-quality apparel as well as fulfilling lots of orders. We have our manufacturers lined up, and our production team is waiting for our signal. We know what we're doing, and you should be confident that we will deliver what we promise when we say we will. We have dealt with our fair share of manufacturing hiccups and always deal with them in a transparent, responsible way to keep our customers not just happy with their products, but also proud to support us. Should any issues come up, you can be confident we will handle them with transparency and the utmost care for you, our backers. Supply Chain Risk: We're incredibly proud of our supply chain, and have a lot of confidence that we can make what we say we'll make when we say we'll make it. But sometimes things happen, like fabric delays due to yarn being stuck in customs. We add time padding for these events, but sometimes it's not enough. If anything should arrive late we will get through it together. We're deeply committed to and excited about delivering a high-quality product, on time, that we know you'll enjoy for a long time to come. Thank you for your support! We are deeply grateful that you're on this journey with us!

story:
About this project

 

 __________

 

We created Folklore when we were introduced to the fact that Pakistan is the land known for its elite 1800-year-old leather craftsmanship and supplies leather to top luxury brands around the world. This led to the thought that when we have such rich resources available in our home country and we have got the capability and capacity to make luxury affordable globally, so why aren't we doing it yet.

The fact that further motivated us to launch Folklore is that leading brands usually take advantage of the local craftsman by giving them the minute amount of what that earn.

We wanted to change this by empowering craftsman because we believe that they are the backbone of our industry who responsibly module the end product assuring that it is of high quality. 

In brief, Folklore is a tribute to craftsman, blended perfectly with contemporary interpretations in design and material.

 

 

What remains unique is the handmade art of craftsmen of Pakistan, thus it should be protected and valued. We believe the quality of the leather is confined to its craftsman. Craftsman breathes life into the leather and final product. Team folklore believes are policy to empower craftsmen will improve their living standards and simultaneously will result in the high-quality end product, The best leather products.

__________

 

INTRODUCING

OUR NEW RANGE

__________

 

TEXTURED LEATHER CLUTCH BAG

INDIEGOGO $199 | RETAIL $299

A stylish solution to carry and organize your daily essentials. Use it as a glamorous clutch or shoulder bag. 

DETAILS:

  • Special textured leather (cow)
  • Shiny silver metallic accessories
  • Inside flat pocket
  • Large compartment
  • Detachable leather strap

DIMENSIONS: 

  • 21cm X 11.5cm X 3.1cm

 

ELEGANT BAG

INDIEGOGO $299 | RETAIL $ 449

The perfect desirable bag for every woman. Value addition to your personality.

DETAILS:

  • Soft milled leather
  • Cotton lining
  • YKK Excella zippers
  • Two large compartments segregated by a zipped compartment
  • Zip pocket inside
  • Two small pockets for mobile phones & cards

DIMENSIONS:

  • 36cm X 27cm X 19.5cm
  • 11cm Handle drop
  • 42cm Leather strap drop

 

TOTE BAG

INDIEGOGO $249 | RETAIL $369

The everyday classic tote. Highly functional and comfortable.

DETAILS:

  • Soft mild leather
  • Cotton twill lining
  • Magnet closure
  • Hanging pocket
  • Fits a 13" Macbook

DIMENSIONS:

  • 34cm X 31cm X 31cm
  • 21cm Handle drop

 

SHOULDER BAG

INDIEGOGO $179 | RETAIL $289

The classic and ideal shoulder bag for every time and occasion.

DETAILS:

  • Cow Nappa leather
  • Canvas interior
  • Inside pocket
  • Large compartments
  • Magnetic closure
  • Adjustable leather strap

DIMENSIONS:

  • 23CM x 17.8CM x 5.8cm

 

WOMEN WALLET

INDIEGOGO $149 | RETAIL $229

A beautiful, crafty, and highly functional ladies wallet to cater your day to day need.

DETAILS:

  • Soft milled leather (cow)
  • Stud closure
  • 10 credit card slots
  • A note compartment
  • 4 flat pockets
  • YKK Excella zippers

DIMENSIONS:

  • 14.7cm X 9cm X 2cm

 

LAPTOP BAG

INDIEGOGO $299 | RETAIL $459

 

An everyday companion for modern gentleman.

DETAILS:

  • Cow Nappa leather
  • All round YKK Excella zipper
  • Cotton lining
  • Metal feet
  • Comfortably fits 15" MacBook, notebook, documents, and daily essentials
  • Closable zip pocket inside
  • 3 other small pockets

DIMENSIONS:

  • 39cm X 30cm X 6.5cm
  • 40cm leather strap drop

 

BI-FOLD TEXTURED WALLET 

INDIEGOGO $149 | RETAIL $229

 

A uniquely crafted bi-fold wallet with attractive our very special textured leather is the best fit for every gentleman.

DETAILS:

  • Special textured leather(cow)
  • 2 bill compartments
  • 4 card slots
  • Coin pouch with snap closure
  • Cotton fabric lining

DIMENSIONS:

  • 22cm X 9cm (When opened)
  • 11.5cm X 9cm (When closed)

 

We believe that the quality of the final product is as good as the quality of the raw material it is made of. Therefore, we are working with the best tanneries and only the best leather makes the cut for our designs. We want to deliver you the best!!

 

OUR LEATHER

Full Grain Leather is the best quality leather available. Full Grain Leather refers to hides that have not been sanded, buffed, or snuffed (as opposed to corrected grain) to remove imperfections (or natural marks) on the surface of the hide. The grain remains to allow the fiber strength and durability. The grain also has breathability, resulting in less moisture from prolonged contact. Rather than wearing out, it will develop a patina over time. Full grain leather is often seen as the most authentic type of leather because it maintains all of the texture from the original cowhide. Advantages of Full Grain Leather is a smooth and luxurious surface.

Aniline leather is the finest quality leather, aniline is the most beautiful, tender and magnificently supple of all leather types. Aniline leather is the most coveted of all leather types as only the very best rawhides can qualify for this type. Aniline indicates that the leather has been dyed the whole way through. Aniline ages gracefully showing natural wrinkles and creases. Quite simply, aniline exhibits the perfect imperfections of real leather.

 

Production schedule:

Nov 30: Campaign ends.

Dec 10: Placing the order for leather

Dec 30: Leather arrives at the factory 

Jan 02: Production starts

Feb 10: Production ends

Feb 15: Shipping to backers

 

Risk and Challenges:

Shipping time: In manufacturing, there's dependably a risk that suppliers don't satisfy arranges on time. We're working with an exceptionally proficient factory and a tannery that has many years of experience. We trust them to enable us to facilitate other material providers and deliver in a convenient way.

Duty/VAT charges: If you live outside of the US, you will be responsible for any applicable duty/VAT charges. 

Customs: Some countries are known for being very slow with customs, and you probably know if you live in one.

We'll update you frequently about our progress, and if there are any glitches along the way, we'll let you know!

story:
Classic Sneakers for Gamechangers

When we started Wado we only had one goal in mind: to make timeless sneakers and use them as a vehicle for change. A Change in our People and our Planet. From the inside out and from the roots up, a new set of social values starting with our shoes, all the way through to our Social and Planting project. 

 

Our Main Values

 

Wado Sneakers

The first collection is inspired by the 80s fashion: a retro shape and colors that are aligned with our perception of nature, using the off white color as the basis. As a token of our reforestation activity we have added a detail of cork on the tongue, which will somehow appear in all our products. Wado Modelo 89 is available in 6 colors: blue, beige, black, garnet, green and white.

----------

More details on our website.

 

 

----------

 

Forests cover 31% of the land area on our planet. They produce vital oxygen and provide homes for people and wildlife. Unfortunately, according to the United Nations’ Food and Agriculture Organization (FAO), we humans are destroying 7,4 million hectares of forests annually which is the size of Benelux (Belgium, The Netherlands and Luxembourg altogether).

In Wado we fight against deforestation since 2018 allowing anyone to take part in our project. Every time you buy a pair of shoes we plant two trees in collaboration with the NGO We Forest.

Joining forces enables us not only to plant the trees, but also to train the local communities on how to regenerate and protect the forest so it can become a sustainable wood and food resource to them. In one year our team has achieved more than we had never expected.

So far we’ve planted 45.628 trees, 14.000 trees in India, 31.380 in Zambia and 248 in the Amazon and our goal is to double this number for next year.

See our tree planting certificate.

 

 

----------

 

We produce in the EU and we are proud of it.

Currently, 87% of the world of footwear is manufactured in Asia or in developing countries, which is often linked to labor exploitation through the hiring of cheap workforce and where unfortunately many times workers’ rights are nonexistent or extremely limited. Often, workers are squeezed as if they were machines; they have interminable work shifts, have precarious salaries and scarce security in their factories.

 

MISERABLE WAGES

In Asian countries like Bangladesh, India, China, Sri Lanka, Malaysia, Indonesia or Cambodia among others, the paid minimum wage barely represents between half to fifth of the living wage. For instance, in Bangladesh, the minimum wage has recently increased to 63$/month, but despite this rise, it is still 60% below of 170$, the needed living wage.

 

ENDLESS WORKING HOURS

Long working hours and forced overtime are a major concern among garment workers.  Factory managers typically push employees to work between 10 and 12 hours, sometimes 16 to 18 hours a day. A seven-day working week is becoming the norm during the peak season, particularly in China, despite limits placed by the law.
 

UNACCEPTABLE HEALTH & SAFETY CONDITIONS

The collapse of the Rana Plaza in 2013, in Dhaka, Bangladesh, killing 1134 workers and injuring more than 2.500 who manufactured garment for many of the biggest apparel companies in the world, has revealed the unacceptable working conditions of the whole fashion industry to the world. Employees usually work with no ventilation, breathing in toxic substances, inhaling fiber dust or blasted sand in unsafe buildings. Accidents, fires, injuries, and disease are very frequent occurrences on textile production sites.


FREQUENT USE OF CHILD LABOUR

According to the International Labour Organisation, 152 million children are engaged in child labour worldwide. Nearly half of all those -73 million- are in hazardous work that directly endangers their health, safety, and moral development. More than 40% of the child labour is found in the Asia and the Pacific (62.1 million). Because the fashion industry requires low-skilled labour, child labour is particularly common in this industry.

For more detailed info and sources check our transparency section.

 

 

We believe in a better fashion industry.

We were determined not to be part of this. From the beginning we only wanted to partner with suppliers that respect their workers, improving their life conditions and providing them a good working environment; a factory where employment is freely chosen and where child labor is not used in any case. Therefore, we focused on finding partners in the EU that work under the same values as we believe in.

Our search started in our own country, Spain, but after visiting several factories and not meeting our expectations, we decided to knock the door on our neighbor country, Portugal, well known not only for its quality footwear industry but also for the excellence of its service and the ability to deliver small series; We had finally found our partner.

 

 

GREAT QUALITY, GREAT PEOPLE.

Located in the North of Portugal, Felgueiras is the heart of the country’s footwear industry. Our partner, You Shoes, maintains a high standard of ethics: fair wages and shifts, gender equality and most importantly, they treat their workers as family.

The employees of the factory receive an average salary of 850€/month distributed in 14 pays and its gender distribution is balanced (60% men – 40% women). They work 8 hours a day from Monday to Friday and overtime hours are paid 50% more. On peak season, extra hours are permitted but also regulated; Concerning holidays, they have 22 working days of paid vacations a year. Each employee contributes with 11% of their salary to the INSS (government retirement plan).

 

 

In Wado we encourage these suppliers to increase transparency by requiring our collaborators to perform social audits and recurrent chemical tests to verify that trust, integrity and honesty are guaranteed in their work environments. We yearly conduct a social and ethical trade audit to make sure our factories respect our values ​​and meet our criteria as well as to identify areas where improvement can still be made.

We also work with suppliers from Alicante, Spain. The concentration of our manufacturing suppliers within the same geographical area allows us to create an efficient and fast collaborating network which ensures the use of local materials and reduces our carbon footprint.

 

 

 

The Wado Team

 

 

This project has been our life for over a year, and honestly it hasn't been easy. An industry fashion-related projects requires a great effort to come up with a product with an exceptional design and different values compared to other brands. However, we have achieved a great result and we are really grateful to all the people who made in possible for us to get here.

 

Want to join the revolution?

We believe that by producing conscientiously and by planting two trees for each sale we will be able to encourage potential Gamechangers to carry out many other eco-friendly actions. We belive that each and every one of us is a potential Gamechanger and all actions, whether they are big or small, will contribute to a more sustainable world.

 

 

WORLDWIDE SHIPPING INCLUDED IN ALL ORDERS AND COUNTRIES - EU Duty Free Shipping 

 

Domestic Shipping - To EU 28 Countries:

28 EU Countries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom

Since our warehouse is located in Barcelona (Spain) we can offer dutty free shipping to all EU countries. Backers with a shipping address in any of these 28 countries will NOT have to pay any additional duties, sales tax, VAT, etc. We've got that covered!

 

*International Shipping - Rest of the World:

Backers from all other countries (apart from the 28 countries listed above) may have to pay additional import duties or other applicable taxes to the concerned authorities upon receipt of their goods - depending on the import policies of their respective countries. The duties and tax rates vary from country to country and we are unable to help you determine that for your shipment. If you wish to learn about the duties and taxes applicable to your shipment, you may want to check with the customs and border protection authority of your country.  

 

 

Returns Policy

 

Can I return my Wado and get a refund?

Sure! Our returns policy allows you to return unused products within 14 days of receiving them. We'll make a refund once we receive them back in our warehouse. Wado will cover the refund of the pledge paid by the backer except for the shipping fee.  The shipping price will be established by Wado according to our couriers' fares. The additional dutties and taxes will be always paid by the backer. Please note we cannot accept returns that show visible signs of wear. The shoes must be returned in their original condition and in their original box. If that is not the case, the refund will not occur. That is why we recommend trying your Wado on a carpeted surface indoors. Return shipping costs are not covered by Wado.

 

Can I exchange my Wado?

If for any reason you’re not happy with your new pair of shoes, you can return them by sending them back to us. Unfortunately, it is not possible to exchange the shoes. However, you can always return the ones you received and place a new order by contacting our customer service directly at hello@wearewado.com. This way we can ship your new order as soon as possible.

 

 

How to maintain my Wado shoes?

Before wearing them for the first time, we advise you to apply a waterproof spray to your shoes and to repeat this operation periodically.

Maintain the smooth leather of your shoes with a damp cloth and periodically clean them with a specific product spray or colorless leather paste.

We do not recommend putting your Wado in the washing machine. If you still want to do so, we are exempt from all responsibilities.

 

 

 

 

 

Download here the Returns Form
story_txt:
Classic Sneakers for GamechangersWhen we started Wado we only had one goal in mind: to make timeless sneakers and use them as a vehicle for change. A Change in our People and our Planet. From the inside out and from the roots up, a new set of social values starting with our shoes, all the way through to our Social and Planting project.  Our Main Values Wado SneakersThe first collection is inspired by the 80s fashion: a retro shape and colors that are aligned with our perception of nature, using the off white color as the basis. As a token of our reforestation activity we have added a detail of cork on the tongue, which will somehow appear in all our products. Wado Modelo 89 is available in 6 colors: blue, beige, black, garnet, green and white.----------More details on our website.  ---------- Forests cover 31% of the land area on our planet. They produce vital oxygen and provide homes for people and wildlife. Unfortunately, according to the United Nations’ Food and Agriculture Organization (FAO), we humans are destroying 7,4 million hectares of forests annually which is the size of Benelux (Belgium, The Netherlands and Luxembourg altogether).In Wado we fight against deforestation since 2018 allowing anyone to take part in our project. Every time you buy a pair of shoes we plant two trees in collaboration with the NGO We Forest.Joining forces enables us not only to plant the trees, but also to train the local communities on how to regenerate and protect the forest so it can become a sustainable wood and food resource to them. In one year our team has achieved more than we had never expected.So far we’ve planted 45.628 trees, 14.000 trees in India, 31.380 in Zambia and 248 in the Amazon and our goal is to double this number for next year.See our tree planting certificate.  ---------- We produce in the EU and we are proud of it.Currently, 87% of the world of footwear is manufactured in Asia or in developing countries, which is often linked to labor exploitation through the hiring of cheap workforce and where unfortunately many times workers’ rights are nonexistent or extremely limited. Often, workers are squeezed as if they were machines; they have interminable work shifts, have precarious salaries and scarce security in their factories. MISERABLE WAGESIn Asian countries like Bangladesh, India, China, Sri Lanka, Malaysia, Indonesia or Cambodia among others, the paid minimum wage barely represents between half to fifth of the living wage. For instance, in Bangladesh, the minimum wage has recently increased to 63$/month, but despite this rise, it is still 60% below of 170$, the needed living wage. ENDLESS WORKING HOURSLong working hours and forced overtime are a major concern among garment workers.  Factory managers typically push employees to work between 10 and 12 hours, sometimes 16 to 18 hours a day. A seven-day working week is becoming the norm during the peak season, particularly in China, despite limits placed by the law. UNACCEPTABLE HEALTH & SAFETY CONDITIONSThe collapse of the Rana Plaza in 2013, in Dhaka, Bangladesh, killing 1134 workers and injuring more than 2.500 who manufactured garment for many of the biggest apparel companies in the world, has revealed the unacceptable working conditions of the whole fashion industry to the world. Employees usually work with no ventilation, breathing in toxic substances, inhaling fiber dust or blasted sand in unsafe buildings. Accidents, fires, injuries, and disease are very frequent occurrences on textile production sites.FREQUENT USE OF CHILD LABOURAccording to the International Labour Organisation, 152 million children are engaged in child labour worldwide. Nearly half of all those -73 million- are in hazardous work that directly endangers their health, safety, and moral development. More than 40% of the child labour is found in the Asia and the Pacific (62.1 million). Because the fashion industry requires low-skilled labour, child labour is particularly common in this industry.For more detailed info and sources check our transparency section.  We believe in a better fashion industry.We were determined not to be part of this. From the beginning we only wanted to partner with suppliers that respect their workers, improving their life conditions and providing them a good working environment; a factory where employment is freely chosen and where child labor is not used in any case. Therefore, we focused on finding partners in the EU that work under the same values as we believe in.Our search started in our own country, Spain, but after visiting several factories and not meeting our expectations, we decided to knock the door on our neighbor country, Portugal, well known not only for its quality footwear industry but also for the excellence of its service and the ability to deliver small series; We had finally found our partner.  GREAT QUALITY, GREAT PEOPLE.Located in the North of Portugal, Felgueiras is the heart of the country’s footwear industry. Our partner, You Shoes, maintains a high standard of ethics: fair wages and shifts, gender equality and most importantly, they treat their workers as family.The employees of the factory receive an average salary of 850€/month distributed in 14 pays and its gender distribution is balanced (60% men – 40% women). They work 8 hours a day from Monday to Friday and overtime hours are paid 50% more. On peak season, extra hours are permitted but also regulated; Concerning holidays, they have 22 working days of paid vacations a year. Each employee contributes with 11% of their salary to the INSS (government retirement plan).  In Wado we encourage these suppliers to increase transparency by requiring our collaborators to perform social audits and recurrent chemical tests to verify that trust, integrity and honesty are guaranteed in their work environments. We yearly conduct a social and ethical trade audit to make sure our factories respect our values ​​and meet our criteria as well as to identify areas where improvement can still be made.We also work with suppliers from Alicante, Spain. The concentration of our manufacturing suppliers within the same geographical area allows us to create an efficient and fast collaborating network which ensures the use of local materials and reduces our carbon footprint.   The Wado Team  This project has been our life for over a year, and honestly it hasn't been easy. An industry fashion-related projects requires a great effort to come up with a product with an exceptional design and different values compared to other brands. However, we have achieved a great result and we are really grateful to all the people who made in possible for us to get here. Want to join the revolution?We believe that by producing conscientiously and by planting two trees for each sale we will be able to encourage potential Gamechangers to carry out many other eco-friendly actions. We belive that each and every one of us is a potential Gamechanger and all actions, whether they are big or small, will contribute to a more sustainable world.  
WORLDWIDE SHIPPING INCLUDED IN ALL ORDERS AND COUNTRIES - EU Duty Free Shipping 
 Domestic Shipping - To EU 28 Countries:28 EU Countries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United KingdomSince our warehouse is located in Barcelona (Spain) we can offer dutty free shipping to all EU countries. Backers with a shipping address in any of these 28 countries will NOT have to pay any additional duties, sales tax, VAT, etc. We've got that covered! *International Shipping - Rest of the World:Backers from all other countries (apart from the 28 countries listed above) may have to pay additional import duties or other applicable taxes to the concerned authorities upon receipt of their goods - depending on the import policies of their respective countries. The duties and tax rates vary from country to country and we are unable to help you determine that for your shipment. If you wish to learn about the duties and taxes applicable to your shipment, you may want to check with the customs and border protection authority of your country.    Returns Policy Can I return my Wado and get a refund?Sure! Our returns policy allows you to return unused products within 14 days of receiving them. We'll make a refund once we receive them back in our warehouse. Wado will cover the refund of the pledge paid by the backer except for the shipping fee.  The shipping price will be established by Wado according to our couriers' fares. The additional dutties and taxes will be always paid by the backer. Please note we cannot accept returns that show visible signs of wear. The shoes must be returned in their original condition and in their original box. If that is not the case, the refund will not occur. That is why we recommend trying your Wado on a carpeted surface indoors. Return shipping costs are not covered by Wado. Can I exchange my Wado?If for any reason you’re not happy with your new pair of shoes, you can return them by sending them back to us. Unfortunately, it is not possible to exchange the shoes. However, you can always return the ones you received and place a new order by contacting our customer service directly at hello@wearewado.com. This way we can ship your new order as soon as possible.  How to maintain my Wado shoes?Before wearing them for the first time, we advise you to apply a waterproof spray to your shoes and to repeat this operation periodically.Maintain the smooth leather of your shoes with a damp cloth and periodically clean them with a specific product spray or colorless leather paste.We do not recommend putting your Wado in the washing machine. If you still want to do so, we are exempt from all responsibilities.     Download here the Returns Form

story:
DRYMILE shoes are made for a new generation of adventurers. The Xtreme Knit technology and the EZbend sole are perfectly suited for the outdoors by giving your feet protection against rain, snow, warm and cold - breathable comfort in any weather, or any terrain. 

 

 

 

Whether you are hiking, camping, skiing or snowboarding, DRYMILE is a comfortable and practical choice to keep you in motion. A great option to switch your shoes for a rainy day, or for a comfortable walk in the snow so you can take a break on the slope. You can even wear them at the beach, thanks to DRYMILE’s waterproof and sandproof design. 

 

 

Our Xtreme Knit technology with the most flexible, enduring, 100% waterproof and 100% breathable stretch knit material consists of 3 layers:

 

DRYMILE’s unique rubber sole makes the shoe ideal for cold weather. 

 

 

Our patent-pending sole technology (EZ-Bend) makes it easier for the shoe to be folded. This is possible because of a special material and design in the middle of the sole. This feature also makes the shoe packable. 

 

 

The patented multi-function, quick-release buckle makes securing the DRYMILE shoe fast and easy. Just release it when taking off the shoe. You can also clip it to your belt or backpack. 

 

 

 

The insole is custom designed to fit perfectly inside Drymile shoes.

 

 

With the insole in, the shoe’s heel is 3mm higher than the toe area - which is designed to give your heel a bit more cushion.

 

      

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

DRYMILE shoes come in 4 colors that were inspired by our love for the outdoors.

 

To order the right size for yourself, you can measure your foot from the back of the heel to the tip of the toe. Then, look up which size would fit you best in the table below. If your foot size is between two numbers, go with the higher size because it’s usually better for your feet to have extra room.  

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The DRYMILE team believes Indiegogo is the right platform to launch and bring our idea to life because this is where innovative ideas are welcomed and where the status quo is challenged. Although this involves risks, we believe these risks are worth it and we believe that our backers will support DRYMILE as an innovative technology that will contribute to health and be good for everyone. 

To offset the risks and challenges involved with creating DRYMILE, we developed and tested 5 generations of prototypes using state-of-the-art product materials. We also spent considerable time measuring the many scenarios and preferences of our users to ensure that the product will address their needs. We also have secured patents and are putting together manufacturing relationships to make sure we deliver DRYMILE to backers as quickly as possible.

When selecting the final supply chain, our goal is to minimize the chances of unforeseen production issues that sometimes happen. Our brand stands for quality - a promise from our brand owner to each and every customer who supports us and our mission to make waterproof shoes more comfortable and affordable for all.

story:
Get Ready for Summer in Style

We are Theta Chi at the University of North Florida. We have cultivated this amazing design in-house through our T-Shirt Committee, with all work being student done. Sun's out, Guns out.

  • Comfort Colors tank top in Bright Salmon - Perfect for the summer.
  • Only available for Theta Chi brothers and national sororities.

 

What We Need & What You Get

Here's what you need to do:

  • Please provide your Name, Phone Number, and what Fraternity/Sorority chapter your are a part of.
  • Please provide the shirt size you are requesting.
  • If you live out of the city you must provide your address and you must pay for shipping.
  • PLEASE READ:
    If you do not pay for shipping and you only pay for the shirt you WILL NOT receive your order if you live out of town.

 

ACT QUICK

  • Our last t-shirt campaign was so successful that we had to have two rounds of funding to meet all orders, so act quick to get yours first!
  • Comfort Colors are the quintessential college clothing, and you'll make it look even better when you're the one wearing it.
  • The shirt can be worn year round. Just how it's always 5 o'clock somewhere, it's always Summer somewhere (you've just got to hop to the other hemisphere).
